product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: grldollies
content: Bought two base & 2 Cameras, one for us and this one to  monitor our 80yr old mom so hope to keep her out of assisted living for a wile.  its has been helpful especially in checking on her. We put it watching living/kitchen area in her apartment.  The recording is choppy as far as it records and stops over and over. Does not stay recording if their is talking.  The voice feature has been handy to tell her that her phone is off the hook and we cant call her.  The unit was not to hard to set up.  We set up our Unit watching our house entry and shop,  Sensitivity is very good it records every car that drives by.  Keeps track of any packages left by the door and has recorded a bird that likes to perch by it to our surprise. We had to stop the notices as it just blows up the phone. Downloading the Vid is easy.  The Camera set  for our house, the camera quit charging.  We sent it in after going through the RMA # system swap feature. Took some time as we had to talk to some one and fill out forms. Note it states in the Warranty Terms that you have 10 bussiness days to get it to them or they will bill you for the replacement camera.  So do not dally.  Shipped it in on 5/22/18 and received a replacement on 5/31/18.  However the replacement camera did not have the battery in it.  The warranty terms & agreements said Do not include manuals, softwear, cables or mounting brackets.  Which by the way is all external stuff.  It does not say do not include the battery.  I called support and they said I shouldn't have sent it in with the battery. I told her we have a charging issue I reasonably thought you would want to look at the battery too and it does not say that in the warranty instructions.  After she consulted with the team supervisor she said they will be sending me a battery.  I told her she needs to pass on that  its not mentioned in the Warranty Terms about not sending in the battery. Please be advised Ask if they want the battery when getting your RMA # or you may be out a battery if they decide differently then with my return.  Hopefully the new camera works.
title: Works Generally Good, Sensitive on Noise, Movement SoSo to Good,  Not long recordings but Monitering is great

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: amazon-faithful
content: I bought two  6-camera-set for my two homes. Whenever slightly more activities, the camera will be offline, sometimes for days, sometimes have to reset by pulling battery out. very frustrating experiences. I hope they can fix the offline issues, then I would give 4 or 5 stars. Arlo Pro by NETGEAR Security System with Siren - 6 Rechargeable Wire-Free HD Cameras with Audio | Indoor/Outdoor | Night Vision (VMS4630) Camera offline often, customer support is really bad!!!
title: easily offline for hours or days. very frustrating

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Grace M. Neary
content: I purchased the 1st geration Arlo almost two years ago and haven’t been disappointed, ever.  I did a lot of research before choosing ARLO and the deciding factors where the free 7 day subscription plan for up to MAX 5 cameras and the ability to share the camera management and monitoring.  As a single woman with 2 teenagers, I often worry about their safety when they are home alone, as well as my safety when I am home alone.  Netgears continued improvement of the technology and camera design and capabilities has only further validated I have taken right decision in choosing Netgear Arlo Cameras.  I added the ArloPro and love the improvements.  I also recommended this camera system to our Board  of Directors at our local neighborhood Pool.  These cameras have successfully helped us get 4 different incidents of trespassing and vandalism called into the police and result in arrests.  Best investment ever.  Also, the cameras helped me see my dog had escaped from the back yard because the camera kept alerting me and when I looked I saw our precious Toby wondering back and forth on the front lawn.  Thank you Arlo for this fantastic product.
title: Excellent product, recommend for everyone!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: C. G. Clark
content: In theory, this is a good system.  Nice app.  However, the downfall here is the Netgear Tech Support.  It is the absolute worst, bar none.  Unfortunately, the Arlo developers seem to be on a self destruction crusade.  Word of warning, do your due diligence before making any purchase.  This includes spending some time on their Community Forum.  There you will find how recent alleged firmware and app "upgrades" have diminished the capability and quality of the system and ignited thousands of complaints and created a host of disgruntled customers.  Their disregard for the customer is glaringly obvious, yet, devoid of any reason or common sense.  I have been an Arlo system owner for over a year and a half.  I have two base stations and 7 Arlo Pro cameras.  I planned on expanding my security system but those plans are on hold indefinitely with the advent of their meddling.  I purchased their mounts, camera skins, battery charger and several extra batteries.  Since their latest "upgrades," the batteries are more necessary than I had ever dreamed as they now prematurely run out of juice. The support though is the weakest link.  It is as if they pay no attention to the forum comments and ask each of us to jump through unnecessary and unwarranted hoops.  All of which results in a vast amount of lost time and effort.  Never do they admit responsibility nor even acknowledge a problem exists. At this point I am researching other avenues for home security.  Too bad.  They seemed to have a good product which could have been built upon.  Not the tact Netgear has chosen to take though.  Unfortunate.
title: Use Caution!!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Snowy Days
content: I bought this whole bundle on 9/17/17 and during that time 3 batteries have died and were not be able to be recharged.  In July 2018 I called NETGEAR to get the first one replaced under warranty.  It was a lengthy phone call but I did get it replaced free of charge.  Two more died so I called 7/25/18 to get them replaced.  During the first phone call the gentlemen took all the information (serial number of batteries) and stated they would replace.  Now a little over a month later, an additional phone call on 8/15/18 (Netgear stated "I should receive in the next day or two") and two more phone calls today I am HOPING to receive two new batteries in 3-5 business days.  To help paint the picture here is the results of todays phone calls:  No batteries have been received so I once again called NETGEAR and this phone called resulted in the customer service rep stating batteries were only under warranty for six months.  All I could think of was a six month warranty for a $48.00 battery - ridiculous.  I got off of the phone and immediately started searching the web and saw strings stating batteries were under warranty for 12 months but I could not find the details of the Arlo Pro warranty within the NETGEAR website or the Arlo website.  I finally had an aha moment so went to my account under NETGEAR - hurray I registered this product - I clicked on it and it did say in black and white that I had a year warranty for "accessories".  So, I called back and conveyed what I found.  At least 90 minutes spent trying to rectify but I should have two batteries in my hot little hands in 3-5 business days saving myself $96.00.  Will update this review when/if I receive.  9/6/18 UPDATE:  received two batteries via FEDEX today.  Hurray, I truly think they send you to a call center, put you on hold for prolonged periods of time and give you a hard time so the consumer will give up due to so many hoops to run through.  Time spent the consumer is then totally wasted yet NETGEAR saves a large amount of money due to this terrible tactic.
title: Battery Issues - buyer beware (register equipment on NETGEAR website to see warranty)

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: EddyT
content: This is a pretty neat system and is easy to set up and use. Problem is in customer support. After three months one of the cameras is dropping off line and all they can do is tell me to swap the batteries around and wait to see if it fails again. If the battery works fine in another camera it should be providing power just fine. The camera is the problem. Does not make since to them though. They would prefer to hope the problem just goes away somehow and take care of itself. Not the type of response you would expect for someone providing a "Pro Security Camera".
title: Nice Product. Dependability a problem.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: MSL
content: My friend who was burglarized got one of these and has recommended them to me for a new home.  I got the Arlo Q plus for watching the kids as well as security. I was blown away by the clarity , ease of set up and use ( not exaggerating, it was easier than setting up my router and modem).  I was also blown away by the ease of use for the app. The camera worked flawlessly! It alerted me when my kid was home, when my dog was barking. All the videos were easy to manage and the alerts.  I have since bought the three camera package of Arlo pro wireless cameras. These are definitely an upgrade and even easier to place without wires.  I have recommended this camera to about ten people already , only three have bought them ( because they actually decided to buy cameras). It's funny on the same day that they bought them they called me and said they work awesome and didn't know why they hadn't heard of these otherwise. I give Arlo 10/10 stars!
title: ... who was burglarized got one of these and has recommended them to me for a new home

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Frankie
content: I did a lot of research for the perfect camera, the Arlo is that camera. You may want additional security, and I can tell you with confidence that this camera will perform. I purchased the camera to catch our local breadcrumb bandit. You may ask yourself what a breadcrumb bandit is, and what their motivation might be. The community was plagued with a man who would walk around covered parking, and sprinkle breadcrumbs onto the roof's of vehicles. The breadcrumb bandit did this to attract birds onto the roof of the target vehicle and cause birds to relief themselves on the roof of the target vehicle, while being fed. The Arlo was able to be placed outside in a discrete location, catch the breadcrumb bandit and put an end to his reign of breadcrumbs in the community. Thank you Arlo.
title: Breadcrumb Badit

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Brian
content: The video compression makes it nearly impossible to identify anyone you may not know. This is a limitation that does not improve no matter how strong your signal is to the base station, or if you have the cameras plugged in. Arlo also limits the features on the free plan, such as inability to create motion zones. The cameras will pick up moving leaves, a waving flag, etc, meaning you will get hundreds of alerts per day unless you turn down the sensitivity to unusable levels where it will not even detect a walking person. They had released motion zones to free users for a short time, but that appears to have been removed. Look elsewhere for a better quality video system, I am sure some exist with free plans. I wish I could return mine.
title: Terrible Compression / Video Quality

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Joe
content: After searching for hours online looking for a good video security system to use in my home and outdoors on my property - I discovered Arlo.  Reading the specifications I discovered that Arlo met all of my requirements and then some.  Gone was the requirement to run wires for power or invest in wifi cameras.  With this added perk I quickly placed my order. After the camera kit arrived I saw for myself how easy it was to deploy these cameras and included base station.  The pairing process is super fast and simple.  I’m able to easilyplace cameras where I want them and the magnetic base makes for very easy and specific positioning for the perfect viewing area. The mobile app is very nicely designed and has a pleasant and easy to use layout.  The cameras can be individually controlled and interacted with, alongwith very intuitive controls to set a manual recording or engage the two way audio which is a very nice feature when using the cameras indoors.  You can also use mobile devices in a geofence co figuration to trigger armingof the cameras for motion detection. The video and photo quality is great at 720P HD and I’d say it’s about what you’d expect for security cameras.  I like the built in digital zoom options and the ability to stream or download saved clips. Overall this is as close to perfect as I’ve seen for a solution where you need a completely wireless solution.  I’m going to be adding more cameras and have no doubt that this will be a lasting option for my Home and outdoor property.
title: Good quality video, morern take on video surveillance with nice features

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Mochamantis
content: I bought this system before Thanksgiving...got it and set it up.  Took a bit of fumbling around to get everything situated but its up, connected to Alexa ...then I noticed there was no continuous feed, only when i pulled the cameras up then it would time out after about 20 mins.  I set the recording time for the week to record but it still times out.  I did a search on this and found out only arlo pro 2 and arlo Q has continuous feed with a CVR plan.  I figured there may be a way so I tried to contact tech support.......they should all be fired!  I called 4 times only to be hung up on then did a chat which said they'll call you in 28 secs....which they did but hung up on me after 10 secs....three times.  So I still don't know if I got the wrong system or not and if I can record without a CVR plan.  Anyone have suggestions? *Update* The batteries lasted 2 weeks, didn't think much about it. Charged them up, put back up....next day One camera was at 22%.  I went to the support site and found out its an ongoing product flaw which they can't seem to fix.  Love my amazon prime, sent the system back.  Don't waste your time.
title: Good system...extremely bad tech support

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: dcbowman
content: This system was a Christmas 2018 gift.  Worked pretty well for a few months, but over time, the video lag went from 3-or-4 seconds out of the box (which was bad enough) to 14 seconds today (today is October 25, 2019).  Worse yet - and perhaps related to the performance degradation described above - Arlo has forced a new app on its users this year - and it is terrible.  The “legacy” app is exponentially better (thank goodness we saved it).  What are they paying their developers?  I spent the first half of 2019 recommending Arlo to friends and I am now steering everyone away from it and will probably replace our base station + 3 with a new WiFi video security system this Christmas.  Have to say that the cameras are totally waterproof, easy to connect, and deliver high quality video - but what use is all that if it takes the camera 5-10 seconds to detect motion (whatever it is that you need to see is gone before the camera starts recording) - and the 14 second delay in “live” mode is super frustrating.  For what it’s worth; our three cameras are well within WiFi range, phones are current, and we’re on uverse fiber.  4K tvs, Xbox, tablets, etc have no problems doing their thing on our network.  Stay away from Arlo for now.
title: Motion detection lag and new app are no go

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Douglas M.
content: I like the system, but my WiFi really took a hit. I have an ASUS router and always had great reception throughout the house. After installing this, I noticed many of my devices started to fall offline randomly. (Ecobee, Chromecast, Cell phones, Google home) It has basically made my 2.4 GHz useless at the house. Luckily, after switching my all my devices to 5Ghz everything is working. Update: almost a year later, this thing is a joke. If you are looking for a toy it is great, if you actually want a security camera look else where. I have the base station a couple feet from the camera and every couple days they silently go offline. An event happens and I want to check the video. Surprise we haven't been recording for the last three days!
title: A Toy, not a real security camera

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Zheeeeem
content: My spousal unit has been pestering me for ages to get a video security system for the house.  Everything I looked at was a festival of wires, and would have required putting some holes in the house, and locating things around electrical outlets  So, naturally, I procrastinated.  Then I found Arlo.  Wireless.  Absolutely worth a try.  It was easy to unpack, and easy to set up and install.  The magnetic mounts are solid, and only require one screw to install.  We recently has a nor'easter, with 30-40 MPH wind of 3 days, and the cameras (4) all stayed exactly where they were aimed.  Total installation time to synch and install 4 cameras, and put the Arlo app on my iPhone, iPad and Mac was about 1.5 hours, and it only took that long because I had to "chat" with a netgear rep to get one of my cameras re-synced.  The audio and video feed is top quality and so far the battery life looks to be pretty good.  After a week I've used less than 5% of the battery.  I'm sure I would have used far less had I not spent a few hours playing around with the views.
title: It was easy to unpack

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Zoe Hoffman
content: Didn't work right out of the box, customer service was less than useless, I had to set this up fast as were going to be out of the home for 5 days while my husband had surgery.  So they suggested I buy an other one from Amazon and return the dysfunctional one and the two items would cross paths, meanwhile I'm out a ton of money and a change that the product is still less than useless!  Don't waste your money, I should have listened to the reviews better.
title: USELESS

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Terence
content: I have a large Arlo Pro system. Two Base Stations, one on each side of my house to have strong coverage, on top of that I have a mesh WiFi system in place to insure both base stations always have a strong connection with my modem. I have five cameras total. With the internet system in place, all my cameras have a solid three bar connection. The cameras sensitivity and video can both be increased from its stock settings at the expense of battery life. On the highest sensitivity and highest video quality, each cameras battery lasts about five weeks. With that said the cameras sensitivity is great. It records every car that drives by and everyone that walks by at about 150 ft away. The video quality is decent, can’t expect to much out of 720p but it’s enough to distinguish a face that walks up to my home. The night vision video does take a dive with video quality, but that’s with all cameras. I would give this a 5 star but I don’t give 5 starts. Cuz yeah, so 4 stars. The Arlo system is a great system IF you have a strong mesh WiFi system in place AND the user is not completely effing useless and doesn’t fail at life!.
title: Good Camera if the user isn’t stupid

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Keith Alan
content: So I quickly learned what the difference is the Pro vs. standard Arlo. These have the rechargeable and the standard ones are not. Really easy to set up and they work great. The Wink hub will work with this, but it just shows motion clips and battery life. The cameras are really sensitive, so I will need to adjust this in the future. As a large bug set the camera off. I went with the free cloud service, as I don't see a need to pay for more storage.  The kit comes with 5 of the magnetic inside mounts. As a lot of reviewers state, only one exterior mount. There are some cheaper mounts, which work well. My only real complaint: I bought 2 of these units for two separate homes. The free service maxes out at 5 cameras!  I bought the standard kit with an additional 4 cameras. Had to create 2 accounts with 2 different emails. REALLY STUPID and Arlo needs to correct this!  All else is good and the system has been working great.
title: Simple setup and now I can see it all

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: E-consumer
content: I had this  for 7 months. Set-up was easy and was working fine until the battery went out and would not hold any charge. They sent me a battery replacement, but after a few months, it would not hold charge again, and now I have to buy a new battery. Does not recommend buying until the battery charging is improved Update - now that I have had this for 14 months, having to purchase a new battery (from a non Arlos vendor), good for a few months and never hold charge. I would not recommend this camera. 4 batteries almost equal the cost of the camera. There are probably better options out there. The so called rechargeable batteries are not good quality. Update 6-2-2020 bought another battery which also ran to the grounds and not re-charged. . I suspect that the unit inbuilt charger does not charge, so it would only work if it is plugged in, totally uselsss. DO NOT GET THIS.
title: Battery life terrible

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Gravy
content: Works 10% of the time. Don’t waste your money. I went on the many good reviews on here and well I’m a highly dissatisfied customer. It’s a total waste of my time. I have the camera 30 ft from the base station and it loses connectivity daily. Try to use the live camera function, just like the tootsie pop three tries and you guessed it no connectivity. Maybe I just can’t buy anything and there is just something wrong with my unit but I doubt it. And good luck getting in touch with a human to help you figure something out. And the support isn’t free after 30 days. Hope this helps. I wish I know what the answer was for a good setup but this one isn’t it.
title: Pass this one by. Not there yet.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Uncle Poncho
content: The jury is still out. I have an Arlo Q and another interior Arlo in addition to this Pro, so I was familiar with the app and it wasn't bad to navigate. Pros: • Good picture, an app that I can navigate. • It paired up to my existing Netgear base station and showed up in the app quickly. • Has geofencing that works, unlike the Ring Spotlight that I returned previously to a local electronics place. Cons: • I live on the NY/Canada border. This camera is inside of the garage, pointing out to the back yard. When the garage temp is in the 20's, it's too cold for the charger (plugged in 24/7 in my case) to work because the battery is too cold. The battery has remained at 97% for the last 2 days though. So it remains to be seen how practical this will be for my area. • The slider switch for motion detection sensitivity is counter intuitive. A search turns up the fact that many folks agree. Sliding it toward the still figure icon reduces sensitivity while sliding it toward the running person icon increases sensitivity. You would thing that larger motions require less sensitivity and lesser motions require more. Perhaps Netgear could address this in future app updates. I was clearly in view of the camera shoveling snow and no motion was detected. I'll continue adjusting sensitivity to see if I can remedy this. Maybe this lack of recording is due to the cold battery and is a power conservation thing. Not much of a security cam if it can't detect a person and begin recording. I may update this review as time and experience come into play and I can offer more insights. Well, it's update time. I returned the camera. Try as I might, the only way the camera would detect motion is if I physically moved the camera itself or if I was directly in front of it at the 1-2 foot mark. I read up on the Netgear forums. I tweaked every setting and pencil icon I could find. All to no avail. So back the Pro went to be replaced by an Arlo Q. I have one of those in another location and so far, so good with that one.
title: I like Arlo cams in general, but this one was not so good.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: tonyf
content: I've had this Arlo system for the past 9 months.  I have the app Arlo Legacy on my iPhone.  It's has been amazing. Until 9/9/19.  So apparently has separated from Netgear and have released a NEW app and it's made the Arlo practically useless.  Forget instant notifications.  What was working great for months-now is a complete broken piece of junk. I am contacting them for a full refund as they have taken a great (really-I'd have given it 5 stars if they used the old app) product and have ruined it. If you have Arlo now-don't update to the new app (it's not an existing update-but a whole new app they make you download).  I think it switches over 9/30 at which time is research Netgear and see if they are making their own.  I think they owned the Arlo system. So bummed
title: All earlier reviews are moot bc the old app is done as of 9/30/19.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Dan
content: This camera is falsely advertised!!!! If you order this camera expecting the Arlo Pro 2 1080p version (Model #VMC4030P) as advertised, you will receive the cheaper, older model Arlo Pro 720p version (Model #VMC4030) I have had multiple phone calls with amazon customer service to straighten this issue out and we came to a satisfactory resolution - but be aware, this particular item is improperly labeled as 1080p when it is not. As for Arlo Pro 2 cameras - they are great, I love them and I am buying more to add to my network!
title: Bait & Switch (Probably a warehouse mistake)

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: S. N.
content: Update: the rechargeable battery in pro is horrible. It is very unstable. Y’day it was 75% but today it is 0 and the camera shut off. I took it to charge, it shows back to 75%  sometimes and shows 1% some other times. The video quality is horrible too. It is always blur, worse than regular Arlo camera. I thought the Len got dirty so I gently cleaned with wet wipes but it is still the same. Jeeeeeeerz it is fine so far (one week use). but obviously more improvements can be reached: 1. the camera should have an option for power line in(non-pro version) 2. the night surveillance area is very narrow (Arlo not pro; Pro is good) 3. Very Limited area is covered by emotion. Only the object is very close it can be triggered even set to 100% sensitivity. Sometimes it cannot be triggered by persons steps. 4. if possible, the camera should be rotated that can be controlled on App.
title: Two significant defects

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: A. Wagner
content: I bought my arlo pro to deter vandals and trespassers.  So far, it seems to be working.  I am also hoping to catch the bear that visits my home on camera. I consider myself experienced in technology setup and was surprised that I had some issues setting up my Arlo Pro (issues getting it to connect and maintain a connection to the internet after the initial software update ran during setup).  Had to uninstall the base station and the camera from my app.  When I reinstalled fresh, everything connected easily and continues to work well. I have a suggestion about the mount.  I love the magnetic mount, but I couldn't get my camera to stay in the position I needed.  It kept swiveling on the mount.  I ended up adding a nail next to the mount to steady it and all works well now.  This could be easily improved by Arlo in the future. I love the one week of video storage and the ability to download and favorite videos.  I am impressed with the clarity of the night vision as well as the sound.  I like that it has two-way audio, but so far, have not had an opportunity to use that feature.  A couple days after I setup my Arlo Pro, I returned home to find police combing the woods in my neighborhood for a suspect.  I felt safer during this incident knowing I could have eyes outside with my Arlo Pro. I am already considering adding another Arlo to my home.  Definitely recommending this product!
title: Love my Arlo Pro, but a few suggestions....

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: BlakeB
content: These really work well.  Don't make the mistake of getting one camera and think that will be your security system.  The reaction time of the motion detector is not fast enough to trigger and record someone moving quickly in an auto or walking.  You need several cameras in sequence to signal one another to begin the video.  Resolution not good enough to see a license tag except maybe with some type of enhancement.  Syncing works well.  Can turn motion detector on or off remotely.  Serves my purpose and fine for my needs. Well designed product. Update on 5/19/18 I own six of these cameras and have the premium package for viewing.  I have noticed a pattern.  At about the 8 month to 1 year level, the batteries begin to go bad and won't hold a charge.  I returned 2 of these to Netgear and got refurbished units.  Now 2 additional ones have the same problem  Netgear tech support kept me on the phone for half an hour with an extraordinary set of steps to try and reset the camera/battery but nothing worked.  They were responsive. I believe there is just a product issue that causes the batteries to go bad after a year due to the pattern that I have seen on 4 of the 6 cameras I own.  Netgear sells replacement batteries for 60 bucks so that makes up 40% or more of the price.  Not sure I would go this route again if I had to do it over and am dropping my 4 stars to 3.
title: Really nicely designed product but you need at least 3 to make them effective.  Batteries last about a year

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: mjunk
content: After watching some YouTube reviews I decided to go with Arlo over Nest.  While Arlo is cheaper and wireless it could be amazing with some improvements. Pros Setup is amazingly simple.  Was setup in less than 10 min. Wireless works really well and they have great range.  Bought a wireless extender when I ordered it, didn't need it 7 days free online storage on up to 5 cameras Tons of assessories available like skins, chargers (including a solar panel) and mounts Movement notifications arrive quickly to your phone Siren is very loud Sensitive microphones Very modern look to the cameras System can be customized by createing recordin rules.  Like turn on other cameras if movement is detected, each camera can start recording on sound or motion, system can be setup on a timer, geofence or constantly on. Good battery life Cons Motion detecting is my biggest gripe.  You need to be fairly close and detection only works when traveling across the field of view. I ended up spending more than half a day moving cameras around, making many holes in my house and porch to find a decent location. I then needed to crank the sensitivity all the way up to be somewhat happy with the results. Along with motion detecting the startup lag needs to be cut in half.  Most of the time I could walk past the camera and all it would capture was the back of my head.  I could walk right up to my house and through the door before it would start recording (most of the time it didn't even start).  However upping the sensitivity somewhat helped but the trade off is more notifications from animals, birds and leaves.  Also positioning the camera off center like in a corner helped (so objects are more traveling across the field of view).  I want to capture someone coming at the camera not the side or back of his head. Video quality could be increased. It's a little grainy and is even worse when zooming. The app needs some fine tuning. Setting up the cameras I needed to constantly restart the app because it froze or dropped access to the cameras.  Also some features like sensitivty are buried and difficult to find. Online support needs to improve.  While troubleshooting the motion detecting issue I found SEVERAL people had the same problem.  Tech support constantly pushed people to documention based on a previous version of the app.  The app had been overhauled and many of the settings are now located somewhere else. The system forces you to upgrade firmware and app so having that older documention available is confusing and frustrating. Overall I think with some tweaks and upgrades Arlo could dominate the competition but right now it's just satisfactory. Because of the motion detecting flaws I'll need to order another 2 or 3 cameras to get the coverage I would like.  I'm torn on spending the addition money, waiting for the next upgrade hoping the issues get addressed or returning everything.
title: Could be amazing with some improvements

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: PegLeggedPirate
content: I had an unknown visitor trying different doors at my house which is why I started researching surveillance systems  I already have an alarm system but I wanted video evidence if ever needed.  I will start by saying I purchased the Arlo Pro system and was going to return it because I was worried about the video quality.  I loved all the other features (free 7 day online recording, local USB recording, app integration, tons of features to customize how you want it to record, etc.), but I was still worried about the image quality after watching some online reviews.  After going back and forth about whether I wanted to install a hard wired system, I decided just to keep the Arlo and give it a try since it would be a hassle to try to run any kind of hardwired system to where I needed cameras, plus most hardwired systems don't notify you of anything, so unless you know to look, you will never know. I am happy to say I am glad I kept the Arlo system.  While it provides everything I was looking for, the only negative is the video is not as clear as I would like, but I would say for the most part it does the job just fine. Here are some of my tips to get the best quality video possible: 1) Set up the recording quality in the settings to best (obviously). 2) Keep the cameras and base station as close as possible.  My base station is probably 15 feet away from both cameras. 3) Position the cameras so they record as little movement as possible.  What I mean is when it starts recording, if it is aimed at an area with lots of external movement (bushes, shrubs, leaves, anything that can move) it can get pixelated due to data transfer.  The more still the background, the higher quality your images will appear.
title: Great setup but know it's limitations before buying.  Please read till the end.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Arbi V. Karapetian
content: I love these ARLO Pro cameras. They are easy to use, easy to install, and they work.  The following are improvements that would make this system great! 1. The application is not as great as it can be. I would allow multiple on-off scheduling on the same day, and the ability to use different cameras for specific events in custom modes. 2. Because you cant do "keep out zones" with IR motion detection, and the IR motion detection is limited to about 20 feet of range, I would encourage ARLO/Netgear to build and sell stand-alone IR motion detectors that trigger cameras.  That way, we can place independent motion detectors where the camera range is not able to reach, and trigger one or multiple cameras. 3. it would be great to boost the resolution to 1080dp. 4. The IR illumination for night-time are weak.  I know on a battery operated camera it is a compromise, but it would be great to give the customer the option to select really strong illumination, or battery saving mode.  For my application, the cameras are pretty much useless at night, which isnt great. Other than the above improvements, I think the cameras are great. They are easy to mount, easy to install, easy to use, and easy to setup. And, lets not forget the free storage for video. This is huge. This is the main reason I chose this system over the google NEST.
title: I love these ARLO Pro cameras

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Sam
content: Looks like "Arlo" but arrived in very basic wrapping with the wrong cable to charge it. It plugged in fine but kept sending a notice that charger was not compatible. Then it would not completely charge on a cable that came with my other Arlo cameras. I should have sent it back but was leaving on a trip. It charges but not completely. It was a few dollars cheeper but appears to be a lower quality. Not sure if it's a knock off but my other cameras are better night vision and charge with no problem.
title: Charger problems

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Henry
content: I've been a fan of the original Arlo (I had 3 of them), sadly 2 of them no longer works because they fell off the mount from 2nd floor.  Now that I've finally found the perfect mount (Grifiti Nootle Magnetic Camera Mount), I thought it's time to upgrade to Arlo Pro (not Pro 2, just the original Pro)  You'll notice the camera seems to be larger and it's now rechargeable out of the box (no more swapping those expensive batteries)  If you have the original Arlo Base you're good to go, sync it up and setup is a breeze.  The video quality is much better (at least during the day)  Sadly night vision is still crap in my opinion.  I also noticed if I change the power management to "Best battery life" I can get by almost a month before it needs a recharge.  The only thing I did notice in the Pro that I did not have an issue with before is there are times when it gets "too hot" and it will not function till it cools off.
title: Arlo Pro battery lasted almost a month

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: DJ AM
content: Unfortunately, I had high hopes for this product. It is, as advertised, easy to set up and easy to use. The mobile app, while a bit of a maze in some portions, is quite user friendly and quick. However, all of these niceties are completely useless since the video quality is terrible. The product description and the "tech support" say that the video quality is 780p. This is false. It is no better than VGA quality. You would not be able to identify a person in your front yard, day or night, unless you knew them or they were wearing a t-shirt that had their name on it in very large letters. You may as well forget trying to read the license plate of a car that is parked outside your home. Security cameras are only useful if the video can help the police catch the perpetrators. If you just want to know that someone broke into your car that is parked in your driveway, I'm sure you will have found that out by the broken glass the next morning and don't need an Arlo to show you useless video of a fuzzy blob breaking your window and driving away in another, more square shaped fuzzy blob. The attached photo is of a van parked, literally, in front of my house. A would-be robber would park no closer and you can barely make out the Chevy logo, much less the license plate number. Some will say that my base station isn't close enough to the camera or that my internet is too slow or that my expectations are too high. To those, I say that my camera is no farther than 20 feet, my internet is fiber optic (capable of 300mbps down/300mbps up), and my expectations are that a camera show us something useful. The call into tech support was equally as useless as the Arlo itself. The person who answered the call said that the video looked pretty good and that the fuzziness is 720p. Oh well, here's another product I'll be shipping back to Amazon...
title: Terrible Video Quality - Buy Something Else!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: ssk101
content: These cameras work so very well and the clarity is great.  Have installed these in a vacation house and just love checking in on it from time to time from my computer at home.  If you have a USB power source nearby that works even better since you can leave the camera plugged in and there is no worries about charging the battery.  Plus, the backs of the cameras are magnetic. We have a huge secure metal wall art piece on our lanai and just "stuck" the camera to the wall art (it even blends in very well), plugged it into a nearby socket - and there you go!  Did not even need to mount the mount.  Am getting great pictures.  We bought one of the screw in mounts for the front of the house and mounted it above the roof line and now we can see the front door.  This one is on battery power only and we will see how long the battery lasts before we need to recharge.  We can just run a line to that camera and recharge the batteries without taking it down.  Haven't done this yet and not sure how long it will take to recharge, but it seems very simple to do.  However, will need to purchase a second charger and USB cable since the two cameras only come with one each.  Understand these are very reasonably priced items.  These are a really good buy and would recommend this camera system to anyone.
title: What a Great Camera System

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: AMontcri
content: I am loving my Arlo Pro 3-camera setup!  Within 20 minutes of arriving, I had the cameras setup and ready to go.  The batteries come completely charged, so there was no delay in getting it up and running.  The ease in which you setup your account, pair the cameras to the base, and then use the "positioning mode" to assist you in setting them up is wonderful.  Keep your phone with you, and the Arlo App on, so you can adjust the camera view without needing any help. Pros: - Up to 5 cameras can be added free with 7-day rotating schedule. No huge subscription fees unless you want "more". - Batteries are fully charged out of the box. - Cameras "sip power" from the batteries.  I still have a full charge after a week of positioning, playing, and even using the two-way communication feature! - Love the fact that I can talk on the camera.  It makes my puppy happy to hear my voice. - Setup and pairing is simple and easy to follow. - Firmware upgrades are a breeze (There was one immediately following pairing that installed in minutes and was painless.) - Build quality is excellent. - Image quality is excellent, even from a distance of 20+ feet. - Nighttime image quality is also very good, even at distance. Cons: - Mounting cups don't allow for enough freedom of positioning to eliminate ceiling from the frame. - At the start of some 10 second videos, the video has a very visible green hue to it.  It disappears rapidly, but is a bit annoying. - Motion sensing can not be turned on and off individually for each camera; you either have them all on, or all off. - There are rubber "plugs" covering the ports on the base of each camera.  Two are snug, but the third is so loose it won't stay in.  This might compromise the integrity of the camera if it gets wet. - Magnetic cups are cool, but they could be improved by putting a rubber backing on them.  This would help keep the mount tight to the wall after the single-screw key-hole mounting. - The scheduling tool is powerful, but a bit klunky to work with.  After a couple of days playing with it, I think I have a nice rounded-out schedule. - The setting of the duration of the motion capture doesn't work in schedule mode.  It would be really handy if it did. - With cameras both inside and outside, it would be great to have them individually configurable. Notes: The trouble positioning the camera on the magnetic cups is due only to the fact that the bottom of the camera bumps into the bottom of the disk when tilting it down.  The mounts don't stand off the wall enough.  I solved this problem by purchasing some inexpensive post mounts with infinite positioning capability. I also picked up some awesome "skins" for the cameras that were black.  It makes them much more weather hearty.  They have a nice hood on the front to help keep down lens flare and debris from the lens.  They also help you hide the cameras, especially the exterior ones. I would love a way to tag/name videos so i can refer back to them later.  Sure we can download the video and store it locally, but tagging them would help me identify periods in my schedule that I need to refine.
title: A wireless video setup that is easy to use, quality built, and consumer friendly!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Jay L
content: This is a great system. I use a camera outside my front and back door. The video quality is pretty good. The system is rather easy to set up and install. The app also works well. I have zero complaints! The best thing is there are 100% no wires/cables from the camera to the base unit! *I would like to add that since having this system for a few months, I purchased the arlo outdoor power adapter. It has since been removed from amazon I have had nothing but problems. While having the power adapter plugged into a weatherproof GFCI receptacle the camera went bad. It heated up and shut off multiple times. Now the camer will not charge a battery and will not connect to the system. I have googled this issues and I have seen pictures of other owners who’s cameras have melted! This could be a serious fire hazard. I have been talking to Netgear’s customer support and they have been helping me resolve the issue. I had to drop my original rating down to two status because I have been without a functioning camera for some time.
title: Great system!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: t
content: Bought these and used for just a year. Battery life has completely depleted. Batteries will not work for more than 1 WEEK!! Do not buy! product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: JL
content: I bought the Arlo Pro I have had the system for a week now. It seems to be working just fine. Set up was really super easy.  I really wanted something completely wireless (I live in two log cabins and needed coverage for both cabins) and after my research found this was pretty much the top of what was out there. I am please so far. The clarity of the pictures are incredible.  It also alerts you for any movement which is very nice.  I am using this outside only. Although it would also be a great indoor camera if you wanted one. Another thing that is great about these cameras is how easy you can move them from place to place. They come with excellent mounts however, I did purchase additional ones for I wanted them on poles/trees.  I also bought skins for them for I wanted them hidden. The reason I rated it a 4 star instead of a 5, is I was looking for two very different things in the camera.1). catching wildlife pictures, 2).  just over all security.  The security part is great, the wildlife not so good. That part however is my fault for I do not have or leave on any outdoor lighting at night and the reach of the camera is not far enough. I really need a camera just for that. I would not hesitate to purchase this system. At first I thought it was too much money but then I realized for the product, clarity, etc...it really is very inexpensive. Plus the cost of being locked into a contract for 3 years. I love the fact it comes to my phone and emails me. Hope this review helps! Just Go for Arlo Pro!! :>)
title: It seems to be working just fine. Set up was really super easy

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Jordon M
content: After installing and using the Arlo cameras for about a week, I can say I feel confident with my purchase.. The cameras are very easy to use and install, and they work better at night or in the dark than I anticipated. The one thing I wish they would have is a recognition system in place. By this I mean, instead of being alerted for any motion Arlo detects, it would be nice to be alerted if Arlo detected a person. I live in an area with lots of feral cats, and they are constantly setting off the cameras, which is sometimes annoying but at least I know they work. Batteries will last much longer than I expected, but I'm sure it depends on how much motion your camera will pick up. You can also set the sensitivity on the motion sensors,  unfortunately this won't solve my cats setting off the Motion sensor issues. Highly recommend, worth the money. (P.S. The siren is very loud)
title: Great Security Cameras for the price

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: GENE
content: 1. Well first the battery worked for about 2 weeks befored needing to be charged Now the battery needs to be charged every 3 days as one day with 10 clips drains the battery 25-30% 2. The arlo camera does not record a lot of footage it will catch some occasionally coming up to the door and never leaving 3. You cannot view your usb storage of videos unless you disconnect the USB drive and connect it to a computer, which ruins the whole point of a wireless and remote monitoring 4. There is no warning of when your arlo is disconnected or powered off that alerts or logs for security
title: Ehhh

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Alex Young
content: As a member of the law enforcement community I cannot say enough about having home security. But not all of them offer the same thing. Arlo Pro is one of the best and most convenient systems out there if you don't want to pay a third party to watch your home. I have set up my entire system, several cameras, in less than an hour.  I receive text messages and email alerts any time my cameras sense motion or sound (depending on the feature you enable, both if you want). All of the cameras are 100% wireless, meaning you can put them in positions that most camera systems would require a ton of time, effort, and wire. The sky is the limit with these cameras, some of mine are in trees 20 ft above the ground. I have had mine operating for a little over a week and all batteries still read 100%. Some people report having their cameras last 6 months before needing to charge their batteries. All results seem to be dependent on settings. I would strongly recommend the Arlo pro camera over any other wireless system. Arlo offers 7 day cloud storage for free (meaning it writes over itself every 7 days) no one else seems to offer that feature, non that I have found. The day time image is excellent and the night time images are very close in quality. If you are looking for a system that outshines most other systems and sets up within an hour then Arlo is for you!!!
title: Best system for your buck

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Alfred M.
content: ****UPDATE **** DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME and MONEY. SECOND REPLACEMENT SYSTEM RECEIVED -LIKE THE ORIGINAL SYSTEM, THE CAMERA WOULD NOT SYNC WITH BASE STATION.  At least my old Canary camera worked for a little while -this piece of junk won't even complete a basic setup procedure. A system this expensive should work right out of the box.There must be  design flaw in the bluetooth link between the base stations and camera. Maybe susceptible to interference or the signal strength is too weak. If it won't sync to a camera sitting on top of the base station on two brand new systems it clearly has a design flaw. ***Earlier post on initial system: Had the Canary which was never reliable and stopped working altogether after a few months. Decided to try ARLO PRO based on reviews. So far I've been unable to get the camera to sync to the base station. Went through all the step dozens of times. title: (NO) Help line - claims the battery is bad and are sending a replacement before additional ...

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Gerardo Chavez
content: I recently had some valuables($1000 worth) stolen out of my car. Now it seems the thief has become more ambitious, sneaking into my backyard taking a pair of tires. The Arlo Pro made the most common sense because it is wireless. I didn't have to spend my money and time destroying my home(two-story home) by drilling holes for a bunch of cables. I have been able to place my two cameras exactly where I need them. I set up a schedule for the cameras to turn on/off and will help conserve more battery. So far, the detection sensors on the cameras have been working correctly and triggering fast enough to capture the image. The 720p resolution gives you enough detail to get job done, but I would really prefer 1080p. My only major disappointment, is not with the camera system, but the outdoor screw mount. The mounts are short and not flexible enough to get that 100% perfect angle. Everything is working so great that I just order a third Arlo Pro camera for a blind spot on the side of my house. Make your move thief, I'll be watching!
title: Gets the job done

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Brent
content: These work well! This an add on device for my system I have owned for almost a year now. This is the 5th camera for my system. The  system really works well and the cameras are very much weather proof. The software is easy to use and the cloud system Netgear has setup is the reason I bought the system. I like the no monthly expense option. I really like the Geofencing option that automatically arms the system when I drive a preset distance from my house. I also like the fact you only have to charge these about 3 times a year , depending upon you settings. These are easy to setup and maintain. There are few things to consider before you buy these. This system is not 100% perfect. Kind of expensive compared to other products that have hit the market over the last year. Don't expect these to work at temperatures under 10. The lithium batteries simply do not work at low temps. There is a slight delay on these. You don't always catch the action that triggered these cameras.
title: Good option for easy security monitoring.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Poorty
content: I recently had the misfortune of ordering the Netgear Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security system for my home. Step one of getting it installed is to sync the cameras with its base station. However, that just would not happen. I called Amazon and Netgear Tech Support and they came to the conclusion that it was a defective product and asked me to return it. I returned it immediately and ordered a new one. And guess what!!! The new one that arrived also would not sync and was defective. I have never had such an experience on Amazon where even a replacement product turns out to be defective. Looks like Netgear has given up on testing their products before shipping them out. I have lost all faith in the brand Netgear and have also stopped buying Netgear switches at work. Shame on you, Netgear!
title: Junk - Does not work

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Buyer
content: I purchased the Arlo Pro camera set to secure my backyard patio.  The Arlo was excellent in detecting motion and alert notification for  5 months (until March 8, 2019).  Then it stopped detecting motion and alert notification. I checked my ‘settings’ and there was a statement “No Arlo Plan.”  After researching online, I discovered Arlo had established a subscription plan.  If I had known the product would require monthly subscription, I wouldn’t have purchased.  However, I subscribed and the camera only dectected motion or sent alerts while the base and camera were 2 feet apart.  After contacting Arlo, and assisted by 2 online technicians- still not working.  Nevertheless, I requested a refund for subscription and will be stuck with a camera that is only good for “live viewing.”
title: Arlo Pro False Advertisement

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: John
content: I bought these cameras to replace the Samsung cameras I purchase less than a year ago.  I had looked at these Arlo Pros at the same time but was concerned about the batter life, so I bought the Samsung; that was one costly mistake.  While on vacation this past summer I lost video on two of my 6 cameras and was not able to gt them back on line until I got home because I physically press buttons on the camera.  Now one of the two subject cameras plus an other camera are dead.  These Arlo Pros are awesome. I wish I would have bought them to begin with.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Roxy
content: The camera takes great video, we mainly use it to watch the wildlife in our yard.  Setting up the motion detection is a little tricky sometimes I am looking at a fox on video in the middle of my screen but it did not pick it up coming into view.  Customer service is awesome !  I had trouble with my camera 2 years after I purchased it and they sent me a new one at no cost. it is now 3 years old and  My cat ate my power cord for the base and when  I notified them asking where I could purchase one they sent me one at no cost. Great company and great camera  only negative is it stops working in below 0 weather.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: BenZ
content: We have a wired surveillance system installed about 5 years ago but found the ARLO Pro advertisement quite inviting to own due to its trouble-free features as wire-free, High Definition video output of 720p, sensitivity to motion and lighting, night vision, battery power good for 2 months or more for each charging and provision for a 7-days cloud storage during its lifetime plus a USB storage connected to the base station. Having installed the system just a few days ago, felt some instant satisfaction and joy but still in the process of fine-tuning settings for the activity zones, motion sensitivity and critical location for the installation around the perimeter of the house. How I wished I could have acquired the PRO2 which may have been a better model. Otherwise, if the features don't differ too much aside from the 1080p resolution, I feel that my choice for the PRO is nothing to worry at.
title: Capturing Every Moment

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: V. Smith
content: Someone was dumping trash in our backyard so we needed a camera to catch them and to dissuade anyone else from coming on our property. This little thing is fairly easy to set up, it holds charge amazingly, as it should for its high price. It’s been four days and the battery only dropped today. I don’t know how long it will take to recharge though so I’m a little wary about that. Looks like some neighborhood kids were using our garage as a smoke shop, it was great to use the two way audio to let them know the jig was up. I do not like that sharing the app and alerts with family members has been tedious, timeconsuming and very user unfriendly, as it keeps asking me to set up and sync a new camera. Also the volume on the two way audio mic is very low. It has to be dead of the night quiet in order for the person you’re talking to to hear you.  But other than some few hiccups I’m very happy with the purchase. Update: March 2019 Had some troubleshooting issues and had a hard time getting in touch with customer service but they were ultimately able to help me resolve my mechanical issue
title: Great little gadget

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: A E D III
content: Bought this with the intention of putting some cameras outside and some inside. Unboxing was pretty straightforward, everything was laid out and labeled well. The instructions are very clear and easy to follow. Within about 15 minutes I had the base station setup and connected to my network and the 6 cameras all sync'd up. Mounting the cameras is also easy. It comes with 1 outdoor mount and more than enough magnetic mounts. Setting up the software is also easy. You can name the cameras and put them in any order you want. You can also setup different modes for arming and disarming the cameras, setting up motion detection, alerts, and more. Picture quality is very good, as is audio quality. So far very happy with this system.
title: Easy setup, Nice picture quality, works well!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Janice
content: Although it has taken me a while to set up things, I really love it.  Fantastic quality of the photos and I'm impressed by all the changes that can be made so that it covers the right area, distance and there are lots of choices on how to set it. It's best to read all the instructions and find out about all the changes that you can make.  I like the magnetic mounts but I have ordered the other mounts as they will help me to get the cameras in just the right place.  I like it so well that I ordered another camera and I'll put one inside the house and only activate it when I am gone.  The other 2 cameras are outside...one in front and one in back.
title: Takes a while to set the paramaters, but I love it

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Debka
content: I purchased Arlo after reviewing many candidate systems both wired and unwired.  I am satisfied that I made the right choice.  I like the technical architecture of Arlo with a dedicated base station, and the control via an app on my iPhone.  I had no trouble whatever enabling the system.  I found mounting and aligning the camera to be easy due to the magnetic bracket and the ability to see what the camera sees live on the iPhone.  The only reason I am not giving Arlo a five is that geofencing does not work for more than one Arlo-enabled phone, making that very desirable function unusable in a multi-person household.  Netgear acknowledges this as a known bug but there is no committed time for resolution.  Subsequent post:  I had a problem with the connection of my base station to my router.  A very knowledgeable Netgear advisor was able to help me resolve this by opening three ports on my router.  And lo and behold, it fixed the geofencing with two iPhones problem too.  As the service agent commented "what you did is more than most customers are able"  So yes,  problem is resolved for me but only with some technical networking expertise.  Netgear still needs to make this easy.
title: I am satisfied that I made the right choice

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Archer Koch
content: I love everything that this system is supposed to be. I'm not going to rehash all of the flexible features -- they're great and they work pretty reliably (although you need to be a bit tech-savvy to really make the most of the system). The HUGE problem is that the recorded videos have MAJOR issues. My videos from four different cameras are plagued with god-awful artifacts and video freezing. I'm a tech analyst and I've tested range, signal strength, resetting, etc. These are well-known issues that Netgear seems intent on ignoring. I have very little confidence that my videos are really going to prove helpful if/when I need them. I've been holding my breath that Netgear would release an update to fix this; but the one update they've released in the couple of months that I've been a customer only seemed to make matters worse.
title: Cutting to the chase...

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: D. E.
content: What a headache.  Two of the four cameras in my system have been replaced as "defective" by the manufacturer, but getting any semblance of help out of Arlo/Netgear customer service is beyond ridiculous.  The camera's quality and features are nice, but the reliability and support just isn't there to back up the product.  There's no peace of mind when you go to check on the security of your home and see "IT'S TIME TO CHARGE YOUR BATTERY" on a camera that has less than a day of use from being fully charged.
title: Not worth the hassle

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Steve D.
content: The Arlo system can't be any simpler to install. Connect the base station, pair, then mount the cameras.  Aesthetically It's a good-looking unit as well and I love the magnetic mounts.  I have high winds in my area and it did not budge.  One issue is with the mobile app.  It crashes and lags when there is a motion trigger notification and you try to open it.  Counter productive for a security system at least for real find security.  There is room for improvement as well.  1080p option for external cameras would be nice or less compression on the 720p it currently uses.  Especially when using external storage.  One last small request the speakers on the cameras are not nearly loud enough.  That being said I still recommend arlo.  A couple software updates can resolve two of my issues then I will give it 4 stars.
title: Aesthetically It's a good-looking unit as well and I love the magnetic mounts

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: DH
content: I have had the Arlo Pro 6 camera system for almost 6 wks, & it worked fairly well (except for occasional glitches) until yesterday (5/27/18). However, since yesterday, I have had very, very inconsistent & unstable access to the Arlo app & website, thus rendering this very, very expensive system almost USELESS. Netgear recently warned Arlo users about "suspicious activity," & told us all to change our passwords, which I promptly did. This leads me to wonder if the Arlo Server has been hacked or infected with malware. Given that my personal Privacy & Security MAY be terribly compromised at this point, I would NOT recommend that ANYONE purchase an Arlo system until Netgear has completely & thoroughly resolved this matter AND provided it's customers with a quick & thorough explanation of WHAT WENT WRONG! I am very rapidly losing confidence in Netgear's ability to provide adequate security, stability, & system access to it's customers.
title: Unreliable Access To Arlo App & Website

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Alexander Piller
content: I've already had one battery that will not recharge the batteries go through very fast I've only had them a little over a month and I've had to change out all 5 camera batteries already in the living room I have to change it Out 3 times because of the motion that's being recorded I could only imagine if you had continuous recording how fast these batteries would need to be recharged I am completely surprised that one of the batteries has already been dead to the point where it will not recharge either these cameras are not worth the money they were $900 for the system 5 cameras with the base good picture quality the audio's okay there is a bit of a lag but overall pretty disappointed
title: Fair cameras but not worth the money

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Louisiana Sunshine
content: I purchased this camera 2 weeks ago. I have not been able to get it to work. At first, I thought the battery was the problem and felt that customer support confirmed that after a series of tasks I was asked to do. Then, I purchased a new battery while waiting for the replacement battery (which has not arrived), and that battery also does not work with the camera. The batteries are both fully charged when they are inserted into the camera. The only way that the camera will work is if it has the battery in it and it is connected to a power source with the USB cord. It's very frustrating because I have contacted support and cannot get a straight answer out of them.
title: Camera does not work; customer support not responding

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Eduardo Almeida
content: I liked in the beginning arlo to not need cable but I was very disappointed the moment I needed. I integrated with Alexa and one night arlo detected some movements. I asked echo show to connect and I saw someone running away my backyard. So I tried to watch the recording and..  no recording! I then discover that is "by design" that once you ask to watch live, including the app, any recording is stopped and lost!!! you can then start the recording again (in the app), but you probably already lost whatever you were trying to record.... To me it is a very poor design lose a capture that could be important. Motion detector is not best and very common for the amazon delivery guy be catch already in the back going away, after delivery the package. Another thing is that you cannot have more than 5 cameras on the same base without subscribe to a plan.... Anyways, there are a lot of things to improve... I might consider one with cable as it is default....
title: Many points for improvement!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: S.K.
content: When I bought this system for my wife, we were both very happy. The build quality was excellent. The system went up quickly and syncing with the base unit was simple enough. That’s where the good stuff ends. The app is extremely buggy. On my wife’s iphone and iPad, the app rarely connects. It’s spotty at best on mine.  Despite saying two users can view content at the same time, it’s simply not possible. If the power or cable goes out, the base unit doesn’t find the camera when everything comes back on. That is not very useful when you are out of the house. I missed my return window and I am sad that I did. I had hoped Netgear would pull it together and we’d be left with an amazing product. That never happened and probably never will. If I could return it, I would. I don’t like it and the constant attention of rebooting the base unit to connec to the camera is an absolute deal breaker. DO NOT BUY.
title: Needs TONS of improvement.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Musa
content: I was very disappointed to find out that the batteries on these cameras DO NOT LAST 4-6 months like they proudly proclaim in their product info. The first 2 times I had to recharge them after 2 days, after that, after five days. Huge waste of time. Imagine having to pull camera down every time to recharge. Also, trying to retrieve live video on the computer was a hassle. Having to click like seven different times and getting the constant message "You need an updated version of Flash from HERE.
