product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: JCnNoCo970
content: I purchased a 2-camera system (Arlo Pro cameras + base station) for remote monitoring of an elderly parent at their home.  Also purchased 1 Arlo Pro2 (add-on) camera for the benefits of better spec features (viewing angle, resolution, advanced features) to watch the outdoor yard area of the home. My decision on Arlo system vs other brand(s) was 1) slightly better costs of Arlo system; 2) wireless (battery) power capability; 3) 7-day recording history included w/o subscription. My feedback after 1st month of installing and using the system: - The initial 2-camera system setup was easy and had no problems; - Adding the 3rd Arlo Pro2 camera to the system was a different story; * The Pro2 camera would not successfully complete the initial firmware update; * This caused the whole Arlo system to 'lock up' and finally had to do a full reset of the base station and start over initializing, naming, adding and setup of all cameras again; - Disappointed by the video quality of these cameras; * Initial Video Settings on "Optimized" for better battery life, but little to no quality improvement using "Best Video" setting after running the cameras on connected power; - Other than slightly wider viewing angle for the Arlo Pro2 vs Pro, not seeing any real differences for the extra costs of the Pro2. The Pro2's more advance features requires subscription, which defeats my reason for choosing Arlo. - On any given day, randomly and intermittently the system is Offline when I've tried to check the video; * Not only the live view is offline, but also no recordings take place during these 'outages'. * It is NOT a problem with internet because luckily I decided to go with a Nest Hello for the doorbell and it has operated flawlessly never missing a beat on the exact same system; All 3 Arlo cameras show full strength wifi signal connection with the base station also; * The system returns to 'Online' status without any actions, sometimes within minutes, sometimes hours; Not exactly reassuring for remote security monitoring nor when wanting to check-in on an elderly person; - Battery life inconsistent; Although I have since wired my cameras for power as always intended, I can offer my experience of the initial wireless battery usage since that is why most people would choose Arlo; * My indoor located Arlo Pro camera used about 15% battery / week; "Optimized setting, Nightvision IR "OFF"; Approx 30-40 motion triggered video recordings / day; * My outdoor located Arlo Pro camera used about 10% battery / week; "Optimized" setting, Nightvision IR "OFF"; Approx 10-15 motion triggered video recordings / day; * My outdoor located Arlo Pro2 camera used about 30-35% battery / week; "Optimized" setting, Nightvision IR "OFF"; Approx 10-15 motion triggered video recordings / day; - Based on that initial usage on wireless battery setup, my Arlo Pro cameras would have required recharging about every 5-6 weeks, and the Arlo Pro2 about every 2-3 weeks to avoid low battery levels; - As would be expected, the more times a camera is triggered and transmits video to the base station, and/or the more you live stream view the camera video, the more battery power that is used and faster battery draining; - Also, using the IR LED's for nightvision eats up battery power even faster, and most advanced features are only available when the cameras are directly wired to power plus the having extra subscription services activated; - Bottom line from my impression and experience so far; + Having some recording history provided no additional costs is a bonus for the Arlo system; - However, present random system "Offline" problem is a reliability issue for monitoring / security; + Overall, the system is okay for basic home monitoring (when it works); - True wireless (battery) installation is disappointing, especially for Pro2 camera, since that is why many people would choose the Arlo system over other direct-wire powered systems; - Video quality disappointing; my cheap 720p webcam video quality is noticeably superior to the Arlo cams; - The frequent user complaints and reviews about system problems and firmware should taken into consideration for purchase decisions; - Since I always planned to direct-wire my cameras for power anyway, I now would have gladly paid more for a different system for better video quality and reliability for my particular situation, even if addtnl subscription fees required.
title: Disappointed overall; Marginally useful for remote home monitoring

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Scott G Lively
content: I have had this system for about 3 years now .. everything has been great .. until about 3 weeks ago when my cameras stopped loading.. after a firmware update... I even borrowed someone else’s base station to see if that would fix the problem.. it was older so it did not have the firmware update one it and the cameras worked perfect so I bought this second base station originally to replace my original base station thinking it had maybe been fried in a power blink .. I use my system as a nanny camera .. only live feed to check in on the kids through out the day with the nanny ... however it doesn’t work .. I have made several calls to Arlo and it’s always the same story .. take the batter out and replace it and re sync the cameras .. well I have 6 and to 4 times a day get a ladder and take the batter out and re sync each one is ridiculous.  I even hooked up second base station in order to divide the work load of the base .. no help.. I highly do not recommend unless you want a useless expensive nanny cam that works once a day.
title: Expensive and doesn’t work

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Susan E.
content: I have had my cameras for about 2 weeks now and so far they are pretty stinkin awesome! The picture clarity (both day and night), audio, tiny size, and versatility of being cordless have been perfect for what I need. I have not had to recharge the batteries yet and I have them active all night and most of the day (they are still running off of the factory charge!!!!). I love how I am sent an instant notification on my phone and email when motion and/or audio is detected. I also appreciate that I don't have to pay anything for a week's worth of storage and can put anything I want to save past that on a USB. I was leery of the 10 second snippets worrying that it might not catch everything but as long as there is motion, it will keep taking more 10 second snippets one right after another. Plus you always have the option to watch live. My only complaint is that there is a slight lag time between motion detection and recording but I have really only noticed it when it's in night/dark mode (a cat set it off by walking up to it but all I saw was midway through the cat rather than it's face). These cameras have really given me the piece of mind I needed after my car was stolen out of my driveway.
title: Has it all!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Chris R.
content: I shopped, I searched and I found exactly what I needed. I purchased Arlo Pro and I love it. I loved it so much I bought a second camera and received two days later. Arlo is so nice, the picture is fantastic,  it has sound and I can pick it up and place it anywhere in the house. Arlo 1 is for my office door and Arlo 2 gets to take adventures throughout the house, wherever he is needed, even keeps an eye on things outside. I bought one stationary mount for night watch and the removable magnet mount is great, I placed screws in a couple conveinant locations and the magnet mount becomes moveable as well. This little security system is great, I was hesitant on the price but now I have Arlo 1 and 2 in the house and they are worth every penny. When I can afford another, I will be getting Arlo 3 and plan to get the protective skins soon to. Thanks for the wonderful product.
title: Sense of relief.. Eyem on it 😊

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: john206
content: Rather disappointed. There is a >60 second delay on live video and the quality is not great. My cheap $35-$50 p2p cams are much better, no more than 3-5 seconds delay and super sharp AND they can be panned remotely, have movement detection etc, but I do have to plug them in which is why I purchased this arlo pro because I wanted to set up where there are no wires. My internet is fine, there isn't a radio interference issue, doesn't matter which channel I choose for my wireless modem. Have gone to customer support via phone (they were very nice) but ran out of options to try. If no fix in a few days, I'll probably send it back and try something else. I'll amend this review if we find a fix
title: not as good as cheapo 2p2 cams

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Betch Green
content: Cost of setting up and running our own cameras was worth the time and effort. For the price for this bundle during cyber Monday 2017, the picture & sound quality is decent enough. Installation is easy. However, the battery life is not good. Pony up for the 4-year protection plan. We have only had 3 of the cameras in use on the outside of our farmhouse during renovations over the last year and were rotating the batteries as needed. Two of the batteries are now completely dead and will not charge. It will cost $100 to replace them - cursing myself for not going with a the protection plan as I usually do on electronics purchases over $100.
title: Get a protection plan. Batteries will not charge after a year of use.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Koobiidoobii
content: This camera set up is fantastic.  So far the app on the phone works great.  There have been only a few times where I could not connect to one of the camera for a live view.  If that happens, I just tab the app again and never really have a problem.  I have use the speaker on the app to communicate with my 7 yr old daughter at home so I know it works.  I have set up the motion sensor and works great as well.  I bought an externel pen drive to record so I don't have to pay extra to the cloud.  Will wait and see how that work out.  Need to add 3 more camera around the house.  One draw back is that they aren't cheap. Update 1/28/2018...after 7 months of use, one of the unit stop charging.  I was also not able to connect for a period of a week and then suddenly it works again.  I want to like it because it does serve my purpose.  Unfortunately, such an expensive unit not lasting a year is disappointing. Update 2/16/2018...Battery will not charge now.  This is not acceptable.  This is quite an expensive unit and I want to like it and for the most part, I do.  I like the ability to record, to monitor the house from anywhere but if the battery is not charging, what good does it do?
title: Battery will not charge after 7 months.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Amber
content: This camera system is extremely user friendly. All of the settings are at your fingertips through the app. I love the ability to customize everything to my needs. The video and audio quality has been amazing. Of course, it could be a little better (1080 please!) but overall you will get a clear image both day and night. The app has instant notification when motion is detected, and hasn't failed me yet! I especially love the fact that this system is wireless, which allowed me to place the cameras exactly where I wanted, and setup only took about 30 minutes. This was mostly due to purchasing the outdoor mounts, and having to pre-drill holes into the wood prior to screwing the mounts in. I can't believe I waited so long to purchase this set, and will definitely be adding more cameras in the near future!
title: Excellent system!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Lauren Hernandez
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. The camera works well, as long as there’s no rain, and you’re not worried about someone taking the camera off the magnetic mount. We ended up purchasing a threaded mount (separately) to make them more secure. But still a thief just needs to unscrew it- no tools required. 😞 A security screw throuch the threads would be an easy fix, but that’s not an option. The camera is “weatherproof” But the resulting picture is crap. We had thieves at our house last night, and can’t identify them worth crap. Very disappointed. I ordered some skins with a weather shield. Hopefully that will solve the issue- but If I had known about this issue in the first place, I would have purchased them in the first place- and have a clearer picture for the police! I uploaded the video from the first thief, (going into my yard) and the still is from the second thief (stealing my lights) 7 min later, when the camera had dried. We’ve had our cameras about a month. We have to recharge our driveway camera weekly. The front porch we have not yet recharged yet.
title: Good camera, if it doesn’t rain.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Chris
content: Overall it is a great camera and adds a convenience factor to any installation but there are limitations to its greatness. Pros: -Easy install and set up -Plenty of accesories to make it suit your needs -Customizable -Night vision -Motion detection -Audio detection -free basic cloud storage for 5 cameras -battery life is outstanding Cons: -Motion detection should be better -More expensive than it should be -Software glitches  are common -No way to view live camera feed on external monitor such as your tv. -Must be hooked to wifi to access cameras - cameras have to be taken down from their mounts and plugged into charger to recharge battery unless you purchase the seperate battery and charger kit for nearly $60.00 - 720 resolution is kind of grainy when trying to zoom in to identify people or things caught on cameras Overall i am happy with the purchase and hope to continue having many years of trouble free security at my home.
title: Great camera but it has its limitations

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Nic Miller
content: The cameras are great quality and picture is suficiant. My problem is the connectivity of the cameras to my base station. It’s all dependent on the quality of the WiFi in the home. I am using the router from my cable company and it has decent range. But unless I have full bars in all cameras the video feed will drop or be choppy. After calling Arlo support I realized the support team is trash. A complete wast of time. I asked about a range extender and they said the system didn’t work with range extenders. After I told them a video on their website said something different they proceeded to ask me what video? What kind of support team doesn’t even know the support content of its own product? After a lengthy time on hold they said it would work with an extender but they couldn’t tell me how to hook it up to the base station. I have figured out how to fix my situation on my own and will continue to use the system because I am not allowed to have a wired system in my building. Just remember if you have any problems with it it will fall on you to fix it because the outsourced support that couldn’t understand what I was saying has no idea how their own system works. ALSO! I have yet to figure out a way to manage individual cameras notifications with the motion activation so I have over 700 notifications in a day of the movement going on in and around my house. It’s either no notifications or all of them. That is very frustrating when you phone constantly is buzzing at work or even sitting on in my home and I know the camera sees motion because it’s me and I can’t tell it to not see me and still monitor the other cameras and send me notifications. A great product with a flawed system unless you want to purchase premium service after dropping a large wad of cash on the system itself. Overall I’m happy with the product, but not the support or system it uses. If you like being bothered 24/7 to know that someone is either breaking in or to be reminded that your using the bathroom then this is the system for you.
title: Unless support and an absurd amount of alerts

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: scott k. braman
content: go to the solar option and these are just setup and forget!! App works great - simple and easy to use and has already paid for itself by notifying me of some kids trying to get into my car, and recorded it in such clear video that it was easy to tie the kids to the incident when the cops picked them up. Simply bored teenagers, however I bet they wont be doing anything stupid around here again. Camera notified me of movement - chased them off before they even got started on stupid actions and then was the nail in the coffin when the cops picked them up and brought them back for identification.  Played the video and that shut down the "you got he wrong people" chant. Undeniable who it was..... oh well stupid hurts kids - don't be stupid!! and don't come back here - go be stupid elsewhere - its not worth it.
title: works exactly as advertised

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: no one
content: I have no clue why others are having issues with the Arlo pro.. I have been using 3 cam's for about 4 months now. No issues with any of them. I have not even needed to recharge the battery in any of the cameras. I walk in front of ea cam all the time to test its motion alerts. I get alerts on my cell within 30 sec of motion detection. Recorded video is fine. The only feature that needs work is the volume when speaking to someone at a camera. Its not loud enough. In most cases no one can here u speaking. This feature is a 1 star.  I would have given 5 stars had it not been for this. I was using Canary which is a horrible company. Those did not work at all. I got these as a replacement. I couldn't be more happy with there performance.
title: These work 100% better then Canry

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Tiptoz
content: Pros: -Super easy to set up -App works great.  Yes there is a small delay because the video has to be uploaded to a server and then downloaded to a device, but the delay is only a few seconds -battery life is very good -Arlo stores videos for 1 week for FREE!  plus you can download any pertinent videos -motion sensor is very powerful, almost too powerful Cons: -Wish it came in black or brown for more discreet placements -Voice from phone to camera doesn’t work very well We bought this system because some shady people moved into our nice neighborhood.  I was able to send enough evidence to the police that a warrant was issued and the people were arrested.
title: Clear Video, easy set up, peace of mind restored!!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Tracy Norman
content: Not happy so far. I wish I had been more forceful with customer service before the return window for these closed. Did not catch my car being broken into although the camera is aimed at the car, did not catch a kid walk up to my house windows and front door and car to harass me. Motion detector went off and wouldn’t turn off and burned up the battery while I was away from home so no survielence for a week. Customer service expects me to get up and down on a ladder 8ft high to keep doing the same things over and over to be sure it’s not a different factor  before they’ll admit the camera is defective. Stars are for free cloud and ease of use.
title: Is it the camera or the product?

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Another Shopper
content: I didn't know what to expect, except that the battery life had good reviews and there were options for cloud storage that ranged from free to paid premium. I was pleasantly surprised with how well the cameras work! The visual clarity is superb even in the balanced battery saving mode, and the notifications seem quite reliable. The presets for detection and notification worked well for me, and the scheduling mode offers a lot of flexibility for choosing presets based on time of day. The biggest surprise was the geofencing option, which works very, very well, changing modes for me when I'm about 300 feet from home. The only thing I think needs improvement so far is the lack of a solid outdoor mount in the package. These are outdoor cameras, and a magnetic mount doesn't seem like a good solution for that.
title: A pleasant surprise from a blind purchase

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: TommyT
content: The cameras provide good views but it is clear that this is 720p with regards to detail and clarity. However, the night vision is excellent.  The app firmware has issues at times when viewing live because sometimes it won't allow you to view at all and so one has to try clicking on live view again or exiting the app and try again.  I chose this system not just because how easy it was to set up, but mostly because of the free basic cloud subscription.  It's overall a better choice for me than Nest. I'm very pleased with this system, but the app has some reliability issues that need to be worked out by Netgear.
title: Very good system with some app issues

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Jen
content: Arlo recently shut down the previous app for a new one. Since that time, the cameras are basically useless. The app is required to access recorded videos and see live camera action. The new app is worthless and the manufacturer seems to be doing nothing about it. After working near flawlessly for a year (old app), the new app shows only 13 seconds of recording, despite there being activity right in front of the camera. I am also regularly unable to view recordings when I want to...they appear only after hours delay. DO NOT PURCHASE ARLO CAMERAS UNTIL THEY FIX THEIR APP.
title: Camera is useless without a well-functioning app

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: lakerunr
content: Needed another camera with no light to add to my home security already had 3 Ring spot/flood lights and one Ring door bell. Advantages over Ring: 1) Better app 2) Can control state (armed/disarmed) with SmartThings/Alexa 3) Can control recording separate form notifications 4) Triggered by motion and/or sound 5) Limited cloud storage with no subscription 6) Local storage to memory stick Disadvantages compared to Ring 1) Slower network response when viewing 2) Ring has much better video resolution/quality 3) No motion zones
title: Pretty good camera

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Dan Meier
content: The Arlo Pro has a lot of capabilities packed into a small package. Setup is easy. Image quality is quite good - even in low light. Sound is reasonably good. The motion detection trigger is reliable. And configuration options are thoughtful and worthwhile. On the down side, latency is a problem. Motion detection takes 5-10 seconds to trigger video recording...always a tradeoff here between being too sensitive (false alarms) and not sensitive enough (miss the action entirely). The "live" stream is 10-20 seconds behind "actual" live - and this over a high-bandwidth WiFi connection less than 30 feet from the hotspot. And notifications can take 1 to 10 minutes after the event to arrive. Still, the Arlo packs a lot of capabilities into a small self-contained package. It won't match the performance of wired solutions, but as long as you match expectations to reality, Arlo is a terrific, flexible solution!
title: A Lot Packed Into a Little Package

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Customer1283291
content: Rating one star due to the Arlo Pro 6 Camera Security System being defective. When viewing (live or recorded) video, there was an audible ticking noise that came through 4 out of 6 of the cameras. After spending some time on Google I found that this is a common issue with the cameras but I couldn't find any answers to fix it. I contacted Arlo's/Negear Customer Support and after going through all of the steps that I had originally done (made sure the firmware was up-to-date, restarted the system, etc.) they took control of the system (with permission) and verified the noise. They stated that they have been aware of the problem but that because it affected so many of the cameras that I should replace the whole system and send it back to the retailer (Amazon), and request a replacement. Fast forward 5 days and I've just finished re-boxing the replacement set and printing out the new return label. This time, 6 out of 6 of the cameras have the ticking noise. At least this go around I didn't mount all of them before checking their operation; however, this is the last set I'll be dealing with as I'm not going to keep sending these back hoping for a set that works.
title: Ticking noise coming from live audio as well as recorded audio. Netgear is "aware of the problem" but has no fix.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Andy PDX
content: I spent weeks researching home wireless security systems to include SimpliSafe, Nest, etc. I chose this one because it's completely wireless and the 7 days of free cloud storage. Set up was easy, 15 mins and everything was done. The base station connects direct to your router and then you sync your cams to the base station. I have both the iOS app (personal phone) and Android app (work phone) both are simple to use. I love that motion detection alerts you and captures 10 secs of video of that moment that you can access on your phone app. In addition, when leaving the house you can alarm any of the cams so it will set off a 100 decibel alarm if triggered. The magnetic mounts are fantastic, I have the mounts high up for great views of House and front entry, and you can easily position the cams to the proper viewing angle.
title: Love this system

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Skeptical Shopper
content: I purchased Pro so I could test the system and I didn't mind having one 780P camera. The 780 P camera is focused on the front door and works fine for me. So, it saves me about one hundred bucks to add cameras individually, instead of buying Pro 2 initially. There is a camera delay, but I have a long porch so by the time the person gets to the door - it starts taping. That works for me. It was easy to set up. THERE IS ONE PROBLEM: The 2-way audio does not work. So, if you are buying the camera for this function, it DOES NOT WORK. This does bug me, but there are no better options on the market right now. And I do think the pros outweigh the cons. Live View is great. All 5 of my neighbors have Arlo camera systems and love it. So, it just depends on what you are looking for.
title: TWO-WAY Audio does not work.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: tim
content: 5 months in and it won't charge. Still works because I ordered a longer wire and it is plugged in all the time, but for the price point, I had hoped I'd get more than 5 months of 100% functionality
title: quit charging after 5 months

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Southern Lady
content: I REALLY wanted to love this.  From the research we did, this system & one other had the least internet requirements, so we went with this one.  Our internet is fine for our child to play XBox live, & talk to people around the globe - but it apparently isn't good enough for this.  When you are going through the set up, we couldn't get it past "Firmware Update".  We even unplugged or turned off anything in the house that might have been using the least little internet & tried it again.  Still no.  From reading trouble shooting things after this happened, I see that we are not the only ones to have this exact problem with Arlo Pro.  Seems that the makers of Arlo should correct this issue.  We had to return it, as it was useless at our house.
title: Avoid if you don't have fantastic internet

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Al Hunter
content: The operating system of the ARLO camera security system has been seriously compromised with the latest APP update.  Much of the camera functions do not work properly if at all, and the system is basically unreliable as a security system. I suggest you check out the ARLO Community Forum Website before purchasing this product. Further, the customer service support center is located outside the USA, and although I have found them very polite, they are pretty much useless, as they are simply call takers. Buyer beware!
title: The ARLO App is poorly designed and totally incompatable with various devices and internet Browsers

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: DFilbert
content: I love every product I have ever purchased from Netgear.  So given that - plus the great reviews - I took a chance on this product.  And I am very glad I did !!  I have 4 less expensive cameras from by another major supplier that I have used for inside monitoring for some time now; and compared to my experience with them - the Arlo Pro system is far superior !!  The fact that it is battery operated makes the installation very do-a-ble.  I previously put off getting an outside camera because of the power issue.  And I half expected that to affect the wireless transmission quality of the camera !!  I previously had to hard wire my other inside cameras directly to the router because of wireless transmission errors.  But no !!  The Arlo camera is the farthest from my main router of them all - and has no latency and no intermittent wireless transmissions problems what-so-ever !!  And - I have never had a problem in a month of use with the application software on my PC or my Android phone.  It is intuitive; secure; and reliable!!  I am very happy with this system !!!
title: I love every product I have ever purchased from Netgear !!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Koveh
content: No I am not talking about the build quality touch and feel.  I am talking about how the products last.  I have had this for a few years and my base station up and died out of nowhere, completely dead.  It is hooked up to a surge protector, so I know that is not the issue.  Arlo support wouldn't replace that because it was past 1 year . Now one of my cameras is acting up and the infrared filter is stuck and shows all video in pink.  Google this and you will see hundreds of similar issues with Netgear not doing anything about it or supporting the issue.  Terrible quality in my opinion.  I own every technology thing under the sun and have never had so many problems with gear breaking within the first few years.
title: Love these cameras, but the quality and support are terrible

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: C. Rob
content: The pro is a perfect wireless solution for me.  My front door/porch is now under Arlo Pro's watch and I couldn't be happier.  Setup was quick and very easy, only thing that took some time was tweaking the viewing angle to avoid unnecessary detection.  Setup with Samsung SmartThings was straight forward and simple.  The audio capture is perfect for my needs as well.  The siren is seriously loud and a great backup alarm/alerting system. I also have a few (3) regular wireless Arlo's which also have been a great solution but I do like the Pro's motion sensor and quality slightly better. Overall extremely pleased with the Arlo Pro, for what it is and what I expected from it I give it the full 5 stars with nothing negative to say about it.
title: Arlove Pro

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Matt B.
content: Picked this up to monitor our driveway (about 50-100' down a hill from our house.  I placed the hub in the widow as close to the garage with a (almost) clear line of sight barring a couple of trees.  While I do appear to occassionally get notifications of movement from the device (delivered through the app on a recent-gen iPhone), the videos are never actually present in the "library" and cannot be viewed/verified. I've tested the camera indoors a few feet away and directly a floor above, and while it connects and does properly deliver notification with associated videos, it's connectivity is extremely inconsistent.  When attempting to view a live feed, it often doesn't connect at all.  When it does connect, the stream is 3-5 seconds delayed, and no amount of googling, moving routers and hubs, re-configuring wifi channels, etc. has had any impact. The video quality, when it works, is actually quite good, but given how flaky, unreliable and just generally frustrating this thing is, I couldn't recommend it to anyone.
title: Feels like it *should* be good... but it's not...

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Karen Osborne
content: Battery supplied went bad after 45days of use,for replacement cost of the odd shaped battery ,I for one can't pay 50.00 every 45 days for a new battery,initial setup was easy,product worked well up until the battery wouldn't charge more than 56%and depleted quickly
title: Poor battery

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Rob
content: Purchased April 2017.  One camera died before its 2 year anniversary.  What broke is the charger inside.  It will not charge the battery anymore.  I'm using the second camera to charge the battery.  Funny thing, the iphone software knew about the charge issue and told me to read a knowledge page.  This is an expensive system.  To not get more than 2 years out of it is disappointing.
title: Becomes defective soon after warranty

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: LBELBLIE
content: We bought the two-camera pack with one base and have a camera in the front of our house and the back of our house, with the base in the middle. The cameras work well when they are close to the base, but they really start to falter when more than 50 feet away from the base, even though the range is supposed to be much larger than that. Videos freeze, major movements aren't captured, and sometimes the image is partially blocked out or pixelated.  It appears the only way to resolve this issue (which is relevant if you are getting more than one camera) is to have additional bases and to have a base located close to each camera (and that means having an internet connection, whether via router or extender, in those locations). Overall, this makes the multi-camera system less efficient and more costly. It would be great if Netgear figured out a way to allow you to connect a camera to a wifi extender instead of the base itself, so you don't have to buy multiple bases.
title: Cameras good but base needs better range

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Zhassulan
content: We recently purchased 2 Arlo Pro cameras. We always wanted to have two cameras. One to watch our 1 yr old dog in the living room and another one to monitor our front door. We spent a quite a bit of time doing online research. At the end it came down to Nest and Arlo systems. One of our family members owned a nest camera and they highly recommended the unit. However we didn't like Nest because it didn't have a storage to keep recordings unlike Arlo that provided 7 day cloud storage to keep the recordings. Arlo also offers a baby monitoring camera which we would definitely add when time comes. These two factors made our decision clear. There are several useful features Arlo Pros.: - GeoFencing feature. Although it's still in a beta mode it still works well - You can rotate the camera view and install the unit upside down - Night vision works so well. The image is clear even in a pitch dark place - Long lasting battery ~2wks without charge (indoor at optimal recording quality) - Mobile app. Doesn't crash and doesn't require much updating - Super easy to install Arlo Cons.: - Batter doesn't charge with a USB extension. It requires Arlo charging adapter directly connected to power outlet I would definitely recommend Arlo systems to everyone. It's affordable and works well.
title: Arlo Pro Security System

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: mac4jac
content: Its okay but the battery life is not too good when its cold and you have to take them down to charge them. Update: 12/28/2017 Cameras are not reliable. Have had two fail. Netgear replaced them but you still have to jump through hoops and the process takes a couple of weeks so you are without a camera while you wait. You also have to pay for the return shipping. Then they Have the option to plug them in but when you do it will tell you the charging source cannot charge your battery. That happens with both the Arlo charging cable (which was recalled for being defective) or an aftermarket such as Wasserstein. It about 30°F where I am right now and one camera says charging paused because it’s too cold. Then you get false alerts and cameras while constantly record nothing or no alerts and the camera will miss activity regardless of how you set the sensitivity. Have spent about $800 on this borderline garbage.
title: Unreliable

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: KNP525
content: Bottom line: if you think you might ever have a power cut, or think that a thief could cut your power, don't buy the Arlo Pro. The system itself works fine when it's working. The app works, the cameras are easy to set up and install, and I thought everything was great for a week. Unfortunately things went down hill very quickly from there. I live in an area that suffers from tiny power cuts once or twice a month. They last less than a second, just long enough for the microwave clock to reset. I had one about two weeks after I installed my system, and it completely screwed up the base station. It had 3 solid green lights on the front, but the app and website both said my system was offline. I checked the forums and the only solution seemed to be a complete reset, which meant removing all devices from the app, re-adding the base station to the app, then taking down each installed camera and pairing it with the base again. I really didn't want to do this so I contacted Netgear support. Unfortunately they offered no better solution, and this seems like a common enough problem that the first thing they asked was "have you had a power cut recently", so I had to do it. I have the 6 camera system, so taking down each camera was very annoying to do. At this point I had already decided to return the system, but decided to keep it in place until I replaced it. Then we had another power cut about a week later and it happened again. Completely unimpressed. What kind of security system needs to be completely reset after a power cut! If I'd left for a week and this happened I'd be completely unprotected. As a side note, I could never get any cameras outside my house to work. I tried to put one camera outside my front door and as soon as the door closed, I couldn't connect to the camera anymore (base station about 15ft away, direct line of sight to the front door). I tried another in the back garden, same problem. I'm assuming it's the structure of my house, but who knows.
title: If you're looking for peace of mind, look elsewhere.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Rich
content: Very easy to set up. The app is very intuitive. It is so nice to be able to quickly check to see what happened outside or inside.  Extremely flexible. Battery lasting over a month and still have nearly 70%. Can just be set down anywhere. Can change placement anytime you feel like it.  Has a very wide view to monitor a large area.  But would need to be pretty close to really make out facial features or lic. plate with night vision.  Free week cloud storage is sooo nice.  Just plugged a FAT32 Hard drive (other drive will need formated) into USB on base and have recorded over a month and haven't even dented 500g.  Can be hours away and instantly see live video from my house plus any previous movement. So cool.
title: Functional, durable, flexible and intuitive

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Carlos
content: I use 2 Arlo Pro cameras and they work ok. My issues are that they have a huge delay from video to reality, at the very least is 3 seconds but I have counted delays up to about 30 seconds. The other thing is the app, again, it works but it is a little clunky. The geolocation feature in the app works about 50% of the time. I also use the Ring cameras in my house and they perform a lot better than these, and the app it's also years away, not to mention the Ring app keeps getting upgraded over time with new features, my Arlo cameras and app haven't gotten almost any changes since aI got them about 1.5 years ago. I am not affiliated with any of these companies, just giving my honest review.
title: Works but has a big delay.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: angela g
content: Purchased for Black Friday as part of a 4 pack for $499, and although they took closer to 8 days, not the 2 as advertised, the cameras were very disappointing. There was a 21 second delay from movement being detected to when I was able to view “live”. The perp would be long gone by then! Also, there was no way of being notified when certain areas had movement... for example, my old cameras would allow only my driveway to notify me, but not every car driving by. I would stop checking the notifications if I got a message every time a cat walked by.
title: Returned

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Disgruntled
content: What a piece of junk!  Even with the camera just a couple of feet away from the base station, in the same room with an unobstructed view, the video and sound lag so bad that the image is several minutes old.  There is no way that you are going to be able to use the two way audio to communicate with anybody.  It is junk unless you are interested in seeing what happened in the past.  The quality degrades even more when you place the camera in a different room.  Much further away than that results in a lost connection.  Do not buy.
title: Do not buy this lagging piece of junk.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: J. Wood
content: I've had an Arlo camera installed for about a week now outside just above my garage door. I must say I am impressed by how easy it was to setup and install. The battery is still at 97% even though it has recorded several videos in my driveway when someone walks by it. The only thing I would improve is the app for viewing videos. I have not found a way to select multiple videos to delete at the same time. It is likely possible and I have not found it yet. This is minor though. I recommend this camera system to anyone that wants a pain free experience setting up a security camera.
title: Impressed

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: mk
content: Arlo and Netgear are now two seperate companies Arlo did a firmware upgrade and broke it. I can't log on any longer.  I have two cameras + base.  Its totally useless now. Customer support in now non existence. Arlo and Netgear are now two seperate companies.  Hosed everything.
title: Flakey.  Arlo web page is down 3+ months cameras useless.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: TM
content: After doing exhaustive research, I settled on trying out the Arlo, primarily because I wanted a system that was both easily removable, but also had an always plugged in option (Arlo Pro comes with rechargeable batteries but can also be plugged in with a weather resistant power adapter). I also did not want to be tied directly to one "Assistant" and Arlo bridges the gap as being compatible with the three majors of Assistants. The picture quality is excellent and the battery life so far has been above expectations on the Pro edition and I have purchased about every accessory component you can imagine, which are plentiful on Amazon. I hope that Arlo releases 3 additional products so that my Arlo system can be "complete" and I do not need to add a secondary system to my setup (and allows up to 6 cameras without a monthly fee...). 1) a video doorbell, 2) video motion floodlight, and 3) a pan/tilt enabled 360 degree camera model. The Pro's picture quality is fantastic at 720P and I do not feel any push to upgrade to the 1080 or 4K models. Very happy with the experience so far. Will update this review if there are notable changes.
title: All around great system

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Brett M.
content: For anyone looking for a good quality security/video recording system, the Netgear Arlo Pro system is simply NOT up to the task.  The product itself seems well built, the video quality is good (but not great), the battery life is good, the 7 day free storage is nice, and the website/mobile app work well.  HOWEVER, the motion detection on these cameras simply does NOT work well or even reasonably well enough for it to be considered reliable.  I have other 3 year old Samsung IP cameras in my house that work far better when it comes to motion detection.  The fact that Netgear itself says motion detection on these cameras doesn't work well when coming from a front on view is telling.  I've relocated these cameras multiple times in varying degrees of heights/angles/views with varying levels of sensitivity to motion detection and no matter what I do, they simply do not record soon enough to catch motion.  You usually just get someone walking away or flashing by the camera for a brief moment.  The motion detection is TERRIBLE and how these cameras get such high ratings is a mystery to me.  The motion detection does not work reliably even at 100% sensitivity.  If you can live with that these are solid cameras but don't expect to rely on them for recording coming and goings on your property. UPDATE 11/11/2018 One of the batteries in one camera has died.  Will not charge no matter what steps I take.  Removed battery and put in a different camera and still won't charge.  $48 for a new battery.  What a scam these cameras are... stay away.
title: Simply doesn't work!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: SCbuckeye12
content: If anything is in it's view, such as cars in the driveway, it's very unreliable at picking up movement.  I've had instances where it won't record someone standing at my front door. At times will it record someone walking up my walkway but won't record the same person leaving and vice versa. If someone is moving at a fast walk, it won't pick up that person at all. It may pick-up a home invasion if the perpetrators stand in front of the camera and discuss it first but I wouldn't trust it to pick-up a threat in real-time.  It has a serious lag issue that makes this camera just like having a fake ADT sign in your yard.
title: Not Reliable

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: ret.Pet Pro
content: Never worked right now lights are on but NO ONE IS HOME!  WASTE OF MORE TIME THEN WORTH. Now Amazon has kept $50+ to restock a DEFECTIVE unit!  B.S.!  Plus I bought extra mounts $10 and 2 skins for the cameras that stopped working. This is what I get for listening to my neighbors,  Gotta have a camera to watch for the bad guys!  I had one good video of a Buck eating the birds food!  That was one Expensive Black n White 1 min. movie! Live and learn.  Be Careful what kind of Security you buy. A Doberman was my first Choice.
title: IT WILL DRIVE YOU CRAZY, And if you return cost you $50 or more to restock??

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Mark Mollenkopf
content: These cameras are junk, it won’t charge properly I have to stand there and jiggle the cord to get it to charge. It’s keeps giving a charging error and to go to some article about it but there’s no way to figure where the article is or how to troubleshoot. They disconnect from the base station randomly and the motion detection is inconsistent
title: Won’t recharge

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: lynn M.
content: purchased this to view animals who roam through the yard at night.  happy to also have visibility on the house and yard for security.  In general, we are happy so far with the camera system. However, 4 weeks after installation we removed cameras to put on the weather shields we purchased later.  We tried to charge the cameras and one of the 2 cameras would not charge. We did purchase this system new. (no instructions provided with the system, no contact info).  went on line to get a customer service # and the numbers provided for Arlo directed us to a scam operation. They attempted to charge us for a battery and for unnecessary internet security service. We almost got scammed.  We then contacted NETGEAR and they are replacing the battery free of charge, no problems whatsoever.  BEWARE that randomly searching for an Arlo C/S phone number on the web may not lead you to a valid customer service #. contact NETGEAR for service, be sure you have a valid phone number.  We alerted NETGEAR to the problem with scam phone #'s on the web.
title: Customer service issue, battery issue

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: EV EV
content: BUYER BEWARE!  I have owned Arlo Pro since 2015.  They've been working well until a few days ago.  I charged both batteries to 100%.  Not sure why but this week the battery started to drain ridiculously fast.  Within 3 days both cameras went from 100% to 4%.  This is without any recording.  I'm on the phone with them and the customer service is truly bad.  Waited 20 minutes and finally talked to a live person who asked me if I swapped the locations or batteries, which doesn't make any sense because both batteries are draining.  I finally asked to speak to a supervisor - it's been 40 minutes and so far nothing...  Don't waste your money on Arlo.
title: Battery Drains in 3 Days

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: KentB
content: Update to previous review:  The problem with being able to change the mode of the cameras was fixed one week after notifying technical support.  The cameras now work well and I recommend the system. Initial review:  I added the base station and two arlo pro cameras to an existing system of two arlo Q cameras.  The installation was straight forward and the arlo Q cameras continue to operate with full functionality.  I am able to see live images from the new arlo pro cameras but I am unable to change the camera mode from "disarm" to "arm" using the arlo app on my iPhone 8.  Arlo tech support requested that I use Safari and Chrome on my iMac and internet explorer and chrome on a windows computer.  All had the same result.  I can see the camera images but can not change the mode for the arlo pro cameras only.  At this point the tech support said this is a known issue and I would be notified when a software fix was released.  The arlo app and iPhone, iMac, and windows based computer all have the latest updates.  It has been five days since installation with no fix provided.  At this point, the new arlo pro cameras are useless as security devices.  This is disapointing in that the arlo Q cameras have worked, and continue to work well, for over a year.
title: Update:  Works now.  Initial complaint:  Unable to change mode on new Arlo Pro cameras

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Syzygy
content: The Arlo security cameras are indeed very easy to set up and use for monitoring your locations. It's amazing how great the images are and how well the home base can effectively communicate with far-flung cameras around the property. We started with 3 and once we had them and saw what they could do, we ordered 2 more. We're very impressed with battery life as with our setup, it only records when it's triggered. They do have some issues, though. The IR lights are very, very weak and do not highlight much more than 10-15 feet in front of the cameras. So, we're now considering adding some IR floodlights to our security to help illuminate what Arlo cannot see. Also, the sensitivity of the motion detectors sure could be improved but that may have something to do with illumination too. Once Arlo does see something it's pretty slow at starting the video, so you see a lot of things on the edge of the camera field walking or driving away and quickly disappearing. Many times the hard coded 10 seconds of video just isn't enough and it would be great to be able to adjust camera recording times. The bottom line it is a pretty great security system that could still use some TLC but we believe that they are an almost perfect fit for us.
title: Very good camera security system with some caveots

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Twelve Drummers Drumming
content: I purchased this system to notify me when people are on my property who do not belong there.  The motion detection sensitivity is all the way up, yet, the device only turns on when an object is within 10 feet of the camera.  There is no protection for the rest of my property.  Someone could break into my vehicle parked 20 feet away from the camera, and Arlo wouldn't record a thing. Total waste of money.  I did verify that I didn't have the motion sensitivity on backwards.  It is not a user error.  The only thing Arlo can protect is your front porch from stray cats.  Do not buy!
title: Very poor range on motion detection

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Mark Twain
content: Great product, and possibly the best consumer-level ones in the market (albeit a bit pricy?). I bought the Blink initially, but Arlos have a true night mode, instead of using a bright LED to light up the room. This means you can use it to monitor for example a sleeping baby without waking him up. The batteries last pretty well. The website and the software ecosystem (desktop, mobile app) are easy to use and pretty flexible/feature-rich. Things to improve: 1 - The Micro USB charger cable connector on the cameras: The plug housing the USB connection sits too deep in the camera body, meaning that you can only use the (custom-made?) Arlo charger cable to charge them, and not any generic USB charger. 1.1 - The USB charger cable is too short if you wanted to leave the cameras in place while charging. This means you have to bring them down, recharge, then take them back up and re-position them. 2- If the main router/hub is turned off, your camera batteries will drain in almost 2 days (EVEN WHEN THEY ARE OFF). My guess is the cameras (even when you turn them off) ping the hub once in a while to report their status and make sure they are connected. If they can't find the hub, they will keep pinging it till they run out of battery. This is terrible as you can never really shut down the system (say you are home for a while and don't need cameras)
title: Great product, and possibly the best consumer-level ones in ...

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: E. Mitchell
content: I bought the Carlo camera in January and then the additional in April.  It is now July and both no longer work.  I cannot get the first camera to even function if it is more than a few feet away from the base station.  The second camera now won't charge with the charger it came with.  The arlo system while easy to setup at first after a few months they just stop working or have issues and there is NO support.  I have tried their "community" and haven't found any helpful articles.  I could have had someone install real cameras that WORK for the price I have already invested in these.  DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY unless you just need something that lasts 6 months or less.
title: Don't waste your money

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: H. Ossareh
content: It works OK. I have a few issues with it. These issues should not exist given the price tag. If these issues get resolved, I will change my review to 5 star: - There is a long delay between clicking to view the camera in the app and the camera feed coming through (10 second delay). - Sometimes the camera does not detect motion. For example, I installed the camera in the garage but it does not detect the garage door opening as movement. This concerns me as to how robust the motion detection system is - The geofencing and scheduling features are not flexible enough. I would like to have more flexibility in planning my Arlo (for example scheduling + geofencing) - The app looks like it was made by a 12 year old. Given the price tag, I expect the app to look slick and nice...I have an Android device.
title: Should be better given the price tag

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Terri J. Weiss
content: This security camera is so much better than the ring doorbell or ring stick up cam. There is so many options for tweaking the settings. The video picture is great and the app is awesome. Very well designed and easy to use. My only complaint is how sensitive the cameras are. But that issue was solved by turning down the sensitivity setting. Also these cameras pick up heat. So don't face camera towards a heater vent because you'll get false motion alarms. Another awesome thing is that these cameras can be placed outside. I don't really care for the magnet style wall mounts but they'll do for now until I can order the screw on mount. But overall this setup is pretty cool. Can't ask for anything better. The siren on the base station is loud as heck. Would definitely scare a robber away. There is a 2 or 3 second lag in the live viewing mode but what can u expect with the feed having to go through your Wi-Fi then to a satellite and then back to another satellite back to you. And I'm probably leaving out a step or two. But it's an awesome setup. You also get 7 free days of video recordings. And you can set the recording time to 10 seconds all the way up to 2 minutes. I found out that even 1 minute is way too long. I have my cameras set at 20 seconds. There is so many features between the cameras and app that I would be writing a book in order to explain it all. One thing I forgot to mention is that setting up the cameras with the base station is a breeze. A 12 year old could do it. Anyways I think these cameras are the bomb.
title: This is the bomb

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Patrick F
content: Great security camera, but get ready to drop some $$$ on this system. One of the major downfall of this wireless security camera set is its battery life. If you don't buy the only available replacement batteries for this ($50 each) then you would find yourself replacing each camera every other week, which is not only a major inconvenience but also a question of reliability since you can't monitor the house as you would like if you need to take it down so often to recharge the batteries.
title: Low Battery Life

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Inferno
content: It's a nice system.  I didn't want to invest too much so I bought the one camera system to see if I liked it.  I only had it for a few days and so far it works great.  I am going to purchase two more cameras over time.  I like the stylish design.  I have tried two other WiFi systems and so far this is the best.  It picks up motion pretty well and I have yet to receive false alarms.  The connection seems to be pretty stable.  I guess it took a company that specializes in wireless networking to get this right.  I truly like that you have the option to record to a USB or hard drive.  Right now I have a 64GB micro USB plugged into it.  I gave it 4 stars because the price is a little over the top.  I guess you can't get too mad about the price because they make up for it with free cloud service.  I like the wide view unlike the Ring stick up camera.  However, viewing live video from your PC can be a little finicky sometimes when using the Chrome browser. I will repost if anything bad happens with it.
title: Overall best WiFi system

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Jenna
content: I really love these cameras. Installing these on Hardie plank I wasn't able to use the included screws, but I opted for outdoor double sided mounting tape, which worked really well. They are good quality and I've been delighted by having extra eyes when packages arrive or when a solicitor is at my house so I know I should dawdle before pulling up to avoid them. Haha! The only issue I have is that Arlo Smart, the subscription, is pretty much necessary. Tree leaves blowing will trigger your motion sensor every couple minutes if you don't have Arlo Smart to indicate you only care about people and vehicles and not any random motion detected. Additionally, I wish the zones you set up could be made into an irregular shape. One of my cameras is pointed diagonally at my driveway, and a uniform rectangle includes part of the street if I want to include my entire driveway. If I wanted to make sure not to get street traffic, the detection zone would have to be made much smaller and wouldn't include part of the driveway, which isn't desired, so I opt for a larger detection area which will get more notifications than I want as it will catch passing cars. But those are minor complaints. Overall, I'm really pleased with my purchase and could easily recommend them.
title: Love these cameras!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: W. A. Montgomery
content: Edit:  I am revising my review from a year ago now that I’ve had this system for just a little over a year. I am also keeping my original review which you can find below. The major issue after using this a year is that the batteries are now worthless and I will have to order replacements for $48 each.  Make sure you factor this into your purchasing decision as it turns out you are likely going to have a running cost with replacing batteries.  The battery on the main camera that gets the most use needed it charged every 3-4 months initially. After 3 charges this past year, now it needs charged every 1-2 weeks.  The camera did not get all that much use either with some weeks not even being activated or put into use. I expected longer battery overall lifetime than what I got and after reading reviews on the official battery replacement amazon product page, it appears that it’s a crapshoot on whether you get a decent battery or not. Either way plan on at least $50 per camera per year for replacement batteries.  We went with this because we didn’t want to pay monthly subscription fees to other big security companies.  Had I known then what I know now I would likely have taken a closer look at some of what else was out there. Having used it for 10 days now I am very pleased with it.  I have installed it over my entryway and plan to add more cameras at some point in the future.  Only issue I had was that I had a landscape light that was pointing towards the camera and this really screwed up the night vision.  So far though it works as advertised.
title: Not pleased after a year.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Erik Sigurdson
content: I have purchased 10 Arlo Pro cameras and it's been nothing but issues with their charging cables.  Each cable that came with the cameras failed within a week on cameras mounted outdoors.  Then I upgraded and purchased the Arlo Outdoor Power Adapters.  The first four power adapters failed and Amazon sent me replacements.  Now 3 of 4 replacement outdoor power adapters have failed.  The cameras display an error code and shortly thereafter each camera cannot be located.  Customer service with Netgear says to unplug the cable for one hour and replace it.  They say it's a battery overheating issue.  But my issue is that I have the four outdoor power adapters mounted up high 30 feet under my roof ledges.  So it requires me to hire a contractor on a ladder every week or two to fix the issue.  I am returning all 10 of my cameras - I wish Netgear would have tested the Arlo Pro system before they began selling it to the general public.  Pretty disappointed.  Amazon has been great at replacing defective parts.  I hope they'll take the thousands of dollars I've spent on my system back now.
title: Major problems with Arlo Pro charging cables

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Caroline S.
content: Running a small business is sometimes difficult. Installing my new Arlo Cameras has been one of the best decisions I've made yet. It was easy to set-up, install, and get online with my iPhone. I now have peace of mind knowing that I will be alerted and have video footage with sound if there is ever a break-in or other mishap. I am quite pleased with the available setup options within the system as well - action areas to only cover your property and not the road; sound sensitivity; motion detection (and with a reasonably priced subscription it even identifies animal versus human!); night vision; and a power management setting. I would recommend this system to both homeowners and small business owners that are looking for a more secure environment.
title: Best Security Investment

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Geek Out Reviews
content: I wasn't sure which direction to go when it came to purchasing a security camera for my in-laws. They don't have smart phones which narrowed down the options to just Arlo, so I purchased it for them and they absolutely loved it and used it with Alexa to cast it to the tv. Since they loved it so much, I went ahead and bought myself one for my apartment. Apartments don't always do a great job at protecting your incoming packages so this has been the best tool to see my package get delivered and know if something happens to it. The quality is amazing, the ease of app is significantly better than Ring which is what my coworker has. Just an amazing product and I do plan on buying more cameras in the near future for more angles.
title: Most reliable home security camera

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Kimberly
content: I hate to give a bad review, but this camera was AWESOME when I first purchased it.  Worked as advertised.  After about 2-1/2 weeks the speaker stopped working...and to be honest, that's the only reason I spent $200 on this camera.  Unfortunately I didn't return it right away and now my window to return it has expired...a big waste of $200 but I can't blame Arlo for my busy schedule.  Regardless, it shouldn't have crapped out after only 2-1/2 weeks.  I looked up on line to see if it can be fixed somehow and it looks like there are lots of people with the same issue.  I guess it's being blamed on the Arlo app updates not working or not being compatible, but that doesn't solve my problem.  It's unfortunate that this has happened but I definitely won't be buying another.
title: Only worked for a couple of weeks...

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Aaron J.
content: I have several Arlo Pro and Pro 2 cameras. When they work, they are wonderful. After power outage, some of the cameras go offline. The only wayt to bring them back to life is to remove them from app and resync. The cutomer support is waste of time. They dont understand problem. Even if they do, they lie. My basestation records the footage from camera even though the app is showing the camera as offline. Customer support want me to unmount the camera from top of my roof, bring them back down to resync. What a pain. I am switching to some more reliable brand.
title: Offline- then you have to remove the camera and resync

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: John Bowman
content: Easy to set up & connect to wifi, cameras and base station seem well made. No problems after about 9 months in use every night around our home. My two big peeves are the narrow field of view on the cameras & the speed with which you can review what's happening once motion is detected. From about 12' away the patio camera just shows the patio door and a foot or so on either side of it. Pointed out into the open patio area, the field of view remains disappointingly narrow. I'd like to have one camera display a decent amount of area instead of having to buy more just to cover one direction fully. It also takes too much time to get notified and review what is happening, IMO.
title: System works and the equipment is well made, but field of view of cameras too narrow & review process to slow for me.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Gregg
content: I purchased an Arlo Pro 2 system with 2 cameras. I was impressed with the clarity (picture quality A+) so I added another camera immediately. It's been about three months now & I'm having to resync at least two or three of them several times a week. When your wheelchair bound & live alone it's a constant battle. I always have at least one or two of them down waiting on a someone for assistance because I am unable to reach them. Security & dependabilty are the main reason that I purchased an Arlo system. Sorry but I'm simply not impressed with this product.
title: Reliability issues

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Jessica B
content: My husband and I bought this when some suspicious neighbors moved in and another Amazon package wasn't received by us. I've had it since June 2 and it's already paid for itself. We ordered some Prime day items that were delivered in 3 separate packages today. A few hours later, I got a motion notification from the app about motion at our front door.
