product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Anthony Perry
content: This was incredibly easy to set-up and install.  But the battery life is only ~2 months even though Arlo advertises it as ~6 months with 5 minutes of recording per day.  We have this mounted at our weekend house where we've gone 2 weeks with just a couple minutes of recording in that span and the battery is depleting rapidly.
title: Battery Life is Shorter Than Advertised

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: napolifred
content: Super fast and easy to install.  It only took around 5 minutes to be up and running with factory defaults.  The cameras are easy to hide, mount and setup.  It does take a little while to customize the settings the way you want them. PROS: 1. Instant security system 2. Easy setup 3. No cables to connect to the cameras 4. Cameras have two way communications 5.  Alarm is very loud CONS: 1. If your internet goes down you loose your security system 2. It uses you data when you view the videos 3. Volume on the cameras is not very loud even when max out
title: Well worth the piece of mind you get!!!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Debora
content: The quality is “okay” but in 4 months I’ve had two big issues. The first time, the customer service rep had me change the wrong settings. My second issue was a faulty charger. Their customer service is completely useless. I had to buy a new charger because of their non-responsiveness - and the camera is used due to a security issue in the neighborhood. It’s been over a month. I continue to tell anyone who is considering Arlo - DON’T!
title: Product “okay” but Customer Serive is AWFUL. RUN!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: kman1088
content: I purchased an Arlo Pro 5 camera bundle during the holidays to help improve my home security. I specifically chose this product due to its compatibility with Amazon Alexa's smart home automation functionality. Product setup is a breeze. The app provides a step by step process for setting up the base station and each camera. Regarding functionality, the video and sound quality are excellent. Smart alerts help to notify me of movement detection, which makes me feel more secure especially for cameras positioned in areas with low traffic. Though, I recommend reviewing your notification preferences since they can blow up your email/phone for cameras facing a roadway. My only complaint for this product is the resyncing process that is required if the base station is disconnected by a power outage. The process requires a complete repeat of the initial setup process i.e. taking down all cameras and syncing them to the base station. This is apparently an old issue that still has not been resolved, and very annoying. I am hoping a fix is still in the works. Other than that, great product!
title: Great Product!  Though, slight issue associated with power outages

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: cmgerber
content: I really liked this product for first 6 months to a year it did what it advertised. We liked it enough to order two more. And then it all fell apart. Maybe a week after we ordered the second round our first arlo ran out of batteries for the second time. Except this time it didn’t recharge, at all. While trying to figure this out we put one of the new arlos in its place to watch our front door. Well this new arlo only records and alerts on maybe 1/3 of the people that come to our front door (compared to 90% with the last arlo). I’ve tried to train it, change the sensitivity all that and no improvement. I would return all of them at this point but Amazon is telling me I no longer have any return or product support help so now I am stuck with 3 security cameras that don’t work and I guess. Task to find a new brand that hopefully won’t disappoint this much.
title: A high price for a product that doesn’t work...

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: DEP
content: I had such hope for this unit.  I read through many reviews and compared with many other system and spent a good 3 weeks or so researching & making up my mind about this unit. 1st of all, I'd like to mention that Netgear waste SO MUCH in packaging of this unit.  I get it you're trying to make it look nice but man... you can reduce size of box by half & also probably save some $$ on it too. Anyway, video quality is good in both video & audio.  App works well & well designed, I was never comfortable with magnet wall mount but I was going to get another kind anyway so that was ok. For video to start, it takes about 3~5 seconds delay... little annoying but livable. Last test was for 2 way radio / talk feature which is why I went with this system.  (I don't have door bell nor intend to get one)  First of all, you need to wait for it to connect before you can talk.  This is another 3~5 second... so between video delay & audio delay, that's about 10 second delay.. not the best but once again, it's within my expectation. I said 'Hello' and on my Arlo unit I heard '-----'  Yup, nothing!  So I said again 'Hello~~~~'  And this time I heard 'Hel ------' Long story short, only about 1/3 of what I say would come through. I tried: Restarting the unit Reconnecting to internet And to MAKE SURE my internet was messing things up, I tried talking on my phone to my other IP camera at home (which does not have motion detection alert but has 2 way audio), and it was fine....  I say '1,2,3,4,5' and I can hear '1,2,3,4,5' clearly = internet is up & running. Over 3 day period, I kept trying Arlo... and end result is not once I was able to hear '1,2,3,4,5' all of them clearly.  Best I ever gotten was 3 numbers out of 5.  I said them slowly... 2 star for video part working... but I'm sending my back.  What a shame... had such as big hopes for this!  :(
title: 2 way radio does NOT work

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: SK
content: I've had the Arlo pro for five months and so far I'm satisfied on the most part. The benefits for me of being wireless outweighs the drawbacks with the 2-3 sec. delay when the recording starts. The one thing I don't like though is that the cameras on most occasions don't continuously record even though there is still movement. Instead it keeps recording several small chunks of 6-9 sec. recordings with 1-2 sec. gaps between them even though there is constant movement in front of the cameras even if it's within 5-10 ft.. I have the setting for up to 300 sec. record time and I have the sensitivity turned up to 100%. but it is not consistent. I have a 6 camera setup  with the add-on cameras that I purchased since the initial purchase and it seems to happen with all of them.
title: ... Arlo pro for five months and so far I'm satisfied on the most part

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Donna Petras
content: Purchased these less than 1 year ago for a second home out of state to monitor the outside.  One camera in the front and  one in the back.  Front works fantastic.  Back worked well for about 5 months but now does not connect to the base station.  Both are wired to a power supply so it's not the battery.  Unfortunately, I will not be able to check on them until later this month to try and troubleshoot the problem.  I will edit this review once the problem is rectified.
title: When they work, they work well.  When they WORK.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Karen
content: So I've been trying to find out who is using my rose garden as a litter box and it turns out it's the neighbors terrier.  My first Arlo camera went funky on me after about 18 months (probably due to the super hot CA sun), but the new camera has a house as well for weather protection and it has a microphone and speaker.  I caught the little marauder the other night in my rose garden digging at my 40 year old Abe Lincoln rose and had a good giggle when I yelled at him through the camera.  I didn't know terriers could do a back flip!  Great camera, easy to use and helps keep the neighborhood marauders out of rose gardens.
title: Super easy to install, great picture, surprised my landscaper

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Donna
content: I have had these cameras for over a year now and thought the cameras were great.  It’s the battery life that’s a problem.. for the last year every 4 months we charge the battery’s and they lasted.  We charged the batteries this last time may 20 and all 5 cameras were completely dead after 2 1/2 weeks. I’m not pleased with this since this on my home in Florida. I rely on these to let me know of any motion while it is vacant. The sound  and the picture are great. I’m not going down to my home again until August so unfortunately I will be able to see nothing I’ve tried calling the company and was told I didn’t charge it long enough. I’ve had the cameras long enough to know how to charge them. Now I have hundreds of dollars in cameras that don’t stay charge  I’m disappointed and dissatisfied
title: Great camera, battery not so much

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: jerseyjazz
content: Dislike this product and do not recommend.  It is very slow and live streaming is poor.  Also-only records when it feels like it.  I tried to attempt a return and was 1-day over 30 day limit.  I would like either Amazon or the company to call me to initiate a return.  Highly unsatisfied customer.  Called tech support and they told me my setting was too soft for 40.  But it usually senses cars that are far but sometimes won't recognize people at my front door.
title: Not recommended.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Brian Prucey
content: The camera worked fine for 11 months, then stopped communicating with the base station and would not resync. Worked with tech support for hours trying to get it to sync, but it would not. Arlo never even offered to fix it or send a replacement. That's $200+ I'll never see again. It frustrates me when a company does not stand by their products.
title: Stopped working after 11 months.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Isoteric
content: Dad and I happened upon Arlo when we were searching for a good security camera and we are glad to have found them! The Quality is good for the price, but motion detection can be a little finicky at times—be advised it will often pick up on traffic if you have it facing near any highways. I’d also advise against using audio detection if you are in a high traffic area and have it set to high sensitivity. It’ll pick up the sound of EVERY car passing.
title: A bit finicky, but great for the price

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Jenny Scobel
content: Awful waste of time.  I was on the chat line from 5 pm until 10:30 pm and Kenneth Brylie from Arlo and still he couldn't get the Arlo Pro to work.  I bought an Arlo because of it's affiliation with Netgear.  I have two new Netgear routers and a new Netgear modem, but he could not find a way for it to connect to their camera system.  He finally told me to knock on my neighbors doors or drive to a relatives house and borrow their modems to see if theirs might work with the Base Station.  Really????? Also, the Arlo app got my email address and password stuck in a loop - it would ask for my email address then say the password didn't work.  And when I reset the password it said it couldn't find my email address.  Round and round.  The technician told me I should open a new email account and try to start the process again.  After 5 1/2 hours he did manage to fix that after I wouldn’t change my email account, but the Arlo still won't work because the site couldn’t find the Base Station. There are no instructions that come with the system.  The most information was a sweet little pamphlet about what else you could buy from them. I really wanted to like this so I’m doubly disappointed. And then, my friend came home and got the system running in about 20 minutes by finding some online instructions.
title: Terrible online help!!!!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Joly
content: We live in a ranch and have placed these cameras outdoors. They work great and have captured videos of wildlife and of people crossing thru our place.  They give us peace of mine whenever we leave. Battery life is super. Worth it!
title: Love these cameras

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Toby Bradshaw
content: I bought a 2-camera system.  It was very straightforward to set up -- the wireless feature is extremely convenient, image quality is good, user interface on phone and computer is easy to use, battery life is excellent. However, while one of the cameras worked flawlessly from Day 1, the other camera frequently lost connection to the base station, and drained the battery very fast (2-3 days).  By swapping the camera locations and batteries I determined that the camera itself was at fault.  However, customer support required me to re-do all the troubleshooting before they would approve a camera exchange.  [Many people would simply have returned the whole system at this point, but I do like the system WHEN IT WORKS.]  I had to return the defective camera and pay for the shipping myself.  In the end it took more than 2 weeks to replace my camera.  We'll see if the replacement functions properly ... Here's what should have happened: Once customer service determined that the camera was defective (if they wouldn't take my word for it), NETGEAR should have overnight shipped a replacement camera with a pre-paid return label for the defective camera.
title: Great system, mediocre customer service

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Bailey
content: I had some trepidation about buying these after the problems I had with another brand, but the Arlo Pro cameras really delivered.  I got these for a vacation home in another town.  Simple to install and connect.  I can access them anywhere by phone or PC.  People I've shown them to comment on the great video quality and the sound quality is great as well.  I downloaded a Star Trek "INTRUDER ALERT" notification sound and now I'm the hit of party whenever anyone or anything gets too close to my house.
title: Intruder Alert!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: barnabydog
content: Geofencing is completely useless. Alerts are quick when they happen, but motion detection randomly fails, and when it is working, the alerts frequently disappear by themselves, leaving you no way to know the camera detected anything. System updates are "automatic" and often make bad things even worse. And Netgear's  claim of "720P" resolution is simply fraudulent. This system does not provide 720P resolution. Not even close. The only upside is free online storage, but the rest of the system is so poorly executed that I'd gladly give up the server space for a product made by a technically competent company, which Netgear is not.
title: Highly unreliable.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Jonathan
content: I've been setting up security camera systems for years. It's always a pain to run the wires. Arlo fixes this with its wireless camera system. A couple issues: why would you make a "wireless" base station that requires you to plug direction into a router? Just give it the added functionality of communicating over the wireless network. That being said, it integrates nicely with IFTTT, picture quality is solid, and battery life is decent. In addition, iOS notification are handy and helpful. All in all, 4 out of 5 stars. And I would definitely buy again.
title: Great System with a few (minor) quirks.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Laurie
content: UPDATE: Cameras continue to have issues with motion recording, they keep saying it is fixed, and it may work for a couple hours or even days, but then stops again.  I do not believe the company is keeping up with their back end infrastructure to fulfill the needs to the number of devices now connecting.  Wish I had gone with another type of device and this has proven mostly useless. Cameras were pretty easy to set up, but the app constantly has issues.  It is slow, and often just stops working, so it is impossible to arm the systems, not really what you want when you buy a security systems.  And of course it always decides to need to renew your password at the most inconvenient time, most recently when their authentication system was down.  There is no way to get support no way to arm system, and no indication of when service will be restored, it just keeps saying check back a minute from now.  You would think a networking company would understand high availability and redundancy. Issues continue, it appears every time they put out a release.  Support team has no clue and read their script and ask you to do things that will never help the issue.  The company does not appear to care about the continued issues, but more about putting out new products to continue to rake in money for new things that probably won't work any better until they finally invest in some development teams and update software to use underlying technology that isn't end of life.  Don't waste your time, buy something else.
title: So much for security-update 2019

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: MKS
content: I am very dissatisfied with Arlo Pro system. Actually I am good at  video surveillance systems on the professional level: dozen years of installing and maintaining Panasonic and Nice Vision equipments for public transport network  in a big city. The main weak point of Arlo Pro is Base Station that it is often offline and restoring connection is a racking headache. In other words, I have been often unable to establish connection with BS using my phone app and even the desktop connected to the router. All my troubleshooting efforts was in vain despite of 12 years of experience in professional surveillance  systems.  Arllo Pro definitely  has a serious fault that should be removed. I cannot recommend Arlo Pro right now.
title: Almost unusable because of very unstable remote connection to Base Station

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Cameron Reynolds
content: Absolutely loving these cameras.  Setup is so quick and easy! Happy to finally have a consumer-friendly offering that doesn't require me to pay a monthly subscription for monitoring.  I purchased a 4pk and ordered my 5th add-on camera right away to maximize my allowable devices (even though it wasn't really necessary for property coverage, I still wanted it, let's be honest).  The first round of battery life will require a bit of patience as you come to learn your preference for audio/motion sensitivities and perfect camera placement.  Once you settle down with being so giddy about watching your live feeds all the time, battery life should last you as advertised. Great little system that is flexible and has a simple app design, too. I love that I can hook up a USB storage device of my own and use it for local storage.  Future wireless brands have their work cut out for them - well done!
title: Arlo, where have you been all my life?!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Kent Denzel
content: We got this, as did most, to see who was at the door without having to open it. Unfortunately, its motion detection is very poor and/or delayed. Sometimes when family comes over, they're in the house before the alert sounds. And sometimes it misses activity altogether. I've also had the problem others have discussed where it will say the cameras are offline for no reason, and I have to force-close the app. When it works, it's pretty good, but I cannot recommend it.
title: Very poor motion detection

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Danny_Dan_Daniel
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. You won’t believe this story. I installed the camera March 31st. 24 hours later a bright flash and bang outside sent me scrambling to my widow. I grabbed my iPhone to manually turn on the Arlo pro as I walked to the front door. Looking out I saw my neighbor’s car on fire! I pocketed the phone and put out the blaze with a fire extinguisher. Police and fire fighters came inside later taking copies of the footage. The next day the fire martial informed me that the blaze was intentional! I might be able to post the video later on. For now it is evidence and confidential. Nice job Arlo!
title: Nice job Arlo

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Dues
content: Have had this camera system since Nov.17, started with just 3 regular cameras and upgraded within a month and added 4 pro cameras. Since that time Ive added 2 more for the outside! Plain and simple the system works, period. Is it the best? No, but for what it does, its cost, ease of use, and quality, it is the best bang for your buck and you can have it all up and running within an hour! For all those that find issue with what this camera does, I say "spend 3x's as much and have the same issues you complain about with arlo!" This system does exactly what I need it to do and more. It has its quirks but learn how to use it, adjust the multiple settings and you will fix some of this issues I see posted in no time! I have recommended Arlo to everyone I know that wants to purchase a security system!
title: Is it the best? No

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Lolel78
content: After owning an Arlo system we decided to add two additional Arlo Pro cameras. After running our system for two weeks I can say the integration to our older system was seamless. What we love: Rechargeable batteries, two way sound feature, magnetic wall mounts, weather proof design. The ability the cameras have to record only when sound/motion is detected allow you to review the moments that matter most. What we don't like as much: Battery life short when using the cameras at high definition, picture quality is definitely not HD, even with settings at full resolution, tremendous lag getting live feed from the cams which renders the two way speaker system useless for communication.
title: Works great but...

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Alan & Lauri Cook
content: We needed an easy to use and easy to set up surveillance system that could be used to monitor a relative in their home that has early signs of dementia.  The main attraction for this system was the free 7 days of cloud storage, but after using this for a week we have been impressed with the video quality, including the ability to monitor the home with the lights turned off.  We are able to log in and review the history of video clips that were recorded after detecting motion or watch a live feed (both include audio, too).  There is two-way audio, but we have not tested that feature yet.  Our experience with battery life is likely less than advertised, but we are exceeding the 5 minutes/day typical usage...perhaps that will change as the novelty wears off.  You can make adjustments to the settings (such as video quality, length of auto-recordings, times of day/week for detecting motion, etc.) that would also be useful to help conserve batteries or use AC power for the cameras (but it appears that purchasing additional AC adapters, 1 is included, is not a readily available option).  We like the ease of using an iPhone app to log in and have access to the online library of video clips or live feed.  Just an example of how we have found this useful, checking in on our relative during the night it was evident from watching and listening that the TV was left on (the batteries in the remote were drained) so we were able to make a late night visit and fix the issue so that they were not being kept awake all night with a TV that they could not turn off.  This system has allowed us to have peace and mind that our relative is okay, such as when  they refuse or can't answer the phone.
title: excellent surveillance system

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Sid
content: Installing these cameras have given us great peace of mind. It’s pretty easy to install and use. It has very good motion detection. My complaint is that the positioning of the camera greatly affects its ability to sense motion. If you are trying to keep it in a corner where it can’t be positioned at good angle, you can’t expect the motion detection to be effective. The notifications are a bit slow too. If it’s a quick movement, the camera won’t record the subject as there is a delay in the initiation of recording. Overall it’s a very good security camera with out any monthly payments.
title: Peace of mind

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Tsenne
content: Great camera, nice clear picture. I wanted a wireless camera because I didn't want to run wires all over my front porch. I have a small home business and have had packages lost and wanted a camera to see what is going on. Very clear pictures. The only comment I have is that they advertise free cloud recording. This free cloud recording is only good for the first 4 weeks, then you have a yearly subscription fee. Not fair advertising. Other than that, the unit was easy to set up and is working fine. I would definitely recommend the Arlo system.
title: Great camera, nice clear picture

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: DeeDee78
content: Battery life is non existent, two way talk is more like a whisper. Stops working at temps below 30 degrees Fahrenheit. Was purchased as an add on to existing Arlo setup. The whole Arlo setup is disappointing compared to others. Cameras freeze or go offline for no reason, alert to motion but don’t record or will record but not playback.  I work from home and my internet connection is outstanding with WiFi that is able to be connected to all over my house, yard and halfway down my street. Yet the cameras only show partial WiFi strength.
title: Gone downhill

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Matti2d
content: Batteries come charged from factory, so you can be set up in a short time. The only problem is there are no permanent screw mounts if you want to place outdoors. I had to order those separately and wait for them to arrive. The long-term battery life and hassle to recharge remains to be seen, but so far, hooking to base station and getting cameras on-line with the app was pretty easy. The other thing I didn't realize is you must hardwire the ethernet to the base station.. I was able to place my base station near an existing network switch, so that worked out. But just be forewarned you will need an open line on your router or switch. So far, pretty happy not having to run cables through the attic to get my security system. Update: Batteries last about one month before needing to recharge. You need to use the included AC block to recharge, but only takes a few hours at most. Still happy with system. I added a USB hard drive to the base station to download all of the activity.
title: Pretty good with minor issues.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Chris Floegel
content: So far, the Arlo Pro system I recently purchased has been performing great.  The motion detection on the cameras works well (almost too well as it will trigger when there are passing cars 40-50 feet away from the camera location).  Mounting the cameras on the exterior block walls of my house was fairly easy.  I would highly recommend using a drill bit designed for concrete as well as an impact driver to drill the holes for the exterior security mounts as this process will go much quicker with those tools than a standard drill with the same drill bit (not a fault towards the Arlo system as this is something you would experience with any exterior mounting to concrete block construction).
title: Solid Wireless Security Camera

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Jennifer S.
content: There's a DEFINITE LONG lag in the feed, but the most annoying thing is that the motion detection turns itself off sporadically (even when the app is set to detect motion).  The picture quality is very pixelated, so if there's ever an intruder - facial recognition isn't happening. On the bright side, set up was easy and the unit itself is sturdy. UPDATE: moved, bought another in hopes it would work better this round. NOPE. Feed is constantly a white screen. I hear sound, but there's almost a 20 second delay. BOO. Yup. I named the camera "hussy". Heeheehee.
title: At this pricepoint, it should preform better

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: GRW
content: Note that this camera is 720p not 1080p.  It is fine if you need a basic camera that has motion sensing but not divisible into specific motion areas of the camera.  A 1080p camera does not make it a facial recognition camera so unless you need bells and whistles, this less expensive camera than the Arlo Pro 2 or 3 will be perfectly fine
title: Good product for basic functions

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Cheech
content: I loved this camera when it worked! I used to be able to charge it with a regular android charger and then they did something so that you had to use the Arlo charger. The original charger worked once and then never again. So I bought a new Arlo charger that also only worked once. I’m pretty frustrated. I liked it better than my Ring when it worked but now it’s dead and I bought it October 2018.
title: Can’t charge it!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Jose
content: Best feature is that it's complete wireless, you can place it anywhere. The one in the backyard servived a couple of days of rain, will see how long it last under the hot summer sun. But these type of high tech toys need to be upgraded every few years anyway, that's all I ask for as life time. And 7day free cloud recoding, you can add a USB drive for local recording​, which is pretty cheap. Live video lags a few seconds, but no big deal. Don't know how well motion detection works, don't care about it much. Will probably add more later.
title: Easy to set up, works great

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Bill
content: The cameras and system are easy to configure and manager.  The wire free is great.  I have replaced my Arlo 3000 series with Arlo Pro Series.  I love the two way audio.  The picture quality is better than the Arlo.  Also, the Hard drive/USB option is great so that you do not miss anything.  If there is an interruption i service, the camera will save the images to he hard drive. It would be nice if you can review the pictures on the Hard Drive from the web interface.  You have o eject the hard drive and connect to a computer to view.
title: Easy setup and config

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: craigers
content: My husband and I wanted to have some security around our house, so I researched camera options and chose Arlo. As the Arlo system can add cameras we started with the two camera system with the intention of adding more later. We liked the Arlo system so much we decided to add a third camera. This time we added an Arlo Pro camera. The system is wonderful. The original Arlo cameras are not nearly as good as the Arlo Pro camera, but they still do a good job. We had a bit of a problem with one camera. Support was great. We got things fixed quickly. The best thing about the system is that it is wireless. We have had the original system for about two months, and the pro for about a month. We have had no issues with batteries running out quickly.
title: Nice little camera system

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: D. Silverman
content: Faulty cameras, terrible customer service, lengthy replacement process.  Poor customer service is an understatement.  Jumped through so many hoops to try and get replacements for cameras that simply do not work.  Wasted so much of my valuable time speaking with unqualified customer service reps.  After all was said and done, they tried to get me to pay shipping for replacement of their faulty cameras.  I strongly do not recommend buying Arlos cameras.  Their customer service is terrible and their products work from time to time.
title: Faulty cameras, terrible customer service, lengthy replacement process

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Serina Nelson
content: We wanted cameras that didn't require a plug in.  These work great.  The battery usage depends on the amount of traffic you have.  We have ours set to be triggered by motion.  It took the camera with lesser traffic than the other camera about a month before it needed to have the battery charged.  It is still high traffic as we live in town and construction crews diverted traffic in front of our house, which is where the lesser traffic camera is pointed.  The sound quality is great and the HD quality of the video is great.  The app for Arlo is easy to use as well.
title: Great quality for video and audio and no plug in required!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Alecia Decker
content: Super easy setup, App is user friendly. Best features are they are completely wireless so you can place them anywhere your WiFi can reach. And the night vision is phenomenal. And  sensitivity to record can be set however you prefer, and batteries are easy to change. I have found they are quick to charge also, mine only took an hour to recharge. You can even set up geofencing if you choose to use them indoors so they will only record when you are not home. I know they are on the expensive side, but so totally worth every penny! Best part is you don’t have to be a rocket scientist to set them up or use them.
title: Great video, easy setup, and user friendly app

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: J. Martin
content: UPDATE: I changed my review and give the Arlo Pro 3 stars instead of 5. I purchased another Arlo Pro camera for my system and it came with HW8 version. My other camera is HW7. The problem is the camera took about 2 hours to get to sync to my base and after that, the camera kept going offline so I contacted Amazon to send me a replacement that is now on the way. I looked up this issue from the Arlo Pro Community Message Boards and it turns out they are probably sending out refurbished cameras and selling them as new with HW8. This is pretty disappointing for them to pull something like this if this is true. My other camera works fine but this one has been terrible. Also the video quality isn't as great as I expected it to be but it's barely HD quality at 720p.
title: This system is great! This saved me so much money

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Kate
content: I love these cameras. I can place them just about anywhere. Pictures are clear and I really like the microphone feature on the Pro cameras, I've caught some interesting tidbits.  The battery lasts about a week in the location I have it now but it's a super high traffic area.  My only major qualm is that there is a 9-17 second lag time on the Pro cameras vs the original Arlo camera.  But I love that it does longer recordings.
title: Awesome with a minor blip

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: cody hawkins
content: Cameras go bad in less than a years use. It’s impossible to get ahold of anyone in there customer service. I emailed them before all this covid crap and still cannot get a response. I bought new battery chargers thinking that could have been the problem.  Also bought a new battery swapped batteries and still the camera does not work. At this point I wish I would have bought a ring system instead. The one camera that does work is good to go. Just wish I could get ahold of someone from there customer service.
title: Cameras quit working within a year. You can’t get ahold of there customer service.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: BN Alive
content: Initially ordered the 2 camera kit.  Liked it so much that I ordered 2 more add-on cameras. Set up was very easy, probably less than 10 minutes. Batteries were already charged upon arrival. Nice touch. App is easy to use.  One improvement would be to add a single button to turn on or off all the cameras at the same time.  Currently you have to turn each camera on or off separately.  When using the app on my phone, it sometimes is slow determining the current mode (armed / disarmed) and I have to restart the app, even when I have 4 bars.  Camera video quality and functionality is great. Night vision works very well. So far after 4 days of use, batteries still at 100%, or close to it.  Unless you have really deep windows, you probably wont be able to fit one of these cameras inside the window well unless you use one of those twisty bendy curtain rod mounts. Overall, very satisfied with this product.
title: Liked it so much that I ordered 2 more add-on ...

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Sue from CA
content: We purchased a pair of Arlo Pros, replacing two basic Arlos that we've had for just short of three years. This is an inexpensive solution to home security. The new base station picks up the sound and allows us to record what the camera captures on our own thumb drive. The base station also works with our two remaining basic Arlo outdoor wireless cameras. I'm sure you could get a much better security system, but it would cost a lot more than this simple do-it-yourself mode. For our needs, we're very satisfied.
title: Inexpensive way to have a measure of home security

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Gerald E.
content: The Arlo Pro is a good system, but not quite there yet. It is easy to setup and use, but it does not capture all motion. For instance, if someone is coming directly towards your camera it most likely will not pick them up. Objects need to move horizontally to be recognized by the camera. I had an incident right in front of my house where I had two cameras placed, one at my door on the left side of my house and the other at the far right of my house, and they didn't pick up any of it. I adjusted the sensitivity settings several times and never got the right behavior that I would like. If you set the settings to be too sensitive, it will pick up things like the wind blowing a tree branch, but still not pickup the lady walking her dog and pooping on my lawn. This product is too expensive to not detect everything in motion. Here are my pros and cons. Pros: 1. Easy to install 2. Easy to setup 2. App is very responsive and easy to use 3. Battery life Cons: 1. Cameras do not pickup motion very well 2. Record delay can cause camera to miss things 3. Sensitive to wind 4. App is sometimes not responsive, as their servers go offline for some reason. Not, you will not be able to access your cameras when this happens. This was a major issue for me when I was attempting to review some questionable footage and change some settings.
title: Good system, but not quite there yet

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Bucky
content: Great base unit to expand on! Arlo Pro suits all my needs and has excellent build quality. It detects both motion and audio, or just one or the other...you can select. The speaker and siren are nice features as well! The free 7-day cloid memory is more than enough for my needs! You can download recorded video or pics for permanent record. The battery lasted me 2 weeks, and that's with heavy traffic due to my dogs tripping the camera. But you have the option to keep it plugged in for constant power. I gave it 4 stars because it has a bit more lagtime than the Q series. But aside from that, it's been great!
title: Make sure you have a good router, especially if you run multiple cameras and other devices.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Joe Somebody
content: This product would be great if you could count on it to actually work.  There are times when I'm trying to use the app to manual start recording something at the app locks up or just won't let me record.  Meanwhile the event that I wanted to record has passed.  The motion detection often has extreme lag and doesn't record until someone has already almost completely traversed the span of the camera.  Anyone moving quickly could easily evade this camera. When it does work, it is nice to have.
title: Not reliable

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Franco Turrinelli
content: Pros Really excellent video quality both daytime and nighttime Easy to set up Super easy to install Free storage of video Good app and website; easy to navigate, look at video and manage cameras Good looking and nonobtrusive physical design Cons Delayed start to recording after motion is detected Trade-off between detecting motion (and recording video) and battery usage is problematic Conclusion I like everything about this system -- especially the video quality both daytime and nighttime and the battery-based operation that makes the system incredibly easy to install.  However, the characteristics of my home's location mean that it does not work for us and unfortunately it will have to be returned.  Let me explain: we live in the city on a relatively high foot and car traffic block.  Our house (as are most in Chicago) is essentially "on the street" with a sidewalk and parkway separating us from the road.  We would like outdoor monitoring as we have had problems with cars being broken into, and packages (allegedly) being delivered at our front door but not being there when we come home.  This seemed like an ideal solution, but a few factors mean it won't work for us. (a) there is a significant delay between motion being detected and the video starting; in most cases this means that the motion is not recorded sufficiently (b) because of the amount of traffic (pedestrian and car) a lot of video is being recorded (especially of cars) and this is consuming battery capacity too quickly (c) I can change the sensitivity of the motion detection, but it does not seem to capture all events (the newspaper being delivered in the morning for example) and if I turn up the sensitivity because of the traffic on our (side) street we are getting near-continuous recording which drains the battery even quicker.  In summary, great system, highly recommend you try it in your location and hope it works better for you than it did for me.
title: Great system but whether it works for you will depend on your location

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Steven A.
content: When it works, it works great.  The problem is, Netgear's website has problems for a day or more at a time all too regularly (and their servers are needed to administer the system). When the servers do have problems, the tech support doesn't bother to tell you when you're on the line/chat with them, they don't put an announcement up on the site indicating a problem, and are generally terrible at customer support.  "If the re-install of the app doesn't work, try force-stopping the app"... Excuse me, if I uninstall the app, it's stopped, there's no need to try a force stop AFTER a reinstall. I've had the system just over 4 months now, and there' have already been two daylong (or longer, not sure yet) outages preventing me from doing anything on the system, for example, arming or disarming the system to reflect being at home or away.
title: When it works, it's great, but when it doesn't, it's usually NetGear's servers, and their support is essentially non-existent.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Martin Culpepper
content: Bad experience with support, Very frustrated. Camera arrived unable to power up or run on battery.  Contacted Arlo Support, they set up a return but *I am responsible for costs to ship* them back a defective unit?! Netgear, when your customers have had been frustrated spending time trying to get your product to work, spending time looking up issues online, then spending time troubleshooting with technical support, then taking time to box and ship a unit... then you tell me I have to pay to ship a mistake you made? Incredibly frustrated. Only company I’ve ever heard of where customers are responsible for paying to ship out of the box defective unit.
title: Bad support policy

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Brian M Carpenter
content: The camera worked well for 2 years and I was generally pretty happy with the picture quality.  After 2 years, the battery would no longer charge up (the battery itself is fine, somehow the connection between the usb charging cable and the battery in the camera was no longer making contact).  This seems to be a somewhat common problem with the camera from google searches.  After contacting the company to see if there is a service guide available so I could investigate the problem, I was told there is none.  So, the long term reliability of the device leaves a lot to be desired.  That's why I'm giving it 2 stars.
title: Worked for 2 years, then battery would no longer charge

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: earl lee
content: Absolutely would not buy again.  The software is terrible.  I can’t tell you how many times the geofencing just breaks, and a phone won’t be recognized. This results in the alarm going off, but the iPhone software breaks, so you can’t turn it off.  Try this 4 times in 2 days, and you’ll hate this device and this company.  The battery life is also horrible.  What do they claim, up to 6 months?  One of camera batteries has to be swapped out every 2 weeks.  Others, 6-8 weeks.  Lies.  All lies. Read online about geofencing issues and battery life issues and software issues, and buy something else.  They might be on gen 3, but it’s still an overpriced beta product.
title: The software is terrible. I can’t tell you how many times the ...

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Alison
content: This camera just stopped working right around a year of having it. We bought a new battery and that didn’t fix the problem. We weren’t super happy with the quality of the picture to begin with so looks like we’ll be purchasing a different system.
title: Like throwing money in the trash

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Morgan A.
content: First the good - The item arrived on time and in great shape. The packaging is intense, clearly designed by engineers with too much time on their hands. The cameras are nice in appearance, the mounting systems are easy and well thought out. The base station easy to use and the mobile application is very easy and ergonomic.  Now the bad - We purchased 9 cameras because they claim the cameras are of HD quality. Well here is the problem, a camera mounted outside next to our driveway cannot read a license plate just 12 feet from a vehicle. The video quality of the Arlo Pro leaves much to be desired, and yet is SO VERY IMPORTANT from a security perspective. At best the camera might help identify the make and model of a vehicle but forget capturing a license plate. I chatted online with support, which was courteous but not helpful, They indicated that for the camera to work at its best you need an internet download speed of 1.5 mbps, I explained we currently have 8.6 mbps. The rep tried to suggest that having 9 cameras would be the problem with bandwidth except that so far we have only used one camera at a time. For spending 1000.00 I am very unsatisfied with the video quality.  Our cameras are close enough to the base, they indicate 100% connectivity to our router, but the video quality is sub par and we are unhappy customers. Like I said, everything else is great,  I would give 4.5 stars for the app and website, but it doesn't matter if the camera's cannot serve their primary function of being useful in a security situation.
title: Poor video image quality from Arlo Pro camera

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: rob scott
content: Buyer beware. The camera is good but the batteries and customer service are awful. I have 4 batteries that are completely dead and will not accept a charge. This is an Issue that has been positively identified by Netgear. It is a constant source of conversation on all the customer support forums. The battery warranty is only for one year and Netgear customer support will not budge on replacement of these batteries once they are dead.  I have been a net gear customer for over eight years and have the Premier monthly subscription and none of that mattered when it came time to try and fix the battery issue. So if you purchase this camera just be aware that the batteries do not last more than a year and they will not replace them after the one year mark. If I hadn’t spent all of the money on these cameras I would’ve bought the Ring system instead. To say I’m disappointed in the quality of the battery system and the customer service is an understatement. I would not recommend buying Arlo until they fix the battery issue.
title: Buyer Beware. The battery life is awful.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Jon
content: I tried several brands of camera (Nest, Ring, Arlo), and all of them were good, but Arlo was the best all-around. It's motion-detection accuracy was best - very few false alarms and it only missed an event I knew about once in the three weeks I've been using it. All three cameras miss events from time to time. Installation was the easiest of the three - one screw and a magnetic half-dome mount that you pop the camera on, making it easy to aim. It's the smallest and least noticeable of the three. All three did a good job of walking you through the setup to get the camera on your network and viewing video on your phone, but Arlo's was the easiest because you just need to plug the base station into your network, then add cameras by pressing a connect button on the base station and the camera. The base-station is also a plus because for me because it has better range than my wireless network. The other cameras didn't always get a reliable signal at the far reaches of my house - especially the garage which juts out and has more concrete intervening. The battery-life is superior to Ring - enough to make it preferable to ones you have to plug in like Nest, which don't need to recharge, but I didn't have outlets in all the places I wanted a camera.. All three cameras cost about the same, but only Arlo has a free cloud-recording service that's good enough for most customers: 7 days of recording for up to five cameras (you pay for more cameras or recording history). The battery life is great, and recharging is easy since the camera comes off the magnetic mount easily. Altogether, the Arlo was the most accurate, easy and cheapest (because of the free cloud service).
title: and all of them were good, but Arlo was the best all-around

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Michael_D
content: I purchased the Arlo Pro 5 camera system when I moved into our new home. Pros: Good picture quality, motion detection is fair (sometimes too sensitive), night vision works well enough to pick up people or animals at night with some ambient light. Set-up was fairly simple but took sometime to complete. Customer service is rather good when dealing with battery failures. Cons: Battery life diminishes quickly, additions to the system (doorbell and chimes in my case) need to be constantly re-synced with the system. I have had all 5 batteries for the cameras go bad, open cells in the lithium battery packs. Overall it is not a bad system, it works well when it works. I would like to see Arlo put a little more time into the development of the batteries.
title: Batteries are terrible

content: The cameras take great video and are easy to set up. The Screw security mount is absolute garbage. Throw it out! The screw sits so shallowly in the base of the camera that little force can cause it to pop off. The screw security mount, provides no more security for your camera, then the magnetic one, because the mount it self and the camera can be quickly detached with a quick twists. Don't risk your camera falling like mine!!!

content: Don't get me wrong, I love the product.  But there are a couple little gotchas that I wish we could fix.  The picture quality is pretty good, and the wireless aspect makes me overlook some of the gaps, but I'd love a way to fix them.  I would love a way to tell the cam where the trigger is,.  It uses the edges and maybe 50 % of the time I miss movement.  It has to be really close to the camera and moving slow.  The other weirdness seems to be the "spin up" time.  If something does trip the camera, it needs to start recording and takes a little bit to get into focus.  So if something runs past it would trip, but the first second or 2 are fuzzy, rastered, and by the time it gets up to speed it could be too late.
title: Great concept, but some glitches

author: Karen M Warburton
content: I like these little cameras, though I wish they worked a little better.  I ordered 5 arlo pro cameras to add to my base station and singular camera.  What I got was an entire kit with a new base station, 4 regular arlo cameras (not the pro cameras) and an indoor only camera.  I needed the cameras urgently, so used them as is and won't return, and I continue to have to tweak with them to get them to work without too much delay.  But I and disappointed that I didn't get what I ordered.  Again, I won't be returning because of the urgent need for the cameras and the hassle of having to return.  These have so much potential. If they pick up motion, it would be nice if they could start the recording a few seconds earlier than the motion (I've had that on other cameras before, just not wireless ones).  The options are rather lacking in terms of what you want them to do.  I've had to delete a rule and recreate it with the same exact information in order to get it to function properly.  I have it set to record after motion for 30 seconds, but I get a 16 second video that just stops and gets stuck in the middle.

Two issues though, battery life is not even close to what is advertised, typically will last about 3 weeks. product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Christopher R. Gonzalez
content: First of all, the pro cameras live up to their rave reviews with regards to picture quality and sound. I was pleasantly surprised it wasn't hype. And it was super easy to set up. Almost too easy that I kept wondering if I was supposed to do more. Where it lacks is the delay on when sound begins when you press the microphone icon on the app display, and the delay in sound communication between the two parties. It's the same way cell phones were ten years ago with that annoying delay, only sometimes even longer. And the on / off of the microphone has a delay, too. I have extremely high speed internet and have several online streaming channels that rarely glitch and deliver a nice picture. So my internet can't be the problem. It may just be technology not caught up to Arlo, yet, I'm not sure. Am I being nit picky? Probably but these two cameras, the base, combined with the Galaxy 7 edge phone I bought just so I could have the best possible user experience weren't cheap either. I didn't read anywhere about this sound delay, and at the end of the day, I spent $1200. I guess I wish I had known about the delay going in. That delay is what  is keeping me from feeling I got my entire money's worth. I'm giving it four stars to be fair in case it's just that the technology isn't there yet. Hopefully, someday soon the two-way audio communication will be in real time.
title: And it was super easy to set up
