content: I did extensive research for wireless security cameras.  In the end, I bought the Arlo Pro cameras.  They were pricier than the other two options I was looking at, but after receiving them I am extremely happy  with my decision.  Camera set-up was a breeze and the Arlo app is intuitive and easy to use.  I opted for the Pro instead of the Pro 2 because I value battery life over picture quality.  In well lighted situations, the picture quality is great.  Once you get into dim or night environments, picture quality does suffer but not to a point where you can't determine the activity you are viewing.  I really enjoy having the different "modes" for the cameras.  This makes it easy to customize automation of when the cameras turn on and off.  I would advise buying an extra battery and charger so that you can swap batteries immediately instead of waiting on the battery to charge.
title: Well worth the money

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Kenneth Washington
content: The only thing that I don't like is the geofencing. I bought this system because a friend has it and he likes it very much. The app just will not operate like it is suppose to using geofencing! When I leave home it seems to arm the system but sometimes it says I need internet connection. Then when I return home I get the same message and the system does not disarm on its own. I really want this to work and I would like to put the app on my wife's as well but I am  afraid to do this because it's not working right on mine. Also the directions are plane and simple but not detailed enough!
title: Not completely happy with this product!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: SeasonChaser
content: Decent quality in night vision, alerting of motion, and clarity. There is about a 10-15 second delay in the alert. Must be recharged about 2-1/2 to 3 months. Difficult to insert charging plug when camera is in place. Always have to remove to charge and then reset coverage angle with phone.
title: Serves its purpose.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Curtis
content: These cameras have performed exceptionally well.  Had them for a little over a week now and the battery life seems to be excellent.  They have been used quite a bit (both motion sensor and live view) and the battery indicator is still 'full'.  The default image quality is good, I haven't tried adjusting it with the slider control.  I really like the fact that the cameras are small and unobtrusive and can be placed just about anywhere.  It's nice being able to keep an eye on things from just about anywhere.  It does seem that the video does have a little bit of a lag time (several seconds) and the speaker on the cameras is pretty quiet.  This seems that it could make using them for two way communication difficult but I have not tried it as of yet.  Overall, very happy with the purchase of these cameras.
title: Very Happy with these Arlo Cameras

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Allen
content: For the price it's a good video surveillance option. It does have some flaws. It's about 3-5 seconds delayed to real time. Facial features are not easily identifiable a little pixelated. But free cloud storage for 7days is really nice. And you can have multiples. Picks up audio very well and has a decent speaker for talking with others. Having one by your front door is it good start but it would really benefit you to set up other angles in case your one camera misses something. Update over a year later, it still has it's quirks but not bad. Would really like to see a quicker response and better image quality. But overall it gets the job done.
title: For the price it's a good video surveillance option

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: NR
content: This device builds like a toy for children. Every features on this device is having problem. Request timed out, motion detector not detecting, Activity zones is missing on web browser and Ipad but appears on galaxy s8, (incompetent developer) Over priced accessories. Log in issues, not all usb drive will work with it. Skin will defects night vision. You name it, the device has all the issues. I will try it for another few days see if I get more problem. Oh almost forgot the package came broken, luckily device was not damaged.
title: Mickey mouse product.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: G. Redshaw
content: I was a little skeptical at first about the product, but after using the camera, base station, and the phone app for about a month now, I am surprised how much the camera picks up, the night vision is pretty good, and the app on the phone is easy to use and find what you are looking for...Now I just need some extra cameras for the rest of the home to cover the other access points. The only negative thing I can think of is the battery life depends on how active the camera is, ours was picking up a lot of movement from the cats so it was able to last just over three weeks, I don't see this being an issue if you have solar power chargers for outside use.
title: Great product and peace of mind.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Willie F.
content: Arlo cameras are great cameras. I have been using them for a couple months now and have noticed the following. The app for android is totally different from the IOS app. All functions you need to get to in the android are on the device page , in the ios version I had to hunt for it at the bottom of the screen after. The cameras charge hold up well depending on how often it detects motion. I had a battery needing to be charged every week and a half, it has since been changed. The setup of the light bridge took over a hour to set up with the assistance of an online tech. Over all I would purchase another set of these, and have for my mother. They are a great investment..
title: Arlo Pro User

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Jacob Castro
content: Works great! The talk back system isn’t that great there’s a lot of lag and back and forth communication is impossible most of the time.  Battery life is really good, image is nice as well. App and website user interface are easy to use and intuitive, alerts to phone are also a great feature.Mounts work well and are easy to set up.  In my opinion it’s a great system that meets security needs if you don’t want to throw away money on a monthly subscription service.
title: Great easy to use system.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Rick
content: Night vision works up to 20' Indoors, Outdoors is totally a different story. Night vision outdoor works best in lighted area. My experience using it dark area sucks, In order for it to properly work Arlo cam cannot be place no higher then 7 to10 ft. If cam gets stolen theres no other way to trace or located. You can’t charge the battery outdoor if its below 30%.Battery only last 3 month and that depends on your Setting. So Im very disappointed with my outdoor cam purchase, Maybe Arlo should remove the Language from outdoor to Indoor Cam. There are some good for the Arlo Cam, Easy set-up. Great HD pic.
title: Night vision outdoor works best in lighted area

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Spaniel_love
content: When I first got this I gave it five stars.  It worked great and I only had to recharge the battery pack every 2 weeks. I've had it for little over a year now and it won't hold a charge for more than a few days.  I even bought a new battery pack directly from Arlo for $50.00 and same deal.  Only holds a charge for 3 days tops and I have to recharge again.  Total waste of money and their idea of "support" is a community-like blog!  Too much $$ for this junk!
title: Switched my review

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Curtis G.
content: Love Arlo.  It is just a camera nothing tied to a security system at all, but does give you the ability to be notified of movement / sound at a camera location.  If used outside, birds and other little critters set it off, but that is expected.  Hold charge extremely well, and don't take that long to recharge.  Mobile app lets me stay in contact with it at all times.  Netgear is always updating the software to enhance it.  Does cost to have cloud saves and such, but not that expensive overall.  Truly wire free which is fantastic for me.
title: EXCELLENT WIRE FREE CAMERA

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: tiffany
content: I have had Arlo cameras for a while. I recently got the pro system. Pros of the pro system is local storage. The audio is another benefit. The microphone is extremely quiet though.  The night vision is good and equal on both systems. Cons: both the pro router and the regular one doesn't have good enough wifi strength. Wish there was an option to use my existing router to connect. It often loses connectivity due to interference from the two.  Overall good security system with a good price.  The chat custom service is the worst though. And on the old system, the night vision stopped working.
title: Good for many. Perhaps not for some.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Robert Edesess, Jr.
content: Easy to use and set up.  After watching some YouTube videos, I was able to figure out the 2-way comm and add some IFTTT features like turning on the house lights when Arlo detects motion.  Battery life is great with cameras set to turn on only at night.  Only tricky part is finding a good spot for the camera which isn't conspicuous yet provides a good sight and resolution for videos. I also love that there aren't monthly fees (for now).  Comes with free 7-day backup in the cloud (and super easy to access on mobile app).  I also plugged a flash drive into the base for local storage. The downside is that smart home tech is moving fast so it's hard to choose to be wedded to one system now when we're in the early days.  An integrated offering in the future from Google or Apple could be an interesting offering in the future.
title: Works great for its task but need to combine systems from different manufacturers for your smart home

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: HighReliability
content: BEWARE! The "FREE" internet monitoring service is an absolute requirement for this device to function. When Netgear's servers are down, you basically have a $150 paperweight. Right now, the servers are down, affecting all Arlo's WORLDWIDE. Netgear does not seem to be addressing this competently. For a security system, reliability of Arlo is inadequate.
title: $150 paperweight

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Philip Andrews
content: First of all - I love technology and easy to use technology at that.  I love researching products before I buy and feel 100% satisfied I got the best solution on the market at the best value.  Here's the scoop Great camera to keep an eye on the house - very pleased.  Purchased 3 and they work great without having to set up wires. - Good visibility, motion sensitivity is easy to fine tune, night vision works - Customizable alerts work (based on motion and/or sound) - Best bang for the buck available today - Alarm is loud enough to let someone breaking into the house know.  I think the alarm option is a better option than the sound of a shotgun.  I would love another alarm unit that I could plug in upstairs as part of the network - so 2 alarms would go off in the house (I have 2 stories in a long house so the noise carries upstairs but not as piercing upstairs). - I am fine with recharging every Xmonths Cons - audio is not strong (nor would I expect it from such a small unit) - UI is a little clunky, you have to search for where you set alerts.  Could be more intuitive - zooming in gets blurry when maxed.  If someone is trying to break into my car I probably won't get a clear view of their face as a result. - screwed in ceiling attachment can be unscrewed easily making for a fairly easy steal.  Would love to see a more secure option for outside.
title: Best value on the market

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Lewis & Associates
content: Installation and set up was pretty easy. YOU MUST have above 1MBPS UPLOAD (not download) to update firmware. I had to take to my office as my rural internet is right at the low end of the 1MBPS UPLOAD requirement. I am very satisfied with the security options, especially setting up custom modes. I have set outside cameras to record on motion, and interior cameras to trigger on motion the terrifying alarm. Great product. My video quality is a wee bit low, but I suspect that is as a result of my crappy rural ISP speeds than the fault of the cameras. It is so easy to deactivate when home, and reactivate when away. Motion sensors are "just right" triggering on my dog but not my cat ;) Also, can deactivate any of the cameras as needed to avoid embarasing untoward pictures/ LOL. I love being able to self monitor, and have an automatic alarm for the interior. I have been reviewing and evaluating security systems constantly for the last couple years and waited a long time for a wifi and smart device with an interactive security system that meets all my expectations . . . well done NetGear!!,
title: The best home security yet!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Customer Review
content: Almost no use at all. Doesn’t pick anything moving up and night vision is a joke. Something is wrong with this camera, we have another and the night vision is clear. When it does pick something up its too late to see who it even was. Tried to get warranty support and they make it impossible. Even to the extent when they say, "Call Arlo Technical Support" there is no phone number listed. You have to go hunting elsewhere for it. They try to give you the runaround and waste your time so you can't file a claim. Find a different system.
title: terrible range; lack of motion response, even worse for video clarity at night

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Aiijay
content: Too slow for comfort. I just set up my Arlo Pro This is day one and I am experiencing almost a 5 minutes delay in the live video streaming. I will watch for a few more weeks and provide an update. But right now, I am horrified at this. U shouldn’t spend good money for a camera that will operate at lower than par. My YI camera is stream faster and better quality video than these and I got them at 1/7th the price of the arlo pro.
title: Unbelievably slow cameras

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Mrs. F
content: We purchased 2 cameras and base system for our small business yard. The initial set up was easy but one camera lost the internet connection after 2 days. I tried to re-sync to the base without success. I phoned customer service and was walked through different resets which were also unsuccessful and was advised to call my Internet provider to have the cannel changed to a less busy channel. Success! We also raised the camera up to about 10 feet. No problems until the batteries both needed charging after 7 days of heavy traffic and testing. The cameras were both "off line" for approximately 1 hour after they were charged and placed back outside. They eventually found their signal and are working again. I am pleased with the system and understand the limitations and occasional hiccups of a wireless system. The distance is only half of the advertised 300 feet but raising the camera up keeps the signal steady. The night vision gave us a clear view of a wandering coyote. The speaker is clear on my end but very soft on the camera side. Overall,  I would recommend this system for outdoor use within 150 feet. We will add more cameras inside and out.
title: Arlo Pro system for outdoor security use

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Dustin
content: Don’t buy Arlo unless you have absolutely no use for cameras. They never work, they are always offline, they don’t detect motion and when they do, it’s too late! Batteries need recharged every week or two. When you click on the camera to view it - it literally takes 30 seconds before you can see “live video” even though the video still has a 5 second delay or worse. The microphone and speakers are a joke, can’t hear unless it’s right at your ear. Have had multiple vehicle break ins right in front of the camera and the motion never detects it and nothing is recorded. The bridge and WIFI must be right on top of these cameras for them to even work as terribly as they do. The range from WIFI to cameras is about 8-10 feet and they still won’t work half the time. WIFI extenders do nothing. This product is junk, look at other options.
title: Waste of Money!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Chris Miller
content: Followed all setup instructions. Battery would drain fast. Adjusted camera to reduce field of vision to only my porch, eliminating higher traffic areas (sidewalk). Same thing. Struggled with Arlo customer support, but was sent a new battery. Seemed to fix issue, but within the month, drain was back. Lasts about a day now. It’s been a little over a year, most of the time system is down due to no battery. I give up. If it were plugged in, it would be great. I was happy with all the other features. But I bought it because it’s wireless. That’s the whole point. I’m done.
title: Battery Issues from the get-go

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Jim Tye
content: Worked fine for a few months, stopped charging or powering on.  Even with a brand new charger.  What a big waste of money.  My other Arlo Pro did the same thing.  Instead of buying another Arlo battery for 60 bucks, which may or may not be the issue, I am going to get a Ring Camera instead.
title: Works Great - for a couple months :(

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: NYGman
content: I love the Arlo Pro camera system. I just added an extra camera to bring my total to 5, and have ordered 3 lights to complete my system. After a year with the system I could not be happier. The process to add this camera to my existing system was seemless. I have recommended them to others and know 3 people who have them and love them as much as me.
title: Easy to add, add on camera

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Kirill Nikonov
content: The camera itself is ok (didn't compare with the other cameras, but easy to install, no interruptions with work etc. so - ), nothing bad. But the batteries tend to hold less than claimed on the website and one of them died after less than a year. And surprise-surprise, the manufacturer's warranty doesn't cover batteries after six months. So if you decide to buy this camera (and again, the camera itself is ok), don't be cheap and also buy a long protection plan through Amazon. I would even put 4 stars for it, but the language of the manufacturer's warranty doesn't even mention batteries (I checked with ctrl+f), and when they say they don't cover it - well, quite a surprise. I was lucky I bought an extra insurance. So quite deceptive in this case, and I didn't appreciate it.
title: Buy the protection plan for it, it's a must-have thing!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Roger
content: I added this to my package of standard Arlos.  I put the Pro outside our front door.  Now I find the battery stops charging when the temp falls below 32F.  That makes the rechargable Pro virtually worthless in our Midwest winters.  It's below that at 15F today and will stay that cold for the extended forecast.  I hope a fix comes for this real soon!  I'm very disappointed in the Pro. And I leave for FL midweek for the rest of the winter.
title: Worthless outside camera in Midwest winter

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Alex Sanz
content: I bought a wired camera system but when I opened and saw the numbers of wires I needed to connect I immediately returned it. I got this system instead and have not looked back since. Installation is simple but I do recommend the screw in mounts if using them outdoors. Indoors the magnet mounts are more than sufficient.
title: Good alternative to having to run wires in your ceiling or attic

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: HockeyRx
content: We bought this item as an add on to an existing system. Two points have been a disappointment. The battery life has been poor. Even with the warmer weather coming on the amount of time between recharges has decreased. Second item is sensitivity. Perhaps it is just our front door location but the wind is constantly setting off the camera. We lowered the sensitivity to 20% and it was still a problem.
title: Disappointing

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Brandon Pettit
content: I looked into many different camera systems before deciding on Arlo. While the system is more expensive that a lot of the other WiFi camera options the free cloud storage and remote access to your clips was a huge long term cost savings over ongoing fees many of the other would charge. Setup is easy and the system is expandable which is a great function. The camera is sleek looking and diappears on the front of my house.
title: Great camera, can’t beat free cloud storage

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Nameless
content: BATTERY: the first use the battery lived 6 months. The second recharge the battery lived 3 months. The third recharge of the battery only lived 50 days. This is a problem because I have 5 cameras installed and I have to change and recharge the batteries in a very short time. I live in a family house, with a standard transit of any family. Each battery recharge lives less and less every day. The original Arlo batteries are a disappointment in their life time.
title: Battery: Disappointment.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: V.G.D.
content: After two months of use the camera does not show in color, it appears in night-time mode all the time, it looks like a negative from print film. It seems its a common problem, some people found some solutions as noted on the  Aro Website BUT I tried all of their recommendations and it still doesn't work. The camera is not worth a penny.
title: DON'T BUY

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: E
content: These cameras are convenient because they are wireless, and the video quality is really good.  The problem I have is the battery doesn't last as long as I hoped.  So, we are having to take them down and replace the batteries probably every month which is annoying.  I have extra batteries on hand so we don't have to wait for them to be charged.  The motion capture seems to be glitchy since even though there is motion I will get several 30 sec videos vs. one continuous long video.  Install though was easy and I do like the fact that they are wireless.
title: Good but not great.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: hannes ter linde
content: The camera's are awesome. very small and easy to install. the ap works great and is very intuitive. It is very easy to manage and the alerts give you a great sense of what is going on.  The option to send an alarm while you not around is so valuable. Besides a great product i want to share that their support organization is awesome. one of my camera's did not work out of the box and their support staff work very diligently with me to resolve the issue. When we tried all common ways to resolves they issued an rma. I had the option for expedited shipping which i could pay through their online portal. i only needed to pay the difference of cost between overnight or 2 business days and as said this was optional and on my personal direction.  i recieved the new unit and during the entire time i was kept updated via emails from them. when the replacement unit came it also came with a return label for shipping the old one back to them. as said this solution is great and 5 stars is the minimum i can give them.
title: great sense of security

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: FasterReader123
content: I purchased this set to put on my front and back doors. I initially sought something like a Ring or Nest, but was turned off by the monthly fee to see past video feed. After researching these and learning from a friend his satisfaction with his Arlos I purchased these and have been very happy. I was amazed at the ease of set up- download the app and once you've created an account it will walk you through the entire thing. Mounting was easy as well. No cords meant I just placed the screw and positioned the camera where I thought it would be best located. Once set, I double checked the feed. I like that I can set times to motion sensor and turn off completed if needed. I also like that I can pull the camera down completely to charge when needed or when I don't want them up. The magnet to hold it in place helps with breeze of installation. Would highly recommend.
title: Easy set up and great feed

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: K Hedrick
content: Arlo cameras are the best surveillance cameras I've ever used. All I had to do was install the battery,  press the sync button on both the camera and the home base and I was online. Never before have I had this easy of a Time installing a camera. The camera  gives a crystal clear high definition picture and is easy on the batteries. Is all that I look for in a  surveillance camera and I feel much more comfortable leaving the house now that I have installed Arlo cameras all over the house. Thank you Arlo  for a great camera
title: Great Camera

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: kw
content: I've been through three of these and they drain through the battery in a week and won't stay connect to the base unit.  Another one does. Update.  Now the base unit is down.  A month of owning and have gone through the entire unit of problems and the support is slow tedious and takes hours to process.  Thank God for Amazon and offering an extension to return.
title: I've been through three of these and they drain through ...

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Gerald
content: I purchased the Arlo Pro for outdoor use.  I have two other brands of outdoor cameras as well.  The Arlo Pro outperforms the other brands overall.  The Arlo Pro has NO wires, and after a week, the rechargeable battery is still at full power.  The sound picks up incredible detail, including our dog's nail-claws as he walks across our wood patio and a cat's meow 20 feet away.  The image is crystal clear during the day, and darker black and white at night but picks up excellent detail at 20 feet away at night.  My voice comes through loud and clear when using the talk mode.  The central indoor transmitter is 45 feet away from the outdoor camera, separated by a brick fireplace, and connection is just fine.  The transmitter is much smaller than I anticipated.  I'm very pleased with this purchase and would like more cameras.  I do not usually write reviews.
title: Best in Class

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Folmon
content: Arlo pro is easy to setup and instruction is very easy to follow, The motion detector recording range is very short and there is delay in recording and sometimes the set duration do not cover all the activities that is going on. I have one in front of my garage, it will not detect motion until you almost get to the garage door, I tried different motion setting without success, cannot even detect motion on the work way at the end of my driveway which is about 20 feet from the camera even though i can see the street when i view the camera; and the same applies to one in front of my door and in my backyard, you have to get close to the door before the motion is activated. I believe it has to be software issue; recording until activities stop cut off when activities is still on which means the motion range is very inadequate. I purchased 3 cameras which does not serves the main reason I purchased it for.
title: Arlo Pro

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: timdumbleton
content: I purchased this two years ago to monitor a vacation house while I was away. It was easy to install, and has worked well for the past two years. I enjoy the interface of the app, and the motion detection is good. However, in the past two months, the base station has been "going offline" every few weeks, and you can only reboot the unit physically, after calling Arlo Support. This renders all the security cameras completely useless. If the internet powers out intermittently, the base station does not reboot automatically. This has been an issue I have been noticing for many Arlo users on support boards. I feel like Arlo chooses not to recognize this as a deep, inherent flaw in it's technology. For someone who needs a reliable system to constantly monitor a property hours away, this is not a good system for me, and I will look into Nest cameras.
title: Unreliable Base station keeps going offline. Cannot reboot remotely.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Anonymous
content: We are very happy with the Arlo system! We recently moved to a new house and heard about a few car break-ins in the area. Arlo has given us peace of mind and the motion alerts are very efficient! I ran electrical to the cameras so I don't have to deal with recharging the batteries but it worked fine on battery before the install! We will definitely be purchasing more cameras in the near future. The attached picture shows the motion alert we got the first night after the install.. a big spider decided the camera under the eaves above the garage was a good place for a nest.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Matthew M.
content: I've been using the Arlo system for about a week now.  I have 4 cameras placed around the perimeter of my house.  I've captured some beautiful wildlife walking in my backyard - great videos that I download and show off to people at work!  Installation was extremely simple and the only quirk I've encountered is sometimes the camera above my garage facing my driveway has false positives.  It seems to only happen at night and only when it's raining - readjusting it, lowering motion sensitivity, and resyncing it with the base hub haven't solved the issue.  I've seen on some forums that this appears to be something others have encountered as well.  Perhaps a firmware update in the future will solve the issue.  But outside of that small issue, everything else has been great and the app is wonderful.  I added Arlo to SmartThings and they seem to play well together, though I tend to mostly use the Arlo app instead because it has more features.  Overall, very happy and even considering purchasing a fifth camera for inside that I can trigger when I'm not home.
title: Excellent

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Anthony
content: After having the Arlo Pro for over 2 weeks now, it seems to have exceeded our expectations. I read about the original Arlo having issues with lag time between when it detected motion and when it starts recording, but I find no such issue with the Pro. Lag time was between 1-2 seconds, which I find more than acceptable for a completely wireless and weather proof device. I like the fact that the new base station has a 100db siren built-in, but I wish there were more options to configure it, such as timing (e.g. when activated, it gives a few audible beeps that's user configurable in order to disable it in case of an accidental activation, which most modern alarm systems have). The way it's set up now is you either have to activate it manually from the app, or have it go off immediately if motion is detected. I wish at least 1 outdoor mount was included with all package configurations, as while the magnetic mount is nice, doesn't leave much to security. I believe currently, only the 4 pack and above include 1 outdoor mount. The app is pretty awesome and Netgear has really been listening to its users via the forum for feedback and changes. They've recently integrated IFTTT into their software, which is great for adding customization to its functionality. For example, I have a recipe activated where "If motion is triggered, then turn on Philips Hue light" for added security. Can't say enough good things about this. I wish the cost of entry was a little lower (and the accessories more affordable), but I'm happy with what it has to offer.
title: Great little device that does it all

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: BigMAC
content: I bought the 6 camera version of the Arlo Pro system. It can handle up to 15 from what I've read and I fully intend on getting a few extra to cover some remaining blind spots. It comes with free, 7-day recording cloud storage for up to 6 cameras, which I thought was pretty sweet. The system is awesome and very responsive. Motion and audio triggers are outstanding, hardly ever missing a beat. The two way audio and live view work very well, even when I'm on my cell data. The system itself is incredibly easy to set up. I have a 2000 sq/ft two-story home and the hub is placed on one corner of the home where our Wi-Fi router sits. The two don't interfere with each other, and the cameras on the opposite end of the house still have full signal strength. Also, the batteries still show a full charge after two weeks and a ton of usage. It's a bit pricey, but in my opinion, is worth every penny. I would definitely recommend it!
title: So far, very happy!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Randy H
content: I have (2) Arlo Pro and (1) Arlo Pro 2 cameras with a base station. Easy setup and configuration, and had the cameras installed in a manner of minutes! The mobile access is clear and convenient. There’s a small time delay, but that’s not a big deal. I’m planning on purchasing the Arlo spotlights as well to prevent having to leave the porch and side of the house lights on. Battery last a long time (two to three months) and recharge with in hours. Would highly recommend the Arlo products.
title: Works great!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Collin Phillips
content: Arlo continues to surprise me. It is ready to go right out of the box. The features and customizable settings are perfect for anyone’s needs. I personally have mine set to differentiate between people, cars, animals, ect. and send me a smart notification with a picture when activity is detected. It’s great because I receive a preview on my Apple Watch. The picture quality is HD both during the day and at night. The audio is shockingly clear and will pick up the smallest of notices at a distance. One of the best parts about the entire system is that it is wireless! No cords whatsoever. The battery life has blown me away. It’s been a week and the charge on both cameras still has over 80% left. The ability to add additional cameras a plus. I recommend Arlo to anyone wanting to keep their home secure.
title: Excellent product that has exceeded expectations in all areas!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: smiely
content: We ordered this camera to use in a chicken coop and it works well. So well that we ordered another and are planning for a few more. The magnet mount is fabulous - we have a chain link fence as part of the outdoor run and the camera just attaches right to the top pole. EASY! The version that has sound (Arlo Pro vs Arlo) is the BEST - we particularly like the 2-way audio features since someone in the house can talk to the person out in the coop, if necessary. The only issue is that if you're watching the live camera, it disconnects a lot so you have reconnect it over and over again. This camera is supposed to be a security camera so it's not the fault of the camera, it's how we're using it that's the issue. No big deal, though.
title: Cool little camera

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Seb
content: Overall it is pretty good.  I can now see what is going on from the comfort of my desktop or my phone.  It was very easy to set up and love that it has night vision, two way sound, decent picture quality and batteries that can be recharged after a few months of use.  Suggestions for improvement include the design of the website.  It feels a bit clunky navigating through the menus.  For the camera it would be nice if the delay would be reduced or eliminated.  Right now it takes at least 8 seconds to view a live picture.  One can also box in a specific area that you want the camera to capture.  It would be nice if you could draw free hand the area you need captured instead of adjusting the size of a rectangular box.  Regarding the magnetic mount that comes with the camera.  It would be nice if the buyer had an option at time of purchase which mount to have.  The magnetic is fine for indoor use but outdoors exposes your camera to theft since it is not bolted down.  Because of this I had to go buy mounts that are more secure and screw into the back of the camera.  It's not perfect as someone can still unscrew it from the mount but better than the magnetic mount where someone could just swing at it with a baseball bat to knock it down. My wife is happy with the system and so am I as it is.  It adds a little bit more peace of mind knowing what is going on around the house when we are not home.  Thanks Arlo for this great product.
title: Very Nice System

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)

content: A neighbor suggested the Arlo Pro and how the cameras were totally wireless, powered by batteries.  I purchased the base with 6 cameras on Amazon and within a few hours had everything installed and working.  I bought aftermarket outdoor mounts, the kind that the camera screws into, and although I can't compare to what was in the box, they look good and were easy to install.  The settings are very easy to use and understand so if functionality/interface is important, you're covered.  Image quality is good.  It's not the best on the market but it's pretty good so no complaints there.  I can't comment on the battery life yet other than to say my neighbor got about 6 months on similar settings which is also impressive.  Overall I am very happy with this system and would definitely recommend it.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)

I have returned everything and am looking into other systems.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)

content: From top to bottom this is a great camera system. From the app and functionality to the actual installation to the quality of security it provides this truly is worth every penny. The app is so easy to use and it’s nice to be able to go live at any time. The camera quality is great. Truly a great system. My favorite part is how smoothly the installation process is. The mount makes the camera positioning very versatile and the wide angle makes it so easy to cover the front of my house and yard.
title: Great camera system!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Zanca
content: The video quality is really nice. Like the fact that it is wireless & cordless & the battery life is good (full battery lasted about two months for us). Like the fact that it has a 2 way speaker. My main & biggest issue is the sensor delay, it’s a good 5 secs before it starts recording which may not seem like much but, a lot of times, it catches the person late so you only get a glimpse when they’re walking towards the camera, or if walking fast, it catches them walking back so you only see the back of their heads.
title: Great quality & battery life, bad delay

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: M. Weeks
content: I bought the Arlo Pro system to expand my existing 2 site Arlo system during Black Friday, mostly because of the price. I thought the sound would be useful, but wasn't a big deal to me. Well, I'm already a little hooked on the audio capability, but the real surprise was the night vision! None of the reviews I read mentioned any difference in the night vision capabilities between Arlo and Arlo Pro, and in a small space, like a bedroom, it doesn't matter much. But when I put some cameras outside, oh my gosh! The Arlo Pro definitely has much better illuminators. I'm attaching a couple pix to demonstrate. In a dark setting you can see much farther with the Arlo Pro. I will not be buying any more base Arlo cameras now--at least if they will be used in large, dark spaces. I'll suck up the extra cost for anything going outside, for sure.
title: What a pleasant surprise!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Audiophile
content: I am a first time homebuyer and was a bit hesitant to drop a lot of money for these expensive cameras. I also had trouble deciding between these and the Arlo Pro 2. Given the picture quality is great, the battery lasts longer than the Arlo Pro 2, and the price is a little better it is well worth it. If I was allowed to put wires around my house, perhaps I would consider the Arlo Pro 2 for their advanced features. Great product and would buy again.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
