title: Arlo Image quality is now garbage

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Mac
content: The Arlo cameras are pretty good. The motion activated record lags a bit, and the base firmware is a little glitchy, but they still work okay. I've had a lot of trouble with the geofencing settings. Apparently, according to Arlo tech support, if a device you're setting up for geofencing has special characters in its name then it causes problems, but the software doesn't warn you of this when you add the device. What's worse is that a device can never be removed from your geofencing list, which means if you've added a device with special characters in its network name then you get rid of the device your geofencing won't work unless you reset the system to factory defaults.
title: A little glitchy, but usable

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Sandra Parker
content: Hello all. I’m sad to report that I went from a 5 star fan to a 2 star reviewer. I was initially so excited by the ease of use, but one defective camera and two months of diligent work on my part to try to resolve with their customer service have soured me on this product. Of the two pro cameras I own, one is on a solar panel and having no issues, the second one is on battery power because it’s in the shade and so the first time I tried to charge the camera after the battery ran down, it wouldn't charge. I've now spent two months and countless phone calls to the manufacturer trying to resolve and have been very disappointed in thier cust. svc.  After two months I still don't have a working camera.
title: Initial excitement faded after extensive attempt to address defective product with manufacturer.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Gary S. Wasserman
content: After 1 week using the Arlo Pro I think I can give a provide an initial impressions. The camera hardware seems top notch. Sturdy structure and strong magnet to mount with. Instructions were very easy to follow. The video is very good for 720P when using the best video configuration. Siren is pretty load - but could be a little louder in my opinion. Field of vision is very good. This makes it easy to place the camera. The microphone and speaker are adequate. I do not have any experience with other security solutions, but feel confident that this was the right unit for my objectives. Simply tell me when someone is in the house that should not be. Let me know if I left the garage door open by mistake. And give me good enough video in case I need it. Love the 7 day free cloud service. Also like the option to easily expand with additional cameras. Maybe the cost of each unit will become cheaper over time. Hope this was helpful to a few of you! Cheers!
title: Nice product!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Steph
content: Very good for it's intended use! We needed it for monitoring entry points around the building and works perfectly, even at night. The night vision will not work for monitoring an entire street, but I'm not sure many people realize that it uses a IR LEDs, which are just lights, to see in the dark. Pros: Perfect for enclosed spaces up to about 20ft at night. The option to plug in the Pro is a great upgrade from the HD version: Never need to replace batteries! If you need completely wireless, the battery is life is surprisingly good. I've had mine up for about 2 months and it's at 80%. It records about 20 min per day on average. (Though adults rage about their toys running out of batteries occurs fairly often in reviews... Electricity isn't free people.) Arlo gives you free server space for up to 5 cameras. Up to 7 days of recordings. Very nice! (Server space isn't free either!) You can bulk download your videos and store them if you want. Cons: Will not be able extremely far at night, so place it with that in mind (NOT on top of a 3 story building looking down, for example, you'll see nothing at night). The field of view on the Pro is narrower than on the HD (non mic-enable version).
title: Works great for our needs!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Julio A. Enriquez
content: The most serious problem I have encoutered with Arlo is the delay time, it takes a few seconds for the camera to start recording after movement is detect, the other main thins is battery life, it definetly does not last months woth a few video recordings a day. Another issue is the two way communication (Arlo Pro), it’s not very effective, it rarely works, and all my cameras have great reception. But over all I give it a 4, probably the best in its class, easy to set up, user friendly, no cables needed, very handy.
title: Good camera system, needs improvement.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Korl
content: I really like the arlo system overall...The careams though are too sensitive to movement even at the lowest settings and battery life because of this is weeks rather than months. The night vision is ok with some outside light but once there is no light the night vision has very little distance if any. Overall though I do like the system and the ability to check on my home from wherever.
title: Great picture but too sensitive

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Craig H.
content: Set up was extremely easy.  I would like to have a better option for the cameras to continuously record while outside.  I am also not a huge fan of the magnetic mounts.  They were extremely easy to put up, but the cameras simply pull off.  I'm worried about someone simply snagging the camera and walking off with it. I also couldn't get the angle that I wanted to get using the mount from where it was mounted and ended up purchasing after market mounting hardware.
title: Easy but could be better

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: buyer187
content: Don't even waste your money like I did on the standard cams guys.... I bought a PRO cam and the standard cam to try them out on my system.... read up on the differences and spend the extra for the ARLO PRO cameras. SUPER easy to set-up and use. Took about 45 minutes for 2 cams and router.
title: Fantastic...

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Steven
content: Geofencing does not work if you share with another person, like your spouse, which the app allows two people to have access to camera remotely. After 5 calls and 10’s of emails to Arlo support, all I get back is “we’re working on it”. Very frustrating. This has been going on since purchasing my other 4 cameras. Don’t make the mistake I made in investing $600+ on their system. But someone else’s.
title: Geofencing does not work

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Grace
content: I'm really impressed with Arlo Pro thus far. Very clear video, excellent night vision, prompt alerts and an app that is awesome to use (e.g., for viewing all feeds on one screen, setting up custom modes). Other clear winning points: Up to 5 cameras on basic plan, a rolling 7 days of storage, ability to mount anywhere w/o concern for wires. I'm also loving IFTTT integration, but would really love if Stringify were added as a partner for more advanced customization (e.g., ability to turn smart lights at certain hours if Arlo detects motion). One big area of improvement would be adding the ability to receive person detection alerts (as opposed to general motion detection alerts). But overall, I'm a happy customer and look forward to growing my Arlo Pro system.
title: Lives up to the hype!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Jason Howard
content: I purchased the Arlo Pro camera system to replace the Insteon cameras I had installed around my home. There were several issues with the Insteon cameras that I was looking to resolve, and I have to say that the Arlo’s have met and exceeded my expectations in every category. If you are considering these cameras, but may be a little concerned about the price - know that they are worth every penny. I’ll absolutely be expending my collection.
title: Stop deliberating and buy!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: D. Melvin
content: I would have given the Arlo Pro 5 stars if the motion detection worked better. I set my  sensitivity to 100 and it still doesn't  quite reach out as far as I would like it to . I was hoping to cover my whole back yard (which is pretty small) but all it covers is about 1/3 of it. Other than that it's awesome. So easy to move and reposition it in different locations. I plan on buying at least 3 or 4 more of these. I tried the Nest cam and this is way more  versatile. Plus you have the option to hook up a USB memory stick or (if I'm not mistaken) a external hard drive to record to. That in my option puts it way ahead of most of  the competition. The pro is the way to go!
title: Almost perfect!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Gray
content: I love that the product is wire free it was very easy to hook up to connect the cameras I did not find anything difficult about installing the product and I’ve never set up a security camera before very happy excellent product.  As for the batteries when I first opened the box up I charge the batteries to full charge let them drain down to  50%  and then recharge them the fI’ll and so far for days later I’m still showing 100% on 4 of the batteries and 1 at 96% I absolutely love this product. P.S. have the patience for charging the batteries well worth it I will write another review on this product as time goes on.
title: Most important thing to know charge all the batteries before you install till they’re completely full  for best battery life

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Stvsan
content: I want to love this system, but it potentially could have burned my house down. I purchased and used the outside rated Netgear power cable to charge the battery overnight and it shorted and burned off. I set up the cameras around my house and I like how they work, however, fear of these units burning my house down has me hesitant. It's a good thing I didn't make modification to wire it permanently. I love how this worked, but safety and the looming fear of it catching fire again weighs heavily against it.
title: Fire hazard! Careful when charging.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: STEFAN
content: The batteries will require frequent recharge.  While others have posted that tuning down sensitivity to motion, moving closer to the base station or improving a weak wifi signal might improve battery life, that has not been my experience. I purchased a 6 camera system with very random but on aggregate very disappointing results.  The battery in the camera farthest from the base and wifi actually lasts the longest of these 6.  I have to conclude after 3 months of use that you should only buy this system if you are ok with frequently recharging batteries.  In 3 months, I've had to recharge 3 times.  For 2 of the cameras that seemed to be the most problematic, I purchased the Netgear solar panel, but those only extended the time between charges and failed to stay ahead of the battery drain, even with California sun.
title: Batteries Require Frequent Recharge

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: GWT
content: After shopping around, I'm glad I bought this and am planning to add a 2nd camera soon. I didn't want the hassle of wiring but was concerned about battery life. So far, I'm very happy with battery life and expect it to need recharging as advertised. Battery life will depend on how you have it positioned and adjusted and it did take several tries to get both just right so we don't have too many false alarms. Discovered aiming the camera through the brightest part of the porch light is not a good idea for night vision as the glare from the light makes it difficult to see anything else. Repositioning the camera solved that problem. The app also has a good feature that allows you to increase or decrease the motion sensitivity. So, for example, we didn't want our lawn irrigation to set off the motion detector and run down the battery. This adjustment is a sliding scale in the app but it's not obvious which direction increases or decreases motion sensitivity so be prepared to experiment with it until you get it set to your specific needs. Overall, this was a really good buy and I'm glad I got it.
title: Glad I bought this

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: James L.
content: I've had the Arlo Pro cameras for almost 2 months and they are awesome!  The 2 key features I needed in home security cameras  were "wireless" and "no monthly fee".  I was looking for something that would record to a hard drive but Netgear's cloud service is even better. Videos are removed after 7 days so I don't have to worry about filling up a hard drive every month and I can record specific clips to a thumb drive if I want to save them.  Best system on the market.
title: ... Pro cameras for almost 2 months and they are awesome! The 2 key features I needed in home ...

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Wesley Penner
content: I've had mixed experience with the device. Battery life varies. I had one fail and spent a couple of days with support working through the issue before getting a replacement. There are delays with recording, but it works well for my purposes. The system does depend on your home network working properly. Support helped me with an issue with my network. Overall an ok product and I use it a lot.
title: Support is helpful in fixing issues.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: wilddog
content: Arlo is as close to perfect as I believe you can achieve with a security system.  We just added the "pro" camera with audio and a wider field of vision.  My problem is that the audio has a constant white noise in the background and when you try to speak to someone outside thru the camera, the volume is very low - unfortunately really low - thus the "4" rating rather than "5". Arlo is a great system and the video is clear even at night - guess I thought the audio on this would be louder when speaking to someone at the door.  It isn't but it will do.  Love the camera system for the price.  Easy install and connections.
title: Almost perfect

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Kayla Arsenault
content: Installed this product rather easily, even if you are not tech savvy, it is not that hard. Had an issue upon start up with not being able to arm/disarm the camera, tech support was able to help on a Sunday and I was up and running. Not a fan of the magnetic mounts it comes with, they do not provide enough room to get a near 90* angle on the mount. But the magnet is strong. Highly recommended if you are in the market
title: A little pricey, but great product

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: C. Lopez
content: This was an add on to my other 4 Arlo pro cams. Easy install and connection. works just as advertised and would re buy again. love the extra security. Put inside of my garage.  Not only is it good security but when you drive away and say "HEY DID I LEAVE MY GARTAGE DOOR OPEN" bam open app and I can see if I did without driving all the way home.
title: Arlo pro is great in the garage.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Kelly
content: I am very happy with this camera. It does everything it it suppose to. There is only one thing I could criticize. The speaker on the camera is not very loud. While the microphone is excellent and I can hear what the camera is listening to. On the other end the person listening from the speaker on the camera has a difficult time hearing. Everything else is excellent and I highly recommend this product.
title: Excellent: only one shortcoming. Camera speaker not loud enough.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: April Prine-Ovalle
content: Once the battery ran out, would not charge. I put them both on the charger after the batteries were running low. They would not charge. Once they died they would not come back on after having them plugged in. I will go back to the Arlo the uses replaceable batteries and stay away from rechargeable Arlo Pro.
title: Once the battery ran out, would not charge

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Strange Vexings
content: I got the cameras because I live on an Alley and I was worried about potential theft.  The wireless-ness of them is fantastic, however the app leaves a little bit to be desired.  It runs very slowly on my HTC 10 (flagship phone from Mid last year) and sometimes takes a minute or two to get into the camera and see what is going on. I'd imagine by that point the outside camera will have been useless if someone is breaking in, I won't have been able to see it!  However I do have a second one inside which I can use and hopefully connect to quicker than the outdoor one. With that said, I like that it's rechargeable and basically all weather. So far it's captured a couple cars going down the alley so I've had to adjust the sensitivity, even though I'm on the 3rd floor and the camera is probably a good 50 feet above the ground, meaning that the '23 foot' rule that Netgear claims is wrong, it clearly detects motion much further away and slightly off to the side.  That's both good and bad. Overall I'm relatively happy, just wish they would wake up and connect to the hub sooner so I don't have to waste so much time trying to get connected.
title: Good quality, kind of pricey

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: PD
content: The video quality is great but the battery situation is not.  I have only had my cameras a little over three months and do not hold a charge for long.  I charged both over the weekend and they are both back down to showing very little batter life.  Disappointing for having them for such a short amount of time.
title: Ok But Wouldn't Buy Again

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Nick
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. After 6 months, I'm a bit disappointed with this product.  As someone who is fiercely loyal to Netgear products, I had high hopes.  This product has definite positives, including the fact that it's wireless, the video quality is good, it has 7 days of free cloud storage, and setup is extremely easy.  One major negative is the battery life.  I don't know if it's my unit or an accurate representation of the product, but I find myself having to charge the camera every 6-8 days.  I have made adjustments to lower video quality and sensitivity, but that made a negligible difference.  An additional negative is the ability for the unit to detect motion from the right side.  The camera can instantly detect motion from the left, but from the right, it takes at least a few seconds to detect motion, if it detects the motion at all.  My wife and I always approach our front door from the right side of the camera when entering, and it only detects us about half the time.  I think this is a major drawback considering I bought the camera to detect possible break-ins.  The videos attached show the delayed detection from the right. I'd like to add that I contacted Netgear about these issues and have yet to hear a response.
title: High expectations, somewhat disappointed.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: C. Coatney
content: I Love these cameras.  They were easy to set-up and work great.  The 5 cameras gave me outstanding coverage.  1 camera covers my upstairs, 1 covers my down stairs, 1 covers my back yard and I have 2 providing overlapping coverage to the driveway/front yard.  The battery life has been surprisingly good.  I love the scheduling feature for the recording as well as the different custom modes.
title: Great security camera system

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Tom L
content: Nice simple camera system. Easy setup, works very reliably, good battery life. I have them on my boat to be able to watch it when no on board. Fit's the need very well and didn't require drilling and running lot's of wires. Features are adequate. I wish that it had masking for motion detection and hope that in some future release they will offer a local access feature so that if you can reach your local network, you can see the cameras (without having to have an internet connection to the home servers) Good value.
title: Nice simple camera system

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Chris in VA.
content: I bought the 2 PRO camera and new base because of a great sale. I replaced my original base and have 3 original and 2 PRO cameras. The PRO cameras have audio, the recording and trigger work good. The 2 way audio doesn't work even when I'm on the same fast internet connection. I'm pleased with the upgrade since it was on sale, if it was full price I would return it all.
title: Just OK.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: denisa
content: Had this system for almost a year with daily use and we're having issues with the batteries inside the cameras. They die within a few days and need to be charged. Not sure if it's an arlo glitch or if the seller got a counterfeit product.
title: Battery dies within a few days

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Myah
content: I love the arlo system. It works great for me without issues. I have three cameras one I out it at the window inside facing my driveway. Quality still better than most others I’ve used. Sound quality is good. Overall it is a good security camera and best of all is that it is wire free. I would hate to have to drag the cords so long etc..
title: Cord free awesome.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Francisco
content: Actualmente tengo 4 camaras Arlo Pro, de las cuales solo 1 funciona correctamente. De las 3 restantes, 2 presentan constantes problemas de conexión (una a 20 cms y otra a 4 metros de la estación base, sin muros ni puertas) y la tercera solo funciona enchufada (no detecta la bateria). Además, debo cambiar baterías cada 1-2 semanas. Realmente un desastre de producto! Me encantaría devolver todas las cámaras y los accesorios, pero vivo fuera de Estados Unidos. Alguna sugerencia?
title: No compre estas cámaras

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: JB
content: A little on the pricey side but less expensive than nest and similar productsl  Camera is 720p but good enough for our pupose.  Havent been anywhere yet that we couldn't connect.  The mike and speaker is an excellent feature,  Haven't stored anything in the cloud yet so can't speak to that. Bottom line, we've spent a lot on less expensive camera's that were a disapointment, should have spent the money and done it right the first time.l
title: Excellent system

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Jana
content: Disliked the fact that the batteries don’t last very long. Turned down the sensitivity and still constantly recharging the batteries. Constantly goes off line and now will no longer sync. Too expensive to replace the battery again and will not waste any more money on this system. Liked: The quality of the picture; day & night. Able to view on my phone. Sound quality good.
title: Not worth the money

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: M Neuendorf
content: Had this system for a year. At first they worked great, but over time the picture quality kept getting worse and worse. Now they are so pixilated, some are just a black screen and others just have huge lines running through them that they are just useless. For as much $$ we spent on this, we are so disappointed that they only lasted not even a year.
title: Dont waste your money on this system.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: estelle
content: In the begining, this product was great, until the cons outweighed the pros. The camera needs to be recharged every couple of days. It needs to be taken down from the wall mount, charged, out back up, and it become extremely annoyig after you need to do it so many times!!! It will also rendomly go offline and say that it needs to be recconected- which means taking it down, reconnecting it all over again, and then putting it back up. At this point the cameras are literally useless most of the time! Very dissapointed.
title: Needs to be charged and re-connected ALL THE TIME!!!!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: DJP
content: I wouldn’t recommend these cameras to anyone! I have 2 cameras one in the driveway aimed at the mailbox the other in front also aimed at the mailbox. ( there are 4 mailboxes) They don’t pick up all the pedestrians and when they are at the mailbox it doesn’t record while they are there. They also want you to buy upgrades, you’d think if you’re paying $500 everything would be included. BIG MISTAKE!
title: Don’t buy them.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: MadMan
content: Struggle to reconnect a camera after EVERY battery recharge... batteries wont seat.  Camera picks up motion too late e.g. car goes by at night and my camera only catches the taillights as it rounds a corner 150 feet down the street.
title: Struggle every time...

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Jane in Granville
content: What a waste of money this was! It only records when it feels like it. Haven't had anything record in a week and we are constantly having to re-pair it with the camera despite having the base station sitting in a window in direct view of the camera and sitting next to our modem. Very unreliable, spend the extra bucks and get a better, more reliable set up.
title: Don't waste your money

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Jesse True
content: I honestly didn’t have high hopes for this after I got some cheap camera system prior to buying this. But, it was well worth the money. I was most impressed with the battery life of each camera! I got worried that the battery life was misrepresented at first because it was only down to an 80% charge after 3 weeks of use! The only gripe I have is the ability to have multiple admins make their own custom set of rules for the camera system.
title: Great system. VERY LOUD ALARM. App Could be better..

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Dion Soto-Endresen
content: Works pretty decent and looks good, features as expected for a system of this cost when looking at in a bundle.  Problem I have with this system is you can get better for much less as far as video quality and longevity.  My first camera went out a few days after the 1 year warranty and the hub went out about 6 weeks after that.  Very expensive system to have it just work for about 13 months. Look to another system with better warranty.
title: Great while it Works!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Elijah Reed
content: Although the system itself works fine but the minute it detects any form of motion whether that’s a tree branch or anything else and you go into the system to see what it was it takes VERY long to connect to the camera!! By the time you actually get into the live footage of the camera whatever was going on will be over! It’s super disappointing that I have to wait over a min at times to get into a camera to see what’s going on outside my home...
title: Takes forever to connect to live footage

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: crexor
content: I have a four camera arlo pro system, and an Arlo Q, they were extremely easy to setup. Much easier than my POE cameras. The main reason I got these was the completely wireless aspect, you can literally put these anywhere and move them easily.  Battery life so far has been great, That's with a few seconds of streaming here and there and a few daily alerts. The other reason to switch to the arlo system for me was the ease of integration with my smarterthings hub and amazon Alexa. The wife factor is also great, extremely easy to use and minimal "tinkering."
title: Simple to setup yet sophisticated system

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Carol
content: I originally bought one Arlo Pro camera. After using it for awhile I purchased three more. They work in very dark places well (my crawl space to see rodent activity) plus in normal lighting. I receive alerts on my phone with activity which I can then access to see clips. These clips are stored for free for a week on the cloud, and I believe can be kept longer for a fee. Any clips you desire to keep can be downloaded. I also plugged a memory stick into the base unit to keep my own copies. I haven't tried viewing these yet. The cameras don't need to plugged in to work, and the batteries last for months. Mine was getting triggered many times a day and lasted three months before a recharge. They are supposed to be able to last 6-8 months between charges if they aren't in use a lot. The cameras can also be used to speak to someone when accessed remotely. They are weatherproof. Love these cameras! I discovered that the dog sitter who I was paying to drop in three times per day was staying at my house when I viewed her walking around my living room in her bathrobe. Love these cameras!
title: Love these cameras

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Carlabelle
content: It is sneaky and unethical that Netgear sells this without a charger, which you have to buy separately for $50. Plus, you don’t realize this until the camera’s battery runs out, and you are left unprotected while you first try (unsuccessfully) to charge it with a regular charger, then suck it up, order one, and wait for it to be delivered. Shame on you, Netgear.
title: then suck it up

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Joe B
content: This system is nice. I like the speaker, I can tell my dogs to quit tearing stuff up while I’m at work. Couple things I don’t like is the system is based on your WiFi  Signal so if your  Signal is weak the camera may not work.  The cameras seem to have a 2 to 3 second delay,  so if it’s not set up  in a good position  you could miss someone walking by. The  battery life is better than expected, I have several hours of footage and still have 50% battery left.  The live footage recording only goes for about 30 minutes then turns off.  When you save the live footage recordings there is no timestamp.  If you put the cameras in a high traffic area it will only take you about a day to turn your notifications off,  otherwise your phones going to be buzzing every 5 minutes.
title: Nice

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: puchuco
content: Some days they work, some days they don't. Spare batteries didn't work, motion isn't always recorded and when it is, the delay is such that you can't even see the individual/cause of motion. They keep pushing for me to pay monthly for their service. I'm listing these things on craigslist. Basically a waterproof webcam with absolutely no support.
title: Buy Something Else

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: TQN
content: The speaker on the cameras don't really work. The volume is so soft that it is basically useless.  The microphone does work well, however.  Video quality is okay. I find that on a sunny day, the contrast between light and shadow is a little too harsh so you can't get clear view.  If you mount it high beyond someone's reach, you wouldn't be able to get a high quality shot of their face. Night vision camera is nifty, but if  there is a large white wall in the view, it will blow out contrast and essentially break night vision. Installation is easy because it is wireless.  You put a screw into the wall, mount the magnetic mount on the screw and the camera is attached to the magnetic mount. I use this as a cheap secondary system to my home security system so I can monitor my house from my phone during work. Overall, I am pleased with it, but I would not use it as a primary security system.
title: Decent and Easy to Set Up

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: sydney miyatake
content: So far I have tried a few different cameras for our house and Arlo has been my favorite. The quality is great and most important there is no lag time of footage. Whatever is happening in front of our house I know it is live. I would recommend everyone getting this if you are interested in security cameras. The price is perfect as well.
title: Perfect Security

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Barrett Ryan
content: I have given these cams as gifts, as addons to security systems, and purchased my own through Amazon. For a sale price discount for the base pro 2-3 cam set these are a good value. With newer models as well as other camera security options on market today I would choose differently. I believe more should be included in the box for better value... ie skins or better outdoor mounting. Also criminals have recently found a way to disable motion activated cameras with a laser beam, something should be done to combat this. Service options are ok but I also believe more value can be had here aswell. Overall I am happy with arlo cams and am happy to see more improvement from netgear. 4/5 would recommend
title: 4/5 would recommend at discount

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Jerry O Neil
content: the arlos work great.. only real issue I have is the slight delay trying to use the talk feature.. only other issue is the distance they pick up motion.. would be great if it was 50-75 feet rather than 25-30 feet.. but I am sure that is why the battery life is so good.. gone 4 weeks at a time and battery is still at 50% or more.. that said, we don't have a ton of activity coming to the house when we are away.. usually only a bird or bee here and there.. still worth the money
title: the arlos work great.. only real issue I have is the ...

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)

content: Over all we love the camera's. We have a 2 acre lot with a separate out building, so we put up 6 cameras. However the batteries really only last about a month.  Of course this depends on the amount of "motion" it picks up.  Some get more activity than others. We have considered turning them off when we cut the grass :-).  Fortunately they recharge in a few hours.  Over all, very satisfied.
title: Very Clear Pictures

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Monica M.
content: Due to some unsettling events in our neighborhood, we decided it was time to get a camera. The first camera worked so well, we decided to get a second. Some neighbors have cameras that are professionally hard-wire installed. The cost wasn't feasible for us to get that type of security camera and the thought of having all those wires going from one end of our attic to the other wasn't at all enticing. These cameras were easy to install and allows us the flexibility to move them if needed. The best part is that this can all be done ourselves.  Only reason we didn't give 5 stars, the instructions were a bit lacking and it took a lot of trial and error to get the recordings/motion/sounds just right. Otherwise, the installation and syncing was very easy. All and all, we've been very pleased with our cameras!
title: The Eye in the Sky

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: FreshAsVeggies
content: I give this product 4 and not 5 stars because of the app. The app is not user friendly and not quick to navigate to the features that one would use most often (e.g. arm/disarm the alarm). Besides that. it was easy to install. It has great audio and pretty good video quality. The battery life is long, unless you record a lot of video. I must warn that if you have a SimpliSafe alarm system, keep the camera a few feet away from the SimpliSafe motion sensor as it will set it off. I learned this the hard way. Overall, I would recommend this product. I plan to buy an additional camera in the near future.
title: Lovely wireless security camera

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Guillermo A.
content: Got an extra Arlo Pro as I still had one more slot in my free 5-camera plan. Wasn't going to, but the price was right for this one. I haven't upgrade to the Arlo Pro 2s as Netgear still refuses to support HomeKit after more than 2 years, and the Arlos are still the better value (although the competition is gaining ground and it won't be long until I start planning to switch again). I'd give it 5 stars, but as usual with Netgear they make great hardware which is later crippled by horrible software and poor customer support.
title: and the Arlos are still the better value (although the competition is gaining ground and it ...

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)

content: First and foremost Arlo does not stand behind their product! I'll continue to use what cameras i have left and I will buy new cameras .... but not from arlo!!  Thanks for nothing Arlo!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: R Scott
content: Following a home robbery, I needed a camera system - but one without wires  - and the Arli system was perfect!  I was able to quickly place a few wall mounts in key locations, and now have the ability to easily move cameras around, and because the camera has a magnetic back - they are easily positioned and adjusted for any given situation.  Setup was straightforward, once the camera are synced then you an watch from app or online.  Solid motion detection and good low light capabilities.  I really enjoyed the flexibility and easy of installation of this system and these cameras.
title: Great Wireless Camera System

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: JimBob
content: HOLD OFF on purchase - major support / firmware issue in play right now I have used the cameras for about 6-months and they have been AWESOME... But recently Netgear released some firmware update or something similar that has CRASHED the cameras on some fraction of the installed user base. I don't know how many users are affected, but it is not an isolated event. It has been going on for 2 weeks now and Netgear has been pretty unresponsive to the issue. I'm very disappointed in their weak response. Details are posted on the Netgear community forum for the Arlo Pro ... sorry it appears I can not post a link the the exact thread, but it is titled: Many false audio trips starting today on all cameras? Did new firmware get released or :-? while I still believe in the product I would NOT buy currently!!! WAIT until this issue is resolved!
title: HOLD OFF on purchase - major support / firmware issue in play right now

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Edward W.
content: After researching all the different security cameras, arlo has the best in terms of wireless cameras. I was initially going to buy the arlo pro2 but after reading up on the many bugs that still needs to be fixed, I decided that the arlo pro was the better route, having been tested thoroughly by consumers for a few years now. We love how we can remotely turn on and off cameras to save battery life, the night vision works wonderfully, and the detection features notify us promptly. The one flaw that does come up is how the system will be offline sometimes. But it doesn't happen often and the many features and the ease of installation really made this purchase extremely enjoyable.
title: Many enjoyable features, easy installation, secure and happy

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Miguel Vargas
content: This is a nice product that is ruined by awful quality control. I have had several batteries and one camera just stop working. Committing to this system means constantly buying new expensive parts to replace the broken parts. Support is sometimes helpful but usually not. I would stay away.
title: Poor quality control

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Harsh108
content: I had purchased it a while back. Had been working great with my VMB4000r base till August and after the firmware update that deleted record function that would allow integration with Smart Things. So now it would not work and it has been crucial for me to my home security. Customer service has been horrible and they keep giving run around trouble shooting despite the known firmware update issue acknowledged everywhere. They promised to get it updated before christmas but sure enough they lied and didn't work out as well. I would not recommend this product unless you are using it for monitoring yourself all the time and not looking for integration with any other system.
title: Would not integrate with SmartThings.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Scotty
content: I like the ease of this system for sure. It was so easy to install.  That really makes it worth it to me.  The way the app works is great too.  It is really easy to get into the app when you get a notification and watch the recorded clip.  I did have a problem about a day after I got the system installed where none of my camera would show that they were online but they would still record motion events and I could see the recorded clips but I could not see the live cameras.  I got a hold of the tech support on chat and they walked me through it but they had me uninstall my base station and cameras from my account and then add them back.  Which cause me to have to reset all my settings that I had spent lots of time figuring out.  I haven't had that problem again.  The picture is great for a fully wireless system.  Zoom gets grainy pretty fast, but it is digital zoom.  I've only had my system for a couple of weeks so I can't really say anything about the battery life other than I have mine set to record on the highest quality and for the whole event.  Most of my clips are 10 to 20 sec long.  I have the motion and audio settings set pretty sensitive so I don't miss anything.  My lowest battery is 90% and the highest is 95%. I also did not charge them before I put them up, so this is the charge from factory.  All in all I think they work as advertised.  Except... The lag on the cameras is pretty significant.  I do catch all of the motion or audio triggered events, but they may be half way across the lawn before the recording starts.  The front door camera so far has always started recording before someone steps on my porch and when I look at the recording you can see their face clearly.  But there is a cat that hangs around and walks in front of the porch a lot and it is usually almost out of the picture before the camera starts recording.  The main lag problem is the live videos.  The commercials show that you could talk to someone through the 2 way system on the camera, but in my experience, by the time you started trying to talk to them, they would be walking away already.  Plus the fact that you have to practically yell into your phone for them to be able to hear you.  I am happy with the cameras and do think they will work great for what I want them for, it's just the lag on the live streaming is several seconds behind.
title: Good but could be better

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Sparks McFume
content: These are good but not great.  I like: compact, good battery life, clear images (close range), good wifi range.  I don't like: all of these are wide angle so they are only good for close range ID.  From a distance of say, 75 feet,  you would capture a crime but not be able to ID the perp. very well.  There should be zoomable lenses for different applications.  These will not work for everything, but still a quality product.
title: These will not work for everything, but still a quality product.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: A. Yass
content: This was a simple easy to setup solution to keep an eye on my home while away. I have a pesky alarm and occasionally a sensor will go off, I can now check my home after a alarm triggers to let the alarm company know to call the cops or blame their sensor. Also nice to keep tabs on babysitter and kids. The video quality is great, and offers a nice wide viewing angle. Sound is good, only draw back it the speaker from my phone to camera is too quiet to really be heard 15-20ft away.
title: This was a simple easy to setup solution to keep an eye on my ...

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: stephanie harris
content: I was super happy with my system. I actually caught someone trying my door to see if it was unlocked! I was able to report them to the police. Unfortunately I was in a bad accident and the people who moved me out of my home didn’t see the camera so I lost it! But it works and is awesome.
title: Busted someone trying to B and E

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: TheWick
content: First time security camera owner and very happy with the Arlo system. Bought two Pro 2's and one Pro with base station.  They work as advertised.  Only one quirk to report: One of the Pro 2's has been running for about a week, recording about 6 twenty-second videos per day, and the battery still shows 100%.  Seems like it should show less than that. If it is accurate then great!  If it is a false reading then bad.  Time will tell.  -----  Well, it's been a few days now and the battery now shows 96%!  I guess the 100% reading was correct.  This tells me the batteries are holding up very well!
title: Very Happy

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Mich
content: Excellent product.  Super user friendly. We bought after seeing our friends' having bought and liked, bought for ourselves and now bought for our parents.  Great to see who is coming and going, delivery drivers, kids getting home from school, we even have one camera on our cattle in the pasture!  Links to and views on our phone, app easy to download, links automatically, excellent product.
title: user friendly easy hookup

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Anthony O.
content: I absolutely love this product. Arlo is the perfect companion for any home. Having the extra set of eyes and ears really makes me much more comfortable, especially in my town home where I can rarely hear what’s going on downstairs. The app is designed extremely well and the setup is a breeze! I only wish I had gotten another camera or two! With the rolling cloud storage that’s included and the ability to add a hard drive, Arlo just can’t be beat! When a product is as comprehensive and amazing as Arlo is, you can’t help but to really believe in it. 5 stars for Arlo!!!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Vanessa J
content: Easy to install, instructions easy to follow, the sound is great on the cameras, only giving a 4 star for now because I'm testing one of the cameras that might have defective battery as it does faster than the others. product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: M Baker
content: Love this system and the ease of adding additional cameras to it. I had the older battery powered cameras and this is a lovely upgrade. USB charging makes it a breeze to recharge and the sound recording makes me feel even safer than before. User friendly.
title: Great upgrade

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Debra F
content: Love these cameras! Nice to not have to pay extra for a monthly service. So far I have found the free option to be sufficient for my needs as far as the cloud plans go. Only downside is the camera will stop working in extremely cold weather, but that is something Netgear says upfront about the product. I wish there was a way to prevent this. So far the battery life has been great for me. I do wish it had come with more stickers for the doors so let people know we have cameras.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)

I said I'd pay to get it fixed.  They don't fix them.  They did not do anything to try to keep me as a customer.  Expensive junk.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: pvtjoker42
content: in my house i didn't want to have to run wires because there's a weird config, and not many walls that go between all floors so running cables was going to be a nightmare.  these are totally wireless, and work pretty well, but like most people's reviews (on front door usage etc) the motion sensors seem to kick in about 10-30 sec too late to actually see who's at your door.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Shari R.
content: We have complete coverage of the front and rear of our house 24-7 if needed.  Using a thumb drive we can keep recordings indefinitely.  Being able to remotely control our system from our smartphones is very convenient.  We have already recommended this system to friends and will continue to do so.  Our only problem is a slight recording delay, I am checking to see if boosting signal strength to the cameras will help.  Very happy with this system!
title: Very happy with this system.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: TexasArtist
content: We've had these about 3 weeks, and so far I'm very satisfied.  The installation went without a hitch... seriously, it was easy.  The video quality is good enough for its purpose.  There's pretty good information available on the Netgear Arlo website and the support community, but honestly I haven't needed customer service so far.  They just work.  I made a mistake in placing some of my cameras near downspouts, so the sound of rain can trigger recording.  You can adjust the sensitivity, etc.  but my advice is don't put them too close to a downspout.  I'm very very happy with this purchase.
title: Easy to install, work great, lots of information available on line if you're having trouble.  Highly recommended!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Karen J White
content: We installed these camera’s at my 87 yr old Dad’s house. Easy installment. Will need tall ladder to mount camera attachment if putting up high on porch, deck or tall ceilings. Front porch camera goes off line at intervals, but remedy is to remove and reset next to base.  Not much of a problem other than having to get a ladder out to remove/reset. Perhaps there is an easier way, but haven’t found it.  Picture quality is very good, even at night. Would definitely recommend.
title: Like these cameras

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: robert
content: did not live up to my expectations for the cost. Image quality was good. Easy of setup was average, since UI was a bit slow at times and I could not get the GEO-Fencing to work properly. It cannot detect movement through glass.  This would be a area of improvement, since the camera has to be outside in the same space that you are trying to monitor.  You can't mount it inside behind a window to monitor the front stoop for example. For the cost, I expected something that did not feel like a work in progress, but this one felt unpolished.
title: Image quality was good. Easy of setup was average

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Alpha Au
content: Great build quality, Great design, Great feature set, Great ease of use. Simply the best smart home focused wifi enabled HD security cameras on the market today. Netgear really has done an excellent job all around with the Arlo Pro. I had the original Arlo cameras for a long time then grabbed a 3 camera kit of the Pro's as soon as i could get my hands on them. Then over time have been gradually replacing the 5 original Arlo cams as the batteries went flat in them. Just keep the old ones empty and put away as spares now. Do yourself a favour and get these if you are looking for a home security camera solution without a lot of cost or setup / installation hassle.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: RoJo
content: Battery life is not bad.  More action they pick up, the faster the batteries go down.  Still with mediocre action, they’re lasting a couple months per charge.  Video quality is good and they’re easy to mount.  Overall, I’m impressed.  App is easy to work with as well and 1 weeks worth of storage is plenty unless you travel for more than a week on regular basis.  Never knew I had so many critters floating around the house in the middle of the night.
title: Performs as indicated.  Good quality images.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Carl Nishi
content: Arlo lets us go on vacation with some assurance that we have a handle on home security. Nice product, and the battery lasts a surprisingly long time between charges. Just as importantly, it gives us reassurance that the kids have returned home as expected and are safe!
title: Arlo is a great product, and it works!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Angie B.
content: Love our new cameras. We will definitely be adding more. The wireless feature is exactly what we needed.  Totally wireless.  Picture & sound come in clear - I use the app on my iPhone.  My only wish is that the audio on the actual camera was a little louder.  I can hear great on my phone (the sound coming from the area of a camera) - but anyone at the door has to really listen to hear me from the 2 way audio. product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Jesse M
content: I wanted a security camera for my house and first started with the Nest cam.  The Nest cam works great, but paying $10/month for each camera ended up being way too expensive.  I also had too much trouble with geofencing.  The camera would turn on and off when it felt like it.  Next I tried the Canary Flex and while it was plugged in, the camera functioned well.  I received motion alerts, but there was no customization.  All I could do was change how often I receive alerts and there was no IFTTT integration either.  The free recording was nice, but when you have multiple cameras, the record time drops.  Then I tried running the camera on battery only and it NEVER worked!  I was working in front of the Canary Flex for 3 minutes and I did not receive one motion alert.  I never setup any type of geofencing, so it should have picked up some motion.  I decided to give Arlo a go after reading about it on some tech sites and I could not be happier!  The camera's actually work!  I haven't plugged any of them in yet and I can't believe how well they function.  I have three cameras setup right now and they have worked flawlessly.  I'm selling all the other cameras and keeping the Arlo.  I have seen a few bugs in the Android app, but nothing that makes it hard to use.  I've already recommended Arlo Pro to several friends/family.  Thanks Arlo!
title: The Nest cam works great, but paying $10/month for each camera ended up ...

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Alan Finn
content: After doing a substantial amount of research, I decided to go with the Arlo as it had the features I wanted and I've had good experience with other Netgear products. There are several other wireless devices that transmit wireless; however, most still require a physical A/C connection nearby. The players in full wireless (record/transmit and power) is very limited. For me, the Arlo stood out because I could attach my own storage to the device where the others required a subscription to a cloud service to store data. (The Arlo also offers a cloud service, but it is not required). Even with the options I was looking for, I was still a little hesitant as the Arlo is at the top of the list is cost, but after running it for three weeks, I am pleased with the results thus far. The connection is stable with cameras being 50 to 110 feet from the base going through walls. The battery life indicator has hardly moved and I have an active house averaging around 40 to 60 clips per day on both cameras. The picture is very clear in both day and night settings. The phone app is very flexible allowing for full control of cameras and video playback as is the browser based site. Overall, I am extremely pleased with the purchase and would not let a slightly higher cost steer you away. Solid product.
title: I decided to go with the Arlo as it had the features I wanted and I've had good experience with other Netgear products

The picture quality didn't really bother me because no activity was happening. But what really bothers me is when there IS activity and I am not home, the camera always fails! It either doesn't let me log in, or kicks me off, and one time when I was talking through the camera speaker there was so much static neither one of us can hear each other!! I had no idea why that stranger came knocking on my door! Arlo was useless! The camera ALWAYS fails on me when I need it to work the most. Other than that I have no complaints when I don't need it, like a dummy camera its just a camera to look at. Sadly, I compare this to a dummy camera with the exception that it has live view. Also, everytime I receive an alert for my mailman or ups delivery, him and his truck is gone by the time I open to view.

content: We bought two Arlo Pro cameras for exterior placement, along with an Arlo Security Light. Setup was mostly straightforward, although I did run into a hiccup with a Netgear login conflict between my mobile and desktop devices. Once I logged out on both devices the problem resolved. After that, everything worked as planned. I did need to relocate the base station for the cameras to a different router to be closer to the cameras. author: BFC
content: The product description claims that these are capable of 2-way communication. In reality, the only way that someone would be able to hear you talk back to them through the camera is if they were in an otherwise absolutely noise-free environment and the camera was within a few feet of them. I was told by Netgear support that they are working on a resolution. The exact same language appears in their community discussion board dated 2016. When I pointed this out, I was told that these cameras weren't intended to be heard from "miles away" and that "nothing's perfect." product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Scott
content: I set up a 3 camera system around my house.  Set up is easy; the most time is spent trying to find the best spot for and aiming the cameras.  The software and network just fire up and work right out of the box. The geofencing and scheduling work well.  I set the video to best resolution, (reducing battery life).  People are recognizable in daylight but at night, with its IR lighting, you really cannot identify a total stranger or read a license plate. The motion sensing feature works great for side to side motion, but as the instructions warn you, the head-on approach is not as good.  My cameras view all the way to the edge of the street, but not not onto it, so traffic doesn't trigger them..  However, visitors and cars approaching the cameras head-on can make it to within 8-10 feet before they  begin recording (at least at night).. Mobile app is easy to use and set up.  I needed to tune the various settings to reduce the amount of extraneous triggers and notifications.
title: Great value, decent performance, easy to use.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Fisha
content: I bought two of these systems. One being the 5 camera package, the other being the 3 camera package. Installation was so simple, I was shocked. Everything works as it is supposed to. I have had no defective units. You can fine tune the alert settings to only notify you of activity at certain cameras or time of day. The battery life has been excellent so far, I've had these systems running for 3 weeks without need for a recharge. The images are pretty good, but there is room for improvement in quality there. I suppose a higher quality image requires more battery/WIFI usage. However, all of the features of this system more than make up for this. Night time viewing is very good. The motion sensing is adjustable and doesn't trigger with every leaf blowing past the camera. The remote viewing works flawlessly. The app works well on my smart phone and PC. They even provide a way for invited guests (such as friends or family members) to make an Arlo account to monitor your cameras and get the alerts. Thanks for the great product!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: SurfingMarsh
content: I love this system.  Set up was a piece of cake.  This is my second Arlo Pro purchase with my first being the Arlo Pro single camera.  One for the office and two cameras for home so I'm running on two base stations.  They can be fully customized and tailored for your needs.  See the Arlo forums for great advise and troubleshooting.  The scheduling and mode configurations can be a bit confusing but once you get it (see the Arlo forums)  you will see how customized each camera can become when programming the modes and schedules.  For example for a certain time frame you can have the cameras set to not record.  Then next hour have one camera record motion for 30 seconds while the other is standing by.  The next hour you can have all cameras recording motion for 2 minutes after motion while having one trigger the 100db alarm.  The possibilities of configuration are endless and is cool if you like modifying things precisely. Again the forums really helped when customizing complex schedules and modes. Note, when viewing "live"  there is a few second delay.  You will notice this especially when using the microphone feature making it a bit of a nuisance to try and carry a back and forth conversation.  This will be expected on a wireless system. The lithium ion battery life is quite incredible.  You will see that, with normal usage ( I use it for security purposes so it's not triggered often, but I do use the "live with microphone" function daily) that battery should last a few months at least without the hour recharge.  Better than buying 4 cr123 batteries for each camera like the previous Arlo cameras! I did have a hardware issue on one of the cameras.  I opened up a service ticket online.  Email responses were usually after two days and were quite detailed.  After a few back and forth conversations, I was given an RMA# and detailed instructions for return.  I received a new camera free of bugs only three days after I mailed the defective one out.  So customer service was quite responsive and flawless in my opinion I'd also recommend purchasing a UPS battery backup, so if anyone or anything cuts your power, your modem and base station stay on recording away! Enjoy your ArloPro!
title: Amazing product with great customer service.  100% satisfied so far.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Matt Clauss
content: I recent purchased an Arlo Pro w/base station starter kit. I affixed the single camera outside of the front door of my patio. Since the exterior of my home is concrete stucco and I didn't want to bother hammer drilling into it, I ended up buying the outdoor mount and mounting it on the ceiling of my breezeway. The setup process was simple and intuitive, the video and sound quality is very good, and the android app is easy to use. The battery life has been great so far as well. Even with the brutal, desert heat my battery is still going strong at 100%! My only complaint about the experience so far is that when the android app sends a push notification for motion/sound and I click through to the app directly from the notification, it hangs the Arlo app process and I have to quit the app and re-open it manually. I've started to dismiss the notifications and open the app manually after acknowledging the alert. Hopefully this will get fixed in a software update. Otherwise, I'm very happy with the system overall! I want to buy an additional camera to mount in my main living space for an additional layer of security. Also, I love that the camera and every individual accessory comes with a window sticker! I have them stuck all over now!
title: Simple setup, easy to use. HIGHLY Recommend

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Trey
content: At first I had the regular Arlo camera system and it was great! It helped with some legal matters in previous years and this time I bought the pro and honestly it's pure genius. All the issues I might have had before in the original were fixed. The base station gives encryption keys to each device and pairs it to avoid hackers or other agencies from peeking and the 128gb flush micro USB in the read of the base station (not uncluded) allows the cameras to continue recording even when the internet goes out in your area straight to the USB drive (only can be viewed once detached from base station and attached to PC) when set to Armed (Cameras record when motion is detected). The fact that they added a mic to talk through the camera and night visions and even options to control the brightness of the camera just make it that much cooler and more useful. Pics can be taken or a video of a live stream as well. Everything this camera has is incredibly useful and user friendly. I really do recommend the Arlo if you want a easy secure one stop shop.Thanks,Trey S.
