content: Not too shabby. I like the system. It would be 5 stars for me if it wasn’t so delayed. There are times it is about a 10 second delay from what actually is going on. The motion sensing isn’t the best either. I would rate this 3.5. Other than those to complaints, it’s a good camera system. Pricy for what it really is. There is just too much out there and I don’t know enough about this stuff. I jumped onto Arlo because a friend of mine has it. He showed me how it works and such, so I was comfortable using it.
title: Not too shabby

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: P. C. Hart
content: I loved this system when I first got it, but several app updates later, I have come to hate it. Every time there is an update, new problems pop up. The geofencing feature was the major selling point for me. It worked perfectly for over a year, but now is completely useless. It neither arms when leaving the preset zone nor disarms when returning. A recent update accomplished nothing. Netgear's support is laughable. I cannot recommend the purchase of this product at this time, and wish that I hadn't invested so much in a virtually useless product.
title: Good cameras, worthless app.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: phoebe
content: Don't buy it. It's a total waste of money. It keeps sending wrong signal, when there's even nothing shown in the video. However, a few days ago, our packages were opened by others, the camera showed nothing! It needs to charge frequently as it keeps sending wrong signal.
title: Useless Camera

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Imatilda

That's fine when u are using Arlo to say monitor your own premises and you are actually at your own premises. However when u are offsite it's useless. It's something that Netgear has known for a long time but doesn't seem to be able to fix. Would get a 5 if they fixed it.
title: Arlo is great BUT the main module needs to be restarted every ...

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)

I don't have any experience yet as far as battery lifespan but i will update once i gather enough information. A+ Netgear. I like that it is has two audio. title: This is an awesome camera. I don't have any experience yet as ...

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Andresfb3
content: I am a very technical person and after doing hours of research I kept coming back to the Arlo Pro's.  I am very happy I did as they cameras have been working way better than I expected.  7 days of cloud storage plus USB storage option are really good and the product just works which is the best part of all.  Night vision and the microphone work really well also. Features I would like to see in the future are to be able to record 24x7 to USB and/or Cloud and to be able to set the motion detection areas. Will be looking to add more cameras in the near future.
title: Awesome cameras, really happy with the purchase even though these are 'priced higher'

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: kayaker
content: I admire the buyers who state that they installed the system in minutes.  I did not; in fact, I had to hire someone to install the software and cameras.  It is not intuitive.  The cameras work, but they are EXTREMELY sensitive to wind or any type of movement.  Consequently, I constantly receive e-mails stating that "Arlo has detected motion" in one of the five surveillance areas.  Within the first 24 hours, I received over 2,000 e-mails!  So I set the sensitivity to 10% (factory default is 80%) and I now receive about 200 e-mails a day.  Still too much.  It is annoying and I tend not even to look at each one.  This concerns me because there could be an outside intruder, but I do not have time to examine each video for its content. On a positive note, the cameras do work and they do their job.  I just wish they were not so sensitive. I am still not sure if I would recommend the system.  I will give it a bit more time, and hopefully it will calm down.
title: Still deciding if this was a good purchase

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: photo guy
content: This system is truly amazing. I have never seen something this simple with the results you get. From the time I opened the box to the time it was operational was less than 1 hour. That includes mounting the cameras. The picture quality is excellent and the sensitivity seems to be perfect. I would highly recommend this system to anyone who wants to monitor their home. I am using this to monitor a vacation home that we visit only about twice a month. I was using mydlink which just did not work well. I had one small question and called customer service - they were great.
title: Great System!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Cowboy Jim
content: Rechargeable battery lasts a long time before needing a recharge.  I had trouble getting Adobe Flash player to work using Microsoft Edge.  Had to use the Google browser.  Picture is clear.  Sound is not great but acceptable.  If night vision is really important, buy an IR light off Amazon for a larger night area.
title: Great cameras.  I upgraded my old Arlo's

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: K. Lefevre
content: I like the design and the mounting hardware is easy to work with. There is a three second or longer delay between what the camera sees and what ends up on your cell phone. Connecting was easy the first time, but i lost the connection when I tried to mount the camera later, and getting technical support is not a pleasant experience. There is no tech support number listed on the user manual.
title: Just OK, tech support is awful

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Steve Evans
content: I really appreciate the sense or security our Arlo camera's provide us.  Very easy to install and set up.  The App for my phone is incredibly easy to use.  The night vision is excellent and I'm impressed with the battery life. The video can be a little grainy at a distance.  You might want to step up a level if that's critical to you.  Also the claim that you can speak to people through the camera is not accurate in my experience. But, overall, I'm very impressed with Arlo for the money.  I have three camera's now and plan to expand my system to five in the next couple of months.  Highly recommended.
title: An Excellent System for the Money....

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Blackley's Super Bee Apiary
content: We love our Arlo...best camera.. I can watch anytime anywhere..I can download video to save forever..my base holds movement for 7 to 10 days...picture is crisp and clear..records sound and picture...we caught people trying to break into our cars...
title: Great camera...arlo all the way!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Yogi 32
content: Whether you start with just a couple or add cameras until you see everywhere you want, it is an incredibly easy system to set up, expand and use. The video quality is great, and it IS a true wireless system. The batteries last long, recharge fast, or you can add solar panels (get the netgear ones!), or if you want to run power wires you can. I now have one system at my house and one at work. Best system to buy!
title: An excellent system

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Fair and balanced
content: The cameras worked as advertised great image, The app for these cameras is also very good and easy to use. Set up for these cameras was a breeze . I highly recommend them. The cons: batteries do not last as long as advertised specially if you put them in a high traffic area where the motion sensor goes off a lot. Accessories from Arlo/Netgear are very expensive and make no sense why they are so overpriced.
title: Great camera with small issue

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Brandy
content: We have had cameras before and the set up was never easy. With arlo it was so easy to set up and get started. The app is easy to use as well. The quality is great and the ease of arming and disarming is great! My favorite part is the camera design. It's bottom heavy and sits well but you can hang it easily too!
title: Easy peasy

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: TechGeekColoradoan
content: Bummer these stopped charging and giving an "incompatible charging device" error from each and every outlet, every USB source we tried, including the ones it came with. Tried full reset, pulling batteries out, everything. As others have indicated, a poorly tested firmware update bricked my system. Good timing Arlo, buying Ring system now while they're on sale.
title: Latest update bricked these cameras (no USB chargers including Arlo ones charge cams)

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Thoms
content: I bought as a result of trespass in my back yard combined with vandalism. Installation was a snap. Added benefit: they alert me to our landscapers on the property and workers inside our home when we are away. We have two homes and I am anxious to see if I can view from a thousand miles away. I suspect from what I have read, that I will.
title: Love it

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: NeverStopLearning
content: The cameras work ok but not great. There is some lag in turning them on.  I have had deer walk across the trigger area  within 30 feet and the deer were almost across the area before the camera turned on.  My biggest issue is with the temperature range.  I noticed this winter that the cameras do not work in below zero temperatures.  After contacting the company I found out they are spec'ed down to -4.  it appears like they turn the cameras off if they get too cold which doesn't make for a great security camera.
title: Cameras stop working if they get too cold

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Craig Lowthorp
content: Arlo setup was as simple as creating an account and loading up my phone app. I am impressed with the ease of setting up the camera location and the free cloud video service. All I had to do was find a tree in front of my house and screw the mount in to the trunk. A single camera is able to cover the front and side of my house! So easy when you don’t have to worry about wires and connectivity was a breeze and had no issues. I did add the security mount to my system, but I think the regular mount would have done fine in the tree.
title: Easy set up, no wires!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Shayne Stalnaker
content: I was skeptical on purchasing these cameras due to the battery life from other reviewers. But these things have been rocking on battery life. I guess there are maybe some good and bad batches of batteries out there. Other than the batteries, these things have very little delay. I am still working on the scheduling for them so I don't get a million alerts in my email and notifications. I would definitely recommend these to anyone looking for a wireless camera. Awesome little things!!!
title: I guess there are maybe some good and bad batches of batteries out there

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: kewa
content: We love our Arlo Pros! The setup is super easy. We did have one defective camera in our 3 pack, but we contacted customer service & they fixed the problem for us. After reading reviews, I was a little concerned about battery life, which seemed to be an issue with the Arlo (not Arlo Pro). Our Arlo Pro batteries are lasting a long time (we purchased our first set of cameras 7 months ago & haven’t had to charge the batteries a single time). The notifications work great also. We did have some difficulty setting up geofencing on 2 devices, but after a little bit of troubleshooting we got it working. I have been impressed with this camera for sure! I’m hoping for HomeKit integration in the future, but not a huge deal. Overall, great purchase!
title: Easy setup, great quality cameras

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Joan L Steever
content: I purchased the 2-pak Arlo camera first and immediately put the two cameras facing my garage door and the second one facing my front door. I purchased the audio individual recently and exchanged the front door with the new camera. I love it! I can not only see but hear what is going on at my front door. I see packages dropped off and my dog barking upon hearing the delivery person. I am very happy and will purchase another one for indoors as well as for my back door.
title: Arlo audio camera

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Ashwin Katuri
content: I am really impressed with the performance of the device. Although, it’s kinda annoying that I get a notification anytime a car passes my neighborhood, but find it very safe. The zone system is not compatible for Arlo Pro and that’s something which would have been very helpful. I like the 7 day cloud backup and it also allows the flexibility to save videos indefinitely on to USB. I really don’t mind the delay either. I really wish this product support Apple homekit
title: Great product

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)

title: Works well when it wants to

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Max J.
content: The setup was easy.  The picture is great. The sensitivity is very good.  So why 3 stars?  The batteries suck.  Initially, the batteries last several months.  After that the charges only lasted a few weeks!  These are proprietary batteries that cost $75.00 each!!!  A couple of new batteries and you could buy a new system.  I don't think Ring is a better system, but I would do more research and find a different on before I would buy another Arlo.  My brother and his neighbor are having the same battery problems with their Arlos.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: T. Wenner
content: Works great with my Arlo system. Batteries last for many days before needing recharged.  I just wish Arlo would address the flaws in its app. Many times I get notifications but nothing appears in library. It's a  good system with no fees.
title: Nice security with no fees.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: John D. Goodhue
content: We received our first Arlo Pro camera in December as a gift.  We have been using it to monitor our driveway as we have no line of site to the street from inside the house.  The battery has only required charging once since we set it up and the wifi signal is strong, even though the base is distant from the camera.  When adding the second camera we had some difficulty syncing.  One member of the family has the administrator rights and shared the camera with other family members.  The new camera would not show up on the shared links.  We resolved this by having all users sign into the administrator account.  Once set up, the second camera is working as well as the first.  We had to be careful to position the backyard camera so as not to have every bunny running across the lawn trigger it.  Monitoring the cameras is easy from the phone app and provided peace of mind while we were out of town.
title: Monitoring the cameras is easy from the phone app and provided peace of mind ...

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Albert Karel
content: Pitifully weak speaker audio.  Limited range.  I bought it to have the ability to talk to people at front gate. First unit had pitifully weak speaker audio. Netgear sent a new one.  Same problem. Visitors could not hear me speak. Requires base unit...range less than my wifi router.
title: Weak weak speaker. Limited unit range.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Len
content: Needed to find something with easy wireless set up and still good quality. Found the Arlo system and after hours of reviews on this system and others I did pick Arlo 4 pack with base. I also purchased another camera as the base can connect five cameras. Fast shipping very easy set up.  Great quality pics and several great adjustments all controlled from my iPhone 7+. If you want a super cool system with total camera control you have to buy this system. If your on the fence buy this system you will be glad you did.
title: Outstanding

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Steven Comeau
content: Easy to setup and install.  Took away one star because I had to call tech support during install - I had to restart my ISP router to get the base station to sync with the cameras.  Would be helpful if that troubleshooting step was included in online support.  Other than that, the system and the app have worked flawlessly.  I love knowing when there's activity at my front door; especially when a package is left.  I bought the 2-camera setup and I'm thinking of adding additional camera.
title: My Pal Arlo

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: VogelB
content: I absolutely love these cameras. They are so easy to setup and install.  In addition, the round design of their magnetic mounting base makes for easy adjustments.  I purchased them for a vacation property, so we can keep an eye on things. Have had them installed for almost 3 weeks now.  Battery has barely depleted at all. They have detected wildlife as well as a general contractor. I purchased the Pro model.  Quality of picture is good. If/when I get more, will most likely try the Pro 2 or the Ultra. Love that you can mix camera types with the same base unit.
title: Excellent quality, easy set up and software is feature rich.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Frisco
content: After an entire day wasted trying get a single camera to sync with the base station (which, by the way, I was given several completely dead batteries, even though I was assured they were fully charged), the support contact at Netgear finally told me to return the product and get my money back. I was super excited about this. This is the first time I've ever had a company tell me to return a product because it didn't work at all. What a waste of money and time.
title: The company told me to just return it...so...that's how well it works.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: S Barnhart
content: It took a few minutes of lag time to get these up and running but they really work! I'm very electronic illiterate and I was able to get it up and running in a short few minutes...so, that is saying a lot of good things about this unit. Color, two way speaker, and alarm. Perfect-o. My order did not include a charging cord so I contacted the seller, and two days later without quibble, I received the cord and charger. Wonderful!!!
title: Wonderful little security unit!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Bluesman2
content: I have a security system with door and motion sensors, but at times have had false alarms. With the Arlo cameras, I can see if there was an actual break-in, or if it is a false alarm from my smart phone. The cameras are a snap to connect and work great. The rechargeable battery and audio are a plus with the Pro model.
title: Backup to Security System

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: jetspeed8
content: I replaced my original Arlo with the Arlo Pro  and it works fantastic.  I placed two Arlo Pro cameras in a detached garage a ways from the base station and three original Arlo cameras.  It works flawlessly .  Very happy with the new Arlo Pro cameras and base station..
title: Arlo Pro

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: LC
content: Bought this product a month ago. Have already had one camera go bad (pink hue), and battery life is not as expected.  Software is a bit confusing to set up (particularly the scheduling feature), and it seems there should be more individual options to be able to be set PER CAMERA, not for all of them at the same time. When working, it's pretty good, and admittedly, Netgear did agree to replace the defective camera, although I understand that a LOT of people have experienced this issue and did not have the same easy experience getting it replaced. They gave me conflicting information for the return in my two calls to them.
title: Nice Idea but little annoyances. Poor Netgear Support.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: 40oz District
content: Been running three cameras and the base station since 12/20/2016. One camera is an ArloQ the others Arlo Pro. One is outside running on battery.  The ArloQ is powered via the wall adapter. One Arlo Pro is also powered by the charger/wall adapter. So far the battery life is fine at 86% charge. The motion detection and alarming has worked fine. The mic and speaker work fair to poor. Seems to be a bit of delay in getting those to work. The included magnetic mounts are junk especially for outdoors. They hang on a single nail or screw head and are not very secure. The siren works fine and is super loud. The outdoor camera is in a coastal environment and not showing any issues from the elements. The night vision is good. So far so good and I would purchase again. 04/01/2017 Update - Still working well. The outdoor Arlo Pro has not been recharged and the battery level is 62%. 09/06/2018 Update - Wow how things have changed. I added an ArloQ Spring of 2017 and moved the other Arlo Pro outside, on battery. Worked great for a year. Now as of 7/2018 the battery powered cameras will last less than a month. Nothing has changed about the camera placement or configuration. Still the same basic motion detection. Arlo says in the support community engineering has heard about a battery drain issue but no fix yet. Thought I'd replace the batteries but read nothing but horrible reviews on the new batteries. Testing Reolink Argus 2 cameras on Reolink solar panels. So far so good. Goodbye Arlo, Hello Reolink!
title: Update - Would Not Purchase. Nearly 2 Years of Ownership. Major Battery Issues Now.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Carolyn P.
content: The Arlo cameras are so easy to set up and require no maintenance aside from battery charging. The battery in the Arlo pro lasts a very long time. The app allows you to monitor while away from home, as well as speak to someone. I love the Arlo system.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)

content: Love the Arlo Camera system.  So easy and efficient. I'm older, non-technical, and set up all 5 cameras in about 30-40 minutes. Can buy extra mounts, for $15 you get 4. Can put the mounts anywhere and then move my cameras around to different areas. No fees, no wiring, and no one monitoring me.
title: Love the Arlo Camera system

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)

title: when they did work I loved the quality and the ability to pick up motion ...

content: I have five Arlo cameras and I rely on these amazing little devices to keep me aware of what's going on around my home, keep track of my kids, see packages on my doorstep, or who's at the front door. I have to change the batteries about every 6 months. Arlo, you're my hero!
title: ... have five Arlo cameras and I rely on these amazing little devices to keep me aware of what's going ...

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: GearHead

author: Janchi

I was so frightened at the thought that I could not sleep for 3 days.  That's when I decided to go online and research home security systems.  The Arlo Pro was at the top of the list when it came to wireless security systems. The thing I love most about the Arlo Pro cameras is that it is totally wireless....no plugging into an outlet or running wires.  It was so easy to install and setup that I will be purchasing two more cameras to add to my security system. I highly recommend the Arlo Pro Security System.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)

However I wouldn't recommend this to users that really want a security system. I will be returning this item due to the lack of functionality.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Yuin Ee
content: My husband and I bought Arlo Pro as an affordable alternative security system for our home. We were overwhelmed by the choices out there but after much research, we have decided to go with Arlo. It was very easy and quick to set up Arlo. It took me about 15mins to set everything up and test it (microphone, alarm, motion detection, etc.). Everything works as expected. I really like the customized mode option where I can schedule when to arm the system, the sensitivity of motion detection, audio detection, etc. Geofencing mode is also a great feature where Arlo will be automatically armed when we're away from home. One of the biggest advantage Arlo has over other similar product is its free 7-day cloud storage for up to 5 devices which is more than sufficient for our use.
title: Reliable and easy to use!

The hardest part was figuring out how to set it up with my cell phone data plan (unlimited) to be used as a wifi Hotspot and then to ethernet, got that to work and the rest was EASY!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Keith H
content: Product wise, I haven't had any big problems setting up the camera and using it. The video quality is good enough to recognize faces at 10-15 feet. However, of the 5 cameras I've purchased, 1 was defective and refused to update firmware. So whenever I would look at the app, I get a big "please update firmware" text, and I would not be able to look at live feed of that defective camera or use any other of its functions. Netgear support has been a big headache. I went through the support forum and followed instructions on troubleshooting recommended by other users. Without luck, I contacted Netgear support and they asked me to run through the same exact steps even though I've informed them I already did them. After a few weeks of back and forth email, they finally emailed me saying "they deemed my product as defective, so would exchange the unit." But now I find out, I need to pay for the shipping of their defective unit back to them, before they would ship out the replacement! What reputable company ask customers to pay for shipping of defective product back for exchange???
title: I need to pay for shipping of defective product???

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: ted mankin
content: From the reviews I have read online this is the best system out so far.  Seems like it's still an evolving technology.  I like that you can speak thru the cameras and that it has an alarm if needed.  I also like that you can set the sensitivity level of the motion detection (I had a little problem with a waving flag but I just took the flag down). The cameras were easy to sync and mount and there is a local storage option plus the 7 day free cloud storage.  The main missing feature is professionally monitored service for extended vacations or other absences.  If we are going to be gone for 2 weeks,  it would be a great feature to be able to pay for ADT style monitoring while we are gone but then be able to turn that service off once we get back.  Maybe they will add that soon?!
title: ... the reviews I have read online this is the best system out so far

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: mike
content: nstallation :  Easy,  set up was smooth Pro's:  having owned a Lorex /FLIR system,  this one out does it it in many areas. 1) App is 100 x's better than the awful Lorex one that never worked 2) Ability to turn motion alarm off on individual cameras is nice 3) Camera quality is actually better than Lorex, despite it saying its 1080. Con's: 1)Night vision is not bad, but if your sight line is along a wall / window / siding,  you experience the IR back splash which takes away from open darkness areas. 2) Motion alarm needs work.  The delay in recording from the time the camera trips till it records is WAY too long.  Every other camera system out there can do it,  get on the ball Arlo. 3) Mag mounts are great,  but mounts need to be flush straight on to the area you want to cover.  You can'tmount to a wall / siding, and then have it angled at a door.  Will have to order the other mounts. 4) Recording can be glitchy at times.  I have experienced several motion alarms,  but when I check it on the app,  there is no recording .  Where did it go ?
title: Easy, set up was smooth Pro's

author: Herb Stark
content: We purchased an Arlo Pro to protect a parked motor home.  We have 3 Nest cams but did not want continuous monitoring.  Arlo sees activity but is not fooled by the sun going behind a cloud like the Nest.  We enjoy knowing that if we get an email or text, it really does see something.  There is a slight delay before he starts to record, but not enough to miss if someone has entered the premises.  Still working out the kinks, but I am sure we will be adding more Arlos to replace the Nests.
title: New to Arlo

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Alexander Ledford
content: We recently installed this camera system at our B&B because we have a downstairs apartment and could not see our guests arriving. This camera did everything it said it would regarding notification of motion and video recording of events. There are two things I would change, however. The motion detection is too slow for our front camera to pick up someone walking at a brisk pace to our front door and there are no instructions as to working the sound equipment on the camera. I had to google the information to find out how to get sound and work the microphone.
title: Works like a charm!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: MeiGuoRen
content: the pro system still has problems with the lag . the sound on the pro cameras switch so slowly between voice and sound it really does not work as you think it would by talking back and forth to someone at home. the system is not worth the money i am still doing tests on it to see if the system still records to the DVR when the internet dies. the canary system completely dies when internet is dead however has zero lag upon movement
title: needs to be better for the price

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Cameron Scott French
content: I bought a two pack of these cameras so I can see my driveway and back deck. The install was super easy and the video quality is great! This is 720p, but they do have 1080p if you want to get the Arlo 2, but that's ab out $100 more. Definitely recommend!
title: Great outdoor Wi-Fi cameras for the price!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Marsh
content: Overall, very impressed by the Arlo Pro system.  You can set it up and get rolling rather quickly, but I found that committing time to understanding all the features and then taking more time to experiment with the sensitivity levels makes the whole system work to your liking.  I had to adjust sound sensitivity down to 1 to allow for loud cars or trucks passing our house.  The trial and error period can make you a little crazy, but you have to realize it's the only way to dial it in, unless you just shutoff those features.  Camera clarity is decent enough.  At 100% sensitivity, it seems to catch motion out to 30' or more but less consistently.  It's picked up deer and a rabbit in the 1st week.  I look forward to next generation stronger distance cameras and other improvements.  So far, very happy and my wife likes the added sense of security.
title: Arlo Pro is a go

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: DR. SUPERMAN
content: Writing from Latin America. I have the Netgear AC1900 Wireless router, so the ARLO Pro was a natural fit. I was very apprehensive about the purchase because some of the reviews here were negative, mostly about the software and if mine didn't work, I would have to pay some hefty shipping charges to return the item. As of this writing , the base unit with one camera was installed today. It was a breeze to set up. It works as expected. The siren on the base unit is loud. I'm not sure it can be heard down the block, since it's inside the house. None the less for those inside the house it is plenty loud. I will now proceed to buy two additional cameras since I'm sure the investment was worth it.
title: Writing from Latin America. I have the Netgear AC1900 ...

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Doc Holliday
content: Have had a set of three Arlo pro cameras set up for a little over a week now. Set up was very easy and the app is fairly intuitive. Was bummed to find that the system can’t detect our indoor cat. His collar has a bell and he runs around in an open floor space directly in the view of one of the cameras. Even with motion and audio detection on maximum sensitivity it doesn’t see him. The cost was a bit high compared to other similar cameras, but I trust net gear as a brand over the knock offs. One note for people unfamiliar with infrared for night vision, this feature will not capture video through glass because the infrared light will reflect on the video recording. So if you want an outside view, for example, the camera must be physically outside and not inside pointed out the window. Unless you want to turn off infrared and rig up an external source of infrared illumination. Overall satisfied, just wish it cost 15% less and triggered when my cat is being ruckuous home alone.
title: Good but pricey.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Giuseppe
content: Pros: Very, very easy to setup - used my iPhone.  Only hiccup - Arlo app would tell me I have a waiting update for my camera after I just updated the camera - just quit the app and restart and the warning went away.  That was it - took longer to find a ladder and screw driver than to create an account, setup the base station, and add a camera to it. System can support a mix of up to 5 indoor or outdoor cameras. Included camera mount works beautifully - very easy to install. Camera resolution is quite good I was shocked at how much clear audio it picks up.  I mean, mount the camera 9 feet high next to your garage light, get in your car, roll down your window and it will record a conversation between driver and passenger perfectly.
title: very easy to setup - used my iPhone

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: DissidentMan
content: I like the ease of use and the mobility of these little cameras.  I don't have any electrical outlets in the areas I need video coverage, and the Arlo Pro works great for this.  I've had them installed for a week, and the batteries are still at 100%  It takes them a second or 2 to "wake up" when motion is detected, but as far as I know, I haven't missed anyone coming or going.  Night vision works well with motion detection also. The free 7 days of storage in the cloud is great, and not offered by anyone else right out of the box.  I often desire to change the settings of the base unit from "armed" to "unarmed", and sometimes I am not able to accomplish that, as the app is stuck in the "getting status" state.  Overall, this is a great unit.
title: Easy to use and move around

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Natalie Johnson
content: Loving our Arlo security cameras. I feel even better knowing Costco sells them too. We have them inside and outside. It has been awesome knowing each time little missy wakes up during the night and right when packages get delivered. We bought the pro version, so we don't have to deal with replacing batteries. The 7 days of free cloud storage and ability to download the video clips is great. No monthly fees. I also like being able to use the 2-way radio feature :-)
title: loving the ease and security

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Heather Caldwell
content: My husband and I just got Arlo and 2 cameras to keep an eye on our property after a propane tank was stolen from our front porch. The setup was super easy and fast, very little lag between camera and video on the app. Had to search how to grant him access to our account, but info was easily found on the website with a quick search. We’re thinking of buying a few more cameras, one for inside to watch our dogs while we’re gone and another for our driveway. We had the Ring doorbell and it drove us crazy as it was too sensitive to movement. Totally recommend this system to others.
title: Quick and easy setup

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Lindamarie
content: Use this security camera to view activity around my home.  The live view worked for 6-8 weeks then stopped working. The motion detection records activity.  however, system does not allow live feed as it should.
title: After 6-8 weeks live feed/view stopped working

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Alex S.
content: I got the Arlo pro and have been very happy with the quality and performance of these cameras, I feel so much safer at home or at work knowing I can check on things. One of my favorite features is the geofencing that will automatically arm Arlo when you leave a set radius of your home and disarm when you return. They are on the higher end of pricing, but you get what you pay for, and with home security I think it's a no brainer.
title: High quality cameras!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: D F    Atlanta, Ga.
content: After trying a Ring and A Blink which had spotty reactions to movement, I now have the Arlo Pro. I wanted a wireless-rechargeable outdoor unit. So far after 2 days, it works as designed and does what it should. The picture is very clear.  I will likely purchase another unit. The only complaint I have with Arlo is that if you need customer support, be prepared to wait on the phone on hold for at least an hour. They don't have enough reps to handle the volume of calls in a timely manner. I could not get my email set up at first, because I had a previously registered Netgear router. The password had to be reset on the Netgear log in, and then the Arlo would work. Two tries for an hour + each time final got this resolved.
title: Arlo Pro Works Great!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Dan H.
content: CONFUSING!!!  Almost impossible to contact Arlo.  If wiring is not a problem, go with a different system.  Try Night Owl or some other wired system.  Before purchasing a security camera system, attempt to contact the company in charge of the system.  If you can't contact them before buying their system, don't expect it to be easy to get in contact with them after you purchase their system.
title: CONFUSING and HARD TO CONTACT

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: awalls20
content: Great system. I drank the adt koolaid for years and I can't believe what I have missed.  The camera quality is second to none, the detection and notifications are so good they are annoying.  Install was super easy.  The app tries it all together for the perfect camera system at an affordable price
title: Easiest install possible

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Stephen Zaffarano
content: I love the long battery life and the ability to see good video at any time of the day.  There is quite a bit of detail lost, however, when zooming in.  It wouldn't be easy to read a license plate or make out a face from more than 30-40 feet away.  Motion sensor works well but would prefer to edit the range of the sensor, versus the sensitivity.  I know they're probably related but if I could make a circular 'zone' to scan in, that would be helpful.  All in all, it's a very good product for the price.
title: Arlo Pro

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Lee M. Batson
content: If you want this to work with Home Kit DON’T BUY. It doesn’t work with Home Kit. May show up on one of your iOS devices but will not show up on any of your other devices. Arlo tec support has no clue how this product works. After more then 7 hours on the phone I am now farther way from getting this product to sync with all my devices then I was when I started. Plus Arlo tec support wiped out all of my existing Home Kit devices. That was another six hours to get everything back on line. I will be looking to return everthing I purchased.
title: If you want to use with Home Kit DO NOT BUY

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Gerald Bonaventure
content: This camera does not catch a cat walking across my porch, a human standing at my door or a vehicle passing 15 feet from my door. It constantly makes a buzzing sound to where you have to cut off sound. Only had it a couple of weeks. This camera was suggested as a add on to my current system Arlo Pro 2
title: Arlo Pro 2 add on camera

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: DJ
content: These cameras do exactly what we were looking for in a security system without cables. The short video clips save on storage and the notifications work well to our iPhones. Easy to manage. Battery life has been very good despite below zero temps. Great system for the price. Easy setup. Motion detection field lacks a bit so placement is key to avoid false triggers from passing cars.
title: Easy to manage

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: The10uspro
content: Great cameras, easy to install if you have internet. To avoid changing batteries, get the optional power cords.  NOTE: These cameras "will view" but not pick up motion or record through insulated gas windows.
title: GREAT Security Cameras

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: LaurenC
content: I’ve had no trouble out of this camera. The picture quality is excellent. I had some late night trespassers who had actually stolen from my neighbors, as soon as I turned the videos over to police, they were immediately identified. Perfectly clear videos even on night vision. Thankfully most of my “trespassing” videos are of wildlife cutting through, but it gives me peace of mind.
title: Excellent security camera

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: RHFD
content: Setup could not be easier, very smooth. Since the camera is triggered to record by motion (or sound)  the "security" is only as good as the motion detection. With an approximate 20-22 foot range (across field of view better than head on) this should be fine for almost any indoor application unless you live in a mansion. For outdoors the range may be a factor you need to consider as far as triggering to record. As far as a live view you can clearly see multiple times that range (minimum 60+ feet). Only had it a couple of weeks, will see how battery life is, don't think I will make the "up to 3 month"  stated.
title: Easy setup, good performance considering it is totally wireless.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: RS
content: So far, no real issues. I'm two weeks in. The pros: The set up was easy. The battery life appears to be goo.d. The app is easy to use. The cons (don't outweigh the pros): that my data is on a corporate server somewhere - which in theory creates privacy concerns; the distance on the camera is not as great as I'd like it to be in one location, but I don't have a better place to put the camera. All in all I'm happy with the purchase and would buy it agagin.
title: The set up was easy. The battery life appears to be goo

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Dawn Throne
content: We own 5 of these Cameras and use them daily.  We live in the tall pines in northern AZ and have them placed out to capture wild animals, deer, elk, turkeys, rabbits, coyotes, bears, foxes, and even mice.  Our movies are amazing and we share with family and friends.  They love it and so do we.  Amazing product
title: Arlo Pro - Add-on Camera | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Ben
content: This is a great product with really cool features such as geofencing. The only issue is that the geofencing rarely works correctly.  Customer support for the item is terrible too. They just keep telling me to reset the item. This is an issue that happens a lot as seen in many forums. It is very disappointing that the geofencing feature doesn't work well. I have one of these at my home and office. I used to love it, but am starting to look at better options at this point.
title: Great product... when it works...

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Maria B
content: After weeks of research, we selected the Arlo Pro system and it has exceeded our expectations! The signal from the camera to the base is strong. We even put a camera on our detached garage approximately 150' from the base station that is located inside of our house & the camera works perfectly. Two way sound quality in the cameras is very good. Picture quality, even the night vision, is clear and better than expected. Motion detection and notifications through the phone app are instantaneous. Having a aurvelillance system has reduced. my anxieties & worries when away from home. An added perk is getting to check on my 3 large dogs during the day and we've already captured a couple of funny, candid videos of the dogs.  Extremely satisfied with the purchase and would highly recommend.  I've already recommended this product to two co-workers who plan to purchase the same system after seeing the videos on my phone app.
title: Excellent Quality & Features

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: annie phung
content: Your browser does not support HTML5 video. I like the cameras because it was basically plug and go.  The magnetic mounts seem strong which I liked cause I didn’t feel the urge to shell out more money for the other mounts.  The picture quality is bad but I knew that when I purchased the system.  The app is kind of tedious to navigate through.
title: Not perfect but it works exactly how I expected it to.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: RCFP
content: Just  installed this system with four cameras on our cabin.  Setup is absolutely painless, simple to follow instructions had all cameras operating within minutes.  Picture and sound came through flawlessly, and the siren option is a great addition.  Motion sensing works well, and alerts came across on my iPhone within a couple minutes at the most. We would definitely recommend these!
title: Compact and Capable

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: CND
content: Pros: ridiculously easy to set up and install. I was using it in minutes. Love being able to log into the app from my phone and see a live feed, etc. Camera angle is quite wide so was able to cover a large area in front of my house with one camera. Mic is pretty sensitive and picks up everything. Would definitely consider adding more cameras to my system in the future. Cons: video and audio are definitely delayed - does not start the moment it senses movement but several seconds later. When playing back video, the audio also does not begin until several seconds into the recording. Wish there was a way to customize the length of the recordings (default is 10 second clips). My biggest gripe is that the delay in using the microphone to try to talk to someone via live steam is so long it renders this feature almost useless. You could get a message to someone if you needed to but forget about having a meaningful exchange.
title: Overall good but some opportunities to improve.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: GaryL
content: Seller delivered this promptly. Product is new, well wrapped, in original boxes. Thanks to the seller. This is an add-on camera. I bought Arlo over a year ago and wanted another camera because I really like it's features. I wish I had bought the system originally with 3 cameras but I was skeptical of its performance. It's a very good, simple versatile system.
title: I bought Arlo over a year ago and wanted another camera because I really like it's features

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: James Fouste
content: I am very please with my ARLO cameras.  They were easy to install.  No wires.  All the cameras have two way sound capabilities, long lasting rechargeable batteries, and night vision.  The mounts included work awesome. The customer service at ARLO / Netgear and Amazon is also awesome.  One of the five cameras was having issues syncing with the base.  It was diagnosed as a faulty camera (issues happen, its not perfection that indicates a great product/company its how they handle an issue that really matters).  Netgear referred me back to the retailer, Amazon.  Amazon was great.  A replacement was sent the following day.  They replaced the camera that was faulty rather than making me take down what I had already set up and returning the whole system.  I was still operational with 4 cameras and just need to get my fifth one replaced. Both Netgear and Amazon (PRIME) have a lifetime customer here.
title: Great Product and customer service form Netgear and Amazon

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Preston L. Abadie
content: The camera is high quality, has a great battery life, and withstands the weather and environment very well. I love the geofencing feature, and the Arlo app is friendly and simple to use.
title: Excellent home security camera.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: l m miller
content: I returned the cameras  unopened as I neeed to coordinate  a camera system with a new alarm system. I would recommend Netgear  to anyone else.  If you connect  arlo  pro the baystation to your Internet router within their  modem, they have to port forward  to have viewing for cameras. One drawback , if Internet goes out, no monitoring capability.  I went with my alarm co camera.
title: Arlo Pro

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Gustavo Aquino
content: Arlo camera is different, their wirelessly cams bring amazing flexibility . I was able to set the camera hidden in different places indoor due to his magnetism, just plugging it without any screwdriver. I got a problem with the first Arlo base, but after call to Arlo support their request me to replace the kit, I did it in the same time using Amazon and get a new setup box in two days, this one works very well and I was able to configure it very quickly. Another good point is Arlo app, it works very well and is very fast, I just miss a way to mark specific areas to monitor. I'm a happy customer, like it so much; the video and audio quality are amazing.
title: The best wireless camera I have had

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Hadley E. Thompson
content: Besides the Arlo cameras, I had several VueZone cameras which Netgear dropped support. After spending all the money on the VueZone cameras, they are no longer working. Someday they will drop support for the Arlo cameras.
title: Won’t buy more

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Pushkin
content: I love the camera so much, I have six!!! My only complaint is putting it up against a window is impossible, I have tried everything. The mounting options kind of blow, and the glare from the window affects the camera's performance. Over the last ten years I have purchased at least ten different cameras, and was disappointed by all of them, including the very expensive Axis camera I wasted over a thousand dollars on. ARLO is the first camera I can actually endorse.
title: I love the camera so much, I have six!!!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: JPRetemla
content: I was able to get the camera set up quickly on the day it arrives. That night I happened to catch a short video of what I later learned was someone breaking into my neighbors mailbox. I didn't have the camera positioned well for that incident, and luckily there was no mail. I then learned how to actually 'set' my camera. My docking a star from 5 is due to the lack of some set up information in the box. I found almost everything online the following few days. I wish what I consider simple things where included in the box instructions like how to set the length of recording, camera sensitivity, and other camera features. After a few days online I feel as though I've tweaked it pretty well. The recording does seem to have a delayed start from when it senses motion, but I'm hoping that's just a setting I haven't found yet. Overall happy with the purchase.
title: Mostly great

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Joe Sindoni
content: These cameras are unbelievable. They are reasonably priced. Completely wireless with a battery that seems like it will last forever before needing a charge.  The picture is high definition with great recording of both picture and sound.  They can be activated by motion or you can simply go live anytime you want and view right on your smart phone with the Arlo app or at the website right on your desktop. I started out with two and just purchased two more. I love them so  much I am sure I am going to end up buying the fifth one.  I highly recommend these cameras!
title: Completely wireless with a battery that seems like it will last forever before needing a charge

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Becky Allemand
content: The time delay is way too much. By the time you see someone walking close they are already gone. This product does not stay on line. I tried to reinstall but now it doesn’t show up as a device to even connect.  I would not buy this product.
title: Don’t waste your money.

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: S. M. Davis
content: We chose the Arlo over many of the other brands because it retains recordings from the previous 7 days whereas some others only retain the previous 3 hours. Although some of the functionality is slow, it has been nice to be able to see in realtime what is going on in front of our house while away. The two way talk feature is fun, though not used very often. I think the night mode is top notch. I am glad the system is easy to use. It may not be preventative, but I do believe it is subtle enough it isn't obvious at first glance. I recommend this when anyone asks.
title: Best Free Service Functions

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: ice_man
content: Perfect Home Wireless Security System By ice_man on Aug 15, 2017 12:14:47 PM  Arlo Pro System was the answer to my home security system problem. First and foremost, it is by far the easiest to install. It is a wire free system. I purchased the 6 camera kit system and have 5 of them up (4 outdoors & 1 indoor). They work seamlessly with my Airport Base Station. Plug and play, no fuss! The video quality could use some improvement due to the 720p limitation. I am hoping that they come out with a higher resolution wire free cameras in the next 2 years or so. All in all, this system is perfect to those who don't want to deal with running wires from the outside of your house through your attic or wherever. The free basic plan also works beautifully. No monthly fees! I gove this system 9 out of 10. Edit Review
title: Perfect Home Wireless Security System By ice_man on Aug 15

Also wish the alarm feature came from the cameras and not from the base. Haven't used the alarm yet but the warning says it may impair hearing and since my cameras are outside and the base and my dog are inside, I dont like that the hearing impairing alarm would go off indoors close to my dog as opposed to outside with the cameras detecting intruders. Otherwise, happy with the product and would recommend.

author: DarrCity Annie
content: I have been looking for some kind of security system since I found a screen on my sunporch moved during what looked like an attempted break in.  Most systems required sensors on each entry point, or cameras that needed to be plugged into an outlet. To get the most out of these systems, a monthly fee was needed.  I was happy to find Arlo, which has a base station, wireless cameras, recharchable camera batteries, motion detection notices sent to my phone, two way microphones, the coverage I needed without a fee, AND, was so simple to set up!  It has worked flawlessly so far...I highly recommend Arlo.
title: Just what I was looking fir!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Carol B.
content: If you are looking for an ease of use security camera this is a good one.  But, if you are looking for a camera with resolution sufficient to identify an intruder this unit does not cut indoors under normal light.  Outside in bright sunshine you may actually get an image sharp enough for identification.  The saved video is only 448 x 240.  It looks fine on your phone but try blowing it up for any details like a face and forget it. As you can see from the two images(amazon review does not support mp4 videos) the color one is useless unless the perp were to walk right up and look straight in the camera.  The night vision black and white is sharper but there is no way to force the camera to stay in that mode.  The User Manual on page 40 says that you can set the camera to take snapshots which might give you the true HD this camera promises.  I could not find this setting and when I talked to tech support I was told that feature was never added.  In short, the manual is inaccurate on that point. What I am still looking for is a wireless security camera (they may simply not exist) that has resolution sufficient to identify an intruder with an image that will stand up in court.  Otherwise, cameras like these will let you know someone is or has been in your house or outside on your property but not whom.
title: Saved video not even close to HD

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Erik
content: This camera has everything I want, good picture (even at night) and two way audio. It has a motion sensor that when triggered will record a clip to the cloud and send an email to the account it was set up with. But it also integrates well with SmartThings, which I have so I've configured the camera to start recording based on other sensors, which is nice if the camera is in a place where motion occur frequently. The cameras base station also have a really loud siren that can be enabled/disabled from the mobile app in which live streams from each camera can be watched as well. I'm guessing the cameras can be configured so the siren is triggered by the motion sensor as well but as I use other sensors it's nothing I've tried to do. After having this camera for some time, occasionally watching the live feeds there's only one additional thing I wish these cameras had, a controllable motor in it's mounting base so I could swivel the cameras around it's mounting point.
title: Piece of mind

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Dean M.
content: Received the 3-camera package with a 4th camera ordered as part of the bundle.  The separate camera comes with its own charging cables and charger.  The entire system took less than 2 hours to setup, sync and install the 4 cameras. I'm still adjusting the camera sensitivities to reduce false notifications but so far they're doing what they're supposed to, notify you when motion or sound is detected. Battery life has been excellent although I notice the cameras with more detected incidents have slightly less battery remaining.  Not an issue since these are rechargeable. The range of motion and items these detect is incredible.  I had one camera in my garage that was detecting the security light that blinks inside my vehicle.  I'll cover the blinking light with tape since having the camera inside my garage is more important. Overall, I'm very pleased with the quality and features that this system offers. I've gone ahead and purchased a 5th camera to get coverage inside and outside my home.
title: Superior quality, features, flexibility and ease of set-up

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: iPwn Repair
content: Arlo Pro camera was a great add on to my Existing Arlo setup. The Arlo pro worked with the old base station but some options are limited such as sounding an alarm this does not work as original base station has no alarm. Pros: Cost. at around $180 at time of this post it is $70 to $20 less then competitors like Nest($249) and Ring ($199.99). The arlo pro was easy to setup, can be used wired or Wire-free, has 130 degree field of view over the 110 field of view of original Arlo, weatherproof, HD quality (720p), has rechargeable battery, 2 way audio (built in mic and speaker), better motion detection then original Arlo, night vision, 7 day FREE cloud storage. Cons: It would be nice to have 1080p HD quality but to save on battery life Netgear opted for 720p. No 5GHz option wireless is limited to the already crowded 2.4GHz band. The base station is required to setup and use Arlo. so this adds another piece of hardware to your modem/router/etc can take up space and power outlets. The rechargeable battery is not standard size battery. So while it is great not to need to buy batteries over and over or buy your own rechargeable batteries like with original Arlo. Since the battery is not standard you will have to take down camera once battery is low to recharge or have the option to spend $50 and get a second battery and $60 for the charging station adding $110 in additional cost. The mic on Arlo pro is amazing at catching the smallest sound detail but the speaker, if camera is setup outside, is next to impossible to hear. Overall:  Arlo pro is step up from Arlo and it does what it is designed to do which is mount the camera ( using wireless option) in many places you cannot get a wired camera and it provide clear HD quality videos and audio to monitor an area. If you do not mount in high traffic area battery should last about 6 months before charge is needed ( per Netgear) so if you can get past the inconvenience of having to take down camera to recharge battery or buy charge station/extra battery then the Arlo pro is a great option for you.  Having both Ring Doorbell and Ring Stickup can I can say Arlo Pro does give Ring competition as video does tend to be clearer on Arlo.
title: Netgear has nice HD securtity cam!

product: Arlo Pro - Wireless Home Security Camera System with Siren | Rechargeable, Night vision, Indoor/Outdoor, HD Video, 2-Way Audio, Wall Mount | Cloud Storage Included | 5 camera kit (VMS4530)
author: Kevin
content: TL:DR Version PROS: Intuitive, easy to setup right out of the box No wires needed Magnetic mounts provided are easy to install Phone App allows easy review of videos CONS: Battery life isn't great for busy areas Frequent video distortions (even with video quality maximized) The cameras occasionally go offline and must be physically brought back to the base Magnetic mounts don't offer full range of positioning I live in Philadelphia and my front door opens to a sidewalk and I bought this primarily to monitor the front of my house. My street is a side street and isn't overly busy. I initially used the provided magnetic mounts but couldn't get the right positioning for the area I wanted to monitor. I then purchased additional mounts that have more range of motion (they also allow you to screw the camera down which is much more secure than the magnetic mount which anyone could just pull the camera off). The initial problem was that every car that drove down the block set off the motion sensor, after dialing down the sensitivity and positioning the camera's field of vision as tightly against the front of my house as I could I prevented cars from triggering the motion detector. However I still have people walk down the block, so I'll get 30-40 motion activations every day which runs the battery down pretty quickly and I'm looking at having to recharge the battery (which means unscrewing the camera from it's mount) every week or two. I'm going to end up plugging the camera into an outdoor power outlet so I don't have to worry about recharging the battery all the time and it will allow me to have a larger field of vision with what the camera monitors. If you set the video to record longer snippets (2 min is the max) it eats up the the battery super quick. The video quality is pretty good in terms of resolution but it frequently freezes on captured videos or has weird motion artifact. Watching the camera live either on a computer or a mobile device is possible but the signal frequently drops for a second or two (and I have a super good wifi connection). If the camera goes offline for some reason, you physically have to take the camera down and return it to the base to resync it. It seems like this camera is much better suited for an area where you expect to get zero motion activations and wanted to record/be notified every time it detects motion. I'm a little disappointed overall, but the wireless aspect was really enticing. I'd only recommend this for an area with very few times the camera will go off (either with motion or noise detection).
title: Not Great For City Life

content: Very well designed camera system. A breeze to setup and configure. So far my only issue is the lag time on recording. Due to these cameras being wireless, they must be very efficient. This means the camera is not actually on all the time. It is powered on and records whenever the IR sensor detects movement. Due to this mechanism, there is a 2-3 second delay from when movement actually occurs and when the recording starts. The stopping of recording also seems arbitrary. Many clips are 10 seconds, but some go longer. Also, due to the IR movement detection, these cameras will not detect movement through glass. However, oddly enough, it seems to detect movement of reflections onto glass. Also, the camera seems to have some issues going into nightvision mode if there are some lights within frame. Overall 9/10
